author: {'steamid': '76561197979757181', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1625, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1274, 'last_played': 1544767215}
review: This demo IS scary.  It WILL scare the crap out of you at SEVERAL points.  It will scare you so much that you will keep coming back to it for more hits of fight or flight brain chemicals.  The atmosphere is VERY stark and isolated, with creepy sounds and elements galore.  You wander around waiting for the ball to drop and when it does the first time you are a bit let down if still scared, the second time you are out of your MIND scared and jamming your keyboard/controls like a madman for your life!  After a few times, if you haven't read stuff on the net, you realize the game is somewhat a deep puzzle like the old Myst game.  You need to snoop and look everywhere and then rinse and repeat but you are rewarded with creepier stuff and more story.  I will say this; watch the video tape closely, 180ing often, and you will see some scary stuff.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988717886', 'num_games_owned': 252, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1485249628}

review:

Pari réussi pour Biohazard y a pas de doute!! je crois que ce sera mon 1er jeu acheté pris plein car il en vaut vraiment la peine de ce que j'ai pu voir dans le démo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198053208517', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1482236354}

author: {'steamid': '76561198029577602', 'num_games_owned': 1322, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1485204532}
review:
Primeras impresiones: excelente

- De PT y Outlast aquí no hay nada que no sea la perspectiva y los pasillos, esto es sucio, se mueve en el mundo del gore y el asco como pez en el agua, la atmósfera es pesadisima casi puedes respirar ese aire y sentir el olor a muerte y podredumbre y te mete en el juego en el mismo momento que te rodea la oscuridad por primera vez. 

- Hay mucho mas de Alien Isolation, y de F.E.A.R. (en serio), que de cualquier otra cosa, no hay jump scares forzado, el susto se anuncia y funciona por acercamiento y tensión que va creciendo abres una puerta, oyes unos pasos y algo viene hacia ti, pero no es precipitado es sutil o salvaje pero no parece enlatado, puedes sentir que algo viene y es algo malo.

- El sonido con cascos es increíble, y el trabajo visual te absorbe por completo, te envuelve, me flipa como se ve la piel de los personajes y como reacciona a la luz, da una sensación de vida que inquieta bastante.

- El doblaje español ni idea, el inglés es excelente, grandes interpretaciones la verdad.

- Sobre si es la matanza de texas, comparte la estética y el gore pero a los 15 minutos ya ves que esto va de otra cosa, que hay algo mas profundo y maligno aquí que una familia de tarados.

Me esta gustando MUCHISIMO y yo era de los mas escepticos con este juego pero joder, es bueno, realmente bueno.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970383213', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1485229937}
review:
Ahh la démo d'un jeux, et en plus d'un Resident Evil .. la je saute dessus direct ..

Alors autant j'ai apprécié l'ambiance, l'univers ...  le petit côté Rec, paranormal activity et j'en passe bien sympa ..
J'irais pas plus loin pour pas spoiler ... (même si il y a franchement pas grand chose a spoiler du coup..).

Franchement c'est quoi cette démo ...??? 3.5go pour une démo aussi courte ???
Sérieux c'est pas une démo ca ... c'est la démo d'une démo plutôt non ??

On voit pas grand chose .. la base des mécaniques .. pas un coup de feux ..
Bref juste une vitrine .. quelques vidéos, 50m a pied ... et voila ...

Je suis déjà très hésitant a cause de la durée de vie d'apparement moins de 10h, mais alors la cela me rassure pas du tout. Pourtant ce jeux m'aurait vraiment tenté, mais j'attendrais plus de contenu et que les prix baissent du coup ..

author: {'steamid': '76561198043609914', 'num_games_owned': 3556, 'num_reviews': 834, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1484770359}
review:
I'll keep this review incredibly short, as I'm planning on reviewing Resident Evil 7 and I'm aware that this entire teaser is in the actual game, so I'll keep it brief.

In this teaser you play as a man who wakes up in a seemingly abandoned house. You soon find a tape and put it in a VHS player and you soon figure out that the house is not as abandoned as it seems and you have to get out as soon as possible.

Most of you have already played this teaser and even gotten the Dirty Coin ending, but for those who haven't I'll explain a bit how the game works.

In the demo there's no combat, but you can pick up weapons and there is an enemy, but I haven't tried to kill it. But anyways. The demo is more or less a scavenger hunt, where you look for items to escape the house and once you escape it leads to events in the Resident Evil 7.

This teaser looks absolutely fantastic and the attention to detail is great, and without a doubt Resident Evil 7 looks amazing as well.

To experience every possible ending you will play for at least two hours, after that there's no point in playing anymore as at that point you have already experienced everything,

In the end all I can say check this out if you like horror, cause this is absolutely fantastic and I can't wait to play the main game. 

(won't give this teaser a rating)

author: {'steamid': '76561198013764870', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 446, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 375, 'last_played': 1577317984}
review:
[h1]Adiós a la tercera persona, hola al survival horror[/h1]
Estamos ante un antes y un después en resident evil, lo cual es bueno casi seguro, ya que las últimas entregas eran muy flojas y seguían el mismo esquema que las anteriores.

[b]Los fans de Resident Evil 1 y 2 estáis de suerte[/b]
Vuelve la tensión, el no querer pasar por un pasillo, el saber que algo malo se encuentra tras una habitación, y que tendrás que acabar pasando si o si.
Ya no tenemos 13 años y evidentemente ya no nos asustamos con la misma facilidad que en las primeras entregas, pero te aseguro que esta entrega te mantendrá en tensión durante mucho rato.

La atmósfera es increíble. Apaga la luz, sube el volumen al 90% que retumben las paredes con cada crujido y prepárate para sentir que estás dentro de la casa.

Es un juego que estoy seguro que generará muchos haters, ya que abandona el sistema en tercera persona. Pero me considero fan de la saga, he jugado a todos y cada uno de los Resident Evil, y después de las últimas entregas..., esto es un soplo de aire fresco, muy muy fresco, estoy deseando que salga el juego completo.

Para mí, la tercera persona no es ni mejor ni peor, simplemente era algo característico de Resident Evil, pero no algo realista, ni inmersivo, así que bajo mi punto de vista personal, creo que el cambio a primera persona es realmente un acierto.

Enjoy!

author: {'steamid': '76561198189755671', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1485272958}
review: First off, let me say that all these people with the negative reviews.....i have no idea WTF they are complaining about.....This DEMO is AMAZING! It redeems the Resident Evil title......the last 4 games were terrible....resident evil 4-7 have just bee so bad. This game is going to be amazing, i am so excited for it. I have not been this excited for a resident evil game since resident evil 2. The only reason ui could see them complaining is because they are trying to play this game on a light-bright hooked up to a computer. The people complaining are probably used to easy games where they hold your hand the whople way through the game. To any true survival horror fan you are going to LOVE this game. If the game is anything like the demo, and i do mean anything, it will be truly amazing. Now i am sure i will get some negative speak on this review, probably for my grammar or something like that. But what ever, i don't care, i am so excited for this game. This is my only review i have ever done, on anything. So that should tell you something, i was so compelled to do this review, i really hope this game does well so they keep making games like this. Games have gotten so easy and stupid over the years, withj all the hand holding and lack of consequence for your actions. I loved the first resident evil for those reasons, it was hard and terrifying. I just hope the Resuident evil fans don't ruin this game by all there complaining about not enough action or the puzzles are too hard or BS like that. I love survival horror so much, games like Outlast or Alien isolation and Amnesia are amoung my favorites, also SOMA was good. And if you are a true survival horror fan this Demo is amazing, the game comes out in like 15 hours so we will see if i was right or wrong then! OMG I AM SO EXCITED!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198031304383', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1485157341}
review:
EDIT: Apparently I need to clarify that this review is a year old and I've dumped many hours into the actual RE7 game, which is phenomenal. The demo was boring as hell, but the game itself is good. So stop crying in my comments section, thanks.

I felt the need to review this in light of the constant praise it seems to get from people online.

This game is being praised as the Resident Evil franchise "returning to its roots", a long awaited event for many fans of the classic series. After how poorly Capcom has handled the previous installments of Resident Evil, and with the addition of some really poorly made spin-off games, people have had high hopes for a return to the classic RE style of survival horror instead of action "horror". Sadly, after seeing the trailers and playing the demo, it seems that many people don't understand what this idea of "going back to your roots" actually means, Capcom included.

Anyone who has played Resident Evil since its beginning knows what the games are like. RE's roots are in traditional survival horror with campy characters and dialogue that give the games a charming appeal while still maintaining a creepy atmosphere. They can be very formulaic in structure and story, but the basic mechanics and gameplay are simple. You solve puzzles, find keys and weapons, and try to avoid being killed by zombies and various special creatures strewn about the map. However, from the demo, it seems as though Resident Evil isn't "returning to its roots" so much as becoming an entirely different game. The mechanics feel like a cross of Outlast and Amnesia, where the focus is on the first-person perspective and groteque visuals of the environment instead of the traditional survival horror that the series is known for. The problem with the switch to first-person is that it's an easy way to abuse cliches that currently run rampant in the horror genre. Some I noticed in the demo were the use of jumpscares and the poor flashlight in exceptionally dark areas to force a sense of fear due to lack of vision. It feels as though this installment will just be using various tropes right out of currently popular first-person horror games and just become another generic first-person horror game, full of poorly done jumpscares and loosely relating to the RE franchise.

The game has little to no feeling of being a Resident Evil installment outside of the title, and a blurry photo of a helicopter baring the Umbrella logo on the tail. [spoiler]While the basement creature has serious appeal and definitely looks like something out of the franchise[/spoiler], the rest of the game feels so disjointed from the franchise. I'm sure it's been said time and time again, but it just feels like RE7 is attempting to bank of the popularity of Outlast and PT, and instead of making a new IP out of it, they're slapping the Resident Evil title on it in hopes of winning over the shrinking population of RE fans that are willing to buy their games.

Feel free to try the demo and come to your own conclusions, but don't go into it expecting this to be Resident Evil "going back to its roots" because it isn't. This is just a PT/Outlast clone with the RE title. Hopefully they'll be giving a status update on the Resident Evil 2 Remake soon.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075267829', 'num_games_owned': 592, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1485143186}
review:
Capitão Óbvio na área: “Está é uma demonstração do game”. Serve para dar um gostinho do que reserva a você se optar por adquirir este título. Mas esta DEMO [u]não[/u] é uma parte presente no game final caso você pense que seja, pois alguns games oferecem sua demonstração como uma pequena parte do jogo para testar, mas nesse caso é uma experiência que serve para nos apresentar como estão as mecânicas do game, o novo estilo abordado e bem pouco – quase nada – do enredo em si. Um “[i]teaser[/i]” assim como o próprio título sugere. Mas não duvido que possamos encontrar algo relacionado a este teaser na versão final do game.

E até que ponto do enredo principal do game podemos ver nesta demonstração? Apenas um pouco do tema, da casa, dos personagens (alguns inimigos, para ser mais exato).. de resto, o enredo se mantém de forma misteriosa e [Capitão Óbvio, de novo..] muito provavelmente entenderemos melhor ao jogar o game oficial.

Em termos da mecânica/jogabilidade.. sim, foi o assunto que mais gerou polêmica desde seu anúncio. A franquia Resident Evil é, de longe, uma de minhas prediletas e como um jogador dos primeiros títulos, realmente, há de se gerar a dúvida de como o game vai se portar nessa nova empreitada e, de fato, é uma jogada arriscada da CAPCOM mudar bastante o estilo do game para tal forma. [b]Mas, ei... se vier a melhorar, por que não?![/b] Teve gente que não suportou a mudança do estilo do RE3 para o RE4 em diante... mas aprendeu a gostar – e eu fui um deles, embora ainda goste mais dos primeiros. Vamos abrir a mente, mesmo quem não acredita que essa visão em primeira pessoa seja a melhor escolha. E torcer para que a trama seja muito boa e tenha ótimas conexões com a história da franquia.

Agora, falando do que esta [i]DEMO[/i] nos reserva, você pode esperar por sustos (os famosos [i]jump scares[/i]), cenários fotorrealistas sombrios ricos em detalhes e sons que transmitem a sensação de ter sempre alguém/algo de olho em você. Vale destacar que esse [i]teaser[/i] estimula bastante a exploração e, também, aplica uma boa dose de terror psicológico. Além disso, encontramos armas, munição, inimigos, pequenos puzzles e alguns finais diferentes dependendo das ações que você tomar, e um segredo a ser desvendado (que eu precisei de guia na internet para poder completar). E tudo isso é o que esperamos ver, de forma mais bem trabalhada e desenvolvida, no game oficial.

Para quem curte muito a franquia, mas não aprovou o rumo que as características do game tomaram, vale muito a pena se esforçar e dar uma chance a esta nova forma de jogar Resident Evil. Para quem não se importa com nada disso, vai fundo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198013608934', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1485259358}
review:
Démo très convaincante.

Mais resident evil 7: begining hour, c'est vraiment quelque chose.

L'ambiance prend directement le joueur, on est instantanément immergé dans le jeu, le moindre détail est traité avec soin (graphismes, mouvements de la lampe torche, démarche du personnage, bruits ambiants). Le jeu, même si ce n'est qu'une démo, sait susciter l'interet du joueur.

L'horreur, l'effroi, l'anxiété sont omniprésent dans le jeu. C'est très bien distillé au long du niveau, ce n'est jamais insoutenable, même si on est toujours à cran. Le jeu a le mérite d'éviter les grosses ficelles sur-utilisées (comme le jumpscare dnas outlast). Si un mot peut qualifier cette démo, c'est le mot "soigné".

Alors est-ce bien un resident evil? C'est vrai que le jeu à des airs de project PT, et tranche completement avec les resident evil 4-5-6. On sort aussi du carcan "Leon Kennedy/Forces spéciales de Police/ Umbrella". Mais C'EST BIEN UN RESIDENT EVIL. 

La démo montre que CAPCOM à réussi à la fois à innover en mettant le jeu au niveau technique actuel (comme resident evil 4 en son temps), Donc le jeu adopte une nouvelle formule plus immersive et cinématographique. Tout en opérant dans le même temps un retour aux sources de la license au niveau gameplay. On revient dans les regles classiques du survival horror (déplacements pas bien rapides, balles distribuées au compte goutte, inventaire caractéristique, objets à combiner).

On a donc bien un nouveau resident evil qui promet d'être un jeu marquant si la démo relfète bien le produit fini.

La démo en elle même est super bien construite il y a plusieurs fins possibles, foncez.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970740493', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1488411554}
review:
The Resident Evil 7 teaser indicates that the franchise is returning to its survival horror roots, but the game is still very different than the old Resident Evil games.   

Many old Resident Evil elements have returned. The RE7 teaser encourages exploration and puzzle solving. Ammo is also scarce and you are provided with limited carrying space, although you won't have to worry about maxing out your carrying space in this demo. Evading your enemy is also a better strategy than fighting them head on, which brings back the suspense of enemy encounters.

The most noticeable change is the first person perspective. This view plays well, considering how small and cluttered the environments are. The first person view can be frightening because you can't see an enemy stalking you from behind. The game also uses FPS style controls, but they don't take away from the challenge. Some supernatural elements are included, which I didn't really like myself because the old Resident Evil games were more sci-fi in their approach. Of course, this is just a demo, so maybe the supernatural elements will be kept to a minimum in the full game. 

Despite the RE7 teaser not entirely following the formula of the original RE games, the RE7 teaser is still an enjoyable experience.

review:
Well my first impressions of this game described.

- First person view makes you feel like you are in the game itself.
- The game play is more then fine. 
- If you have a decent PC set-up, the graphics look awesome
- Some say it ain't scary... well u probably have no emotions, because i've almost shitted myself a couple of times.
- Don't stop after you fucked up the first time, neither the second time because there's much more to discover!

I think this is one of the few "horror" games that i really liked and can't wait till the full game comes out.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986773032', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1484977431}
review:
I liked the demo. It had the creepy atmosphere and ambiance of RE4, exploring the unfamiliar, and bullet sponges. 

I hope they return to the roots of FPS. An FPS with good level design and have enough health and ammo to survive without giving them out like candy. A level design where the enemies are not just waves and waves rushing at you. Even new DOOM is guilty of this. In Duke3d, enemies are spawned in the corner of the turn to surprise you. An FPS where exploration is rewarded. Modern FPS are linear and isn't much room for exploration. Puzzles in FPS have been missing as well. Duke3d had some platforming puzzles and keycards. It's nice to see that there are keys you have to find to proceed, reminiscent of the classic fps. 

I also hope the 'dummy finger' things are not in the game. Something that's so vauge that players won't figure out for themselves. Interacting objects is certain orders, pointing the finger in different/random directions; it's such a hassle. But I do admit, it makes very interesting discussions, as a completionist, I would want to experience it for myself.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081131344', 'num_games_owned': 34, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1509391681}
review:
Серия игр Resident Evil, была практический самой лучшей (конечно кроме гта( и кроме 6 части самой Resident Evil)) для меня. после 6 части я серьёзно начал подозревать что новая часть выйдет отвратительная как 6, но, я был приятно удивлён когда зашёл сюда. 

на самом деле вроде-бы нет ничего страшного (хрипы постукивания и Т.Д) но иногда может очень сильно напугать банальнное падение куклы, или смех в другой комнате. после этого ты пожалеешь что запустил игру.

я полностью не боюсь за продолжение серии Resident Evil. (хотя может капком опять нас обманули как было с 6 частью?) и полностью рекомендую пройти демо-версию этой шикарной серии.

спасибо что дочитали до сюда,удачи тебе, пока!

review: LA LECHE ¿PODRÍA SER GRAFICAMENTE MAS REALISTA? Creo que este juego ha tocado el techo de lo que gráficamente se puede hacer a día de hoy. Tengo una GTX 1070 y lo he puesto todo al máximo y va perfecto de fluidez, además los gráficos la atmosfera, la ambientación...... ¡¡JODER!! Es que es perfecto.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983004774', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1496264812}
review:
It's going to be a strange one... I love  First person view. I think it creates incredible immersion. I've always found 3rd person camera to be poorly implemented and creates frustration with wrong angle etc. 
The atmosphere is amazing in this demo when you play it  the first time. The house is believable and the attention to detail is quite amazing. There's however a massive flaw and this is a serious lag between the mouse movement and the screen. And i man massive... If you were to shoot or turn quickly it is just too slow. To the point you think you move underwater. It's more or less fine for puzzle solving end exploration but for the action is just unacceptable. Please fix it. It creates frustration and makes you feel really disconnected from what is going on the screen when the response to the input is so delayed. PLEASE FIX IT! EVEN ON THE MOST SENSITIVE SETTING ITS LIKE YOU ARE ON A RUBBER STRINGS.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085638436', 'num_games_owned': 277, 'num_reviews': 162, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1484316132}
review:
Recomendo, um baita jogo, mas definitivamente não percebi que estava jogando um Resident Evil. Antes que venha dando 'dislike' na análise, leia-a por completo primeiro.

O jogo neste estilo é mais imersivo e assustador mas ao mesmo tempo é linear ao extremo! 

O jogo todo segue um sistema de "triggers" onde você, por exemplo, ao pegar ou usar algum objeto,  um efeito vai surtir no cenário que antes não acontecia. O que para uns pode ser puzzles complicados, eu chamo de previsibilidade.

Outra coisa que não gostei foi dos acontecimentos paranormais. Como todos sabemos RE é uma franquia onde existe monstros mutantes e não fantasmas que desaparecem se você tentar segui-los!

É indiscutível que virou uma cópia de Outlast e do falecido Silent Hills, mas apesar de tudo isso, recomendo você jogá-lo para tirar suas próprias conclusões. Concordo também que a Capcom deveria ter criado uma nova franquia nesse estilo para não perder a essência de todos os outros REs passados.

author: {'steamid': '76561198258449547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1592162578}

author: {'steamid': '76561197986508684', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1485094162}
review:
Als Fan der Teile 1-3 & Code Veronica war ich zunächst etwas skeptisch was die neue Ego Perspektive betrifft.Zumindest diese Befürchtung wurde mir durch die Demo genommen.Sieht klasse aus und spielt sich geschmeidig.

Allerdings sind mir die Rätsel in der Demo doch etwas zu kryptisch, zumindest, wenn man es drauf anlegt die Münze zu bekommen.

Was man so liest, sollen die Rätsel im Spiel sich aber wieder stark an den ersten Teilen der Reihe orientieren.

Daher gebe ich in freudiger Erwartung auf das fertige Spiel 9/10 Punkten für die Demo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198037304837', 'num_games_owned': 611, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 454, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1486262259}
review:
[h1]My 5 seconds of gameplay![/h1]
I started up the game, and pressed play.
I woke up in a room, and i heard foot-steps coming from the door.
After relising i had to go out the door, i crouched over to it and proceded to open it.
Then i pressed the middle mouse button (because i didnt know how to turn off my flashlight) and my character put his hands in front of his face, i jumped in fear and quit the game.

[h1]10/10[/h1] would get shit scared of my own hands again!

review:
Demo结局达成2/3，气氛非常棒，综合了生化+寂静岭的元素。
对很多和主播一样从1开始的生化迷来说，本作虽然回归恐怖，但第一人称的视角却给人压力山大。相信正片也会让人毛骨悚然，更有寂静岭的味道。这叫我如何直播……

author: {'steamid': '76561198079114060', 'num_games_owned': 136, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1484352768}
review: oscuro, tenebroso, sorpresivo, y sumamente inmersivo, capcom se esforzó mucho en que la ambientación de esta demo sea de una excelente calidad, hasta la fecha de escrito este análisis, no sabemos si el juego será tan inmersivo  y por ende, aterrador. Agradezco que cambien el estilo de los últimos juegos de resident evil, no solo despojándose de las explosiones innecesarias y enfocando el juego al terror clásico que caracterizó a la franquicia, sino también tecnológicamente, el cambio de cámara, el motor gráfico, etc. La cantidad de jugo que se le puede sacar al demo, es algo que no se ve en los últimos años y nos muestra el cariño con el que se esta haciendo el juego, o también, una campaña agresiva de preventa. Solo falta esperar que el día 24 de este mes, salga finalmente y nos sorprendan gratamente, no creo ser el único fan de la saga, que sin desprestigiar nuevos personajes o trama, le encantaría ver algo más que guiños a los personajes que tanto queremos. Intento no dejarme llevar por el Hype ( Por decepciones con el número 6 ), pero todo indica que esta será una buena entrega y espero, no equivocarme.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020705409', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 189, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 219, 'last_played': 1485012125}
review:
Demo breve, pero que puedes rejugar ya que el orden de tus acciones, los objetos que utilices y las salas que visites darán como resultado un final u otro.
El cambio a la primera persona y la vuelta al terror y a la tensión son los mayores reclamos de éste nuevo Resident Evil, que por supuesto están presentes en ésta demo.
Destaca la ambientación y el sonido, que te sumergirán en un desagradable ambiente.
Personalmente no me atraía mucho ésta nueva entrega, pero después de probar la demo, le daré una oportunidad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091613010', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2244, 'last_played': 1486389630}
review:
Работа над Resident Evil 7 / Biohazard 7 Teaser: Beginning Hour настолько качественная, что надежда на полноценную игру как на лучший хоррор-сурвайвл за последнее десятилетие сияет все ярче и ярче.

 Восхищаешься графикой (господи, какие чудесные руки), гнетущей атмосферой и ощущению страха. Интерес демка вызывает с первых минут. Хочется сказать сразу, даже на относительно не молодом железе игра смотрится чудесно и стабильно выдаёт 35-45 fps. ([spoiler]Один мой знакомый запустил её с куска берёзовой коры, кто те люди, у кого она не запускается!?[/spoiler])
 Кто-то скажет :"Это плагит и пародия на многие современные хорроры!!!" . Вы - дол6ёб, мой уважаемый друг. Игра гораздо качественнее многих псевдо-хорроров, к примеру, outlast2. 

 Если вы решили опробовать демо-версию впервые, то скорее всего получите всего один вариант концовки и потратите в общей сложности где-то полчаса. За это время с легкостью проникнитесь духом и атмосферой страха новой части самого популярного сурвайвл-хоррора. После первого прохождения вряд ли у вас не возникнет вопрос, "а что если [spoiler]дёрнуть за рычаг с самого начала?"[/spoiler] И только после этой манипуляции демка начнётся по-настоящему. И тот, кто не пожалеет своего времени (и он действительно не пожалеет), исследует и изучит окружающий его мир, найдет очень много интересностей и вряд ли останется равнодушный к RE7. 
 Вопросы всплывают один за одним , и как только мы получаем ответы на одни из них, задаются новые,причем очень интересные, что действительно круто(тем более это демка), которые явно будут раскрыты в полноценной игре.

И как человек имеющий в демке одно из наибольших количество часов, с уверенностью могу сказать: если вы никогда не оставались в доме один на один с пьяным дедушкой, грозящим набить тебе тыкву ([spoiler]не считая чуть ли не насквозь прогнившего от бояры бича, которого, как качественного собутыльника, дед скрывает в подвале от всей семьи[/spoiler]) и хотите наконец-то сделать это, тогда,
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=877363131

Заслуженно, 10 дедуль из 10!

P.S пожалуйста, будьте друзьями и поставьте люкс этому обзор, чтобы он выбился в топ, его прочитал мой дедушка и был бы очень горд такими молодцами, как мы.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965489700', 'num_games_owned': 391, 'num_reviews': 249, 'playtime_forever': 59, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1488499676}
review: Me encanto el ambiente, estilo Outlast, Alan Wake y Layers of Fear. Me dá gusto que Capcom haya optado por cambiar un poco la saga de Resident Evil despues del fiasgo que sacaron en el 2016 (un shooter de porqueria con multiplayer). Biohazard 7 se gana un lugar en el genero de horror en primera persona, luce bien, se oye genial, a precio completo no lo recomiendo, yo optaria por comprar una llave en un sitio web que venda el juego más barato. La demo es gratis, la termine en 18 minutos pero el tiempo se puede extender si exploran la casa en profundidad, lo unico malo para mí experiencia fueron los clitches pero son juegos de horror, algunos me sorprendieron por que son brutales, pero no me senti satisfecho al final, por eso les aconsejo esperan a los analisis de los usuarios cuando terminen, lean opiniones, calidad no le falta, espero que sea largo, ofresca un poco más de libertad y nos asombre.

review:
Had a couple of issues with my Xbox 360 controller. The right stick in the game didn't work for some reason (it works in every other game)

Switched to Mouse and Keyboard and everything was fine. Not my preferred way of playing, but it was OK. I jumped in a few places and I am not the type of person to get easily scared.

Will certainly be picking up RE7.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093257608', 'num_games_owned': 565, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1484827402}
review:
Здравствуйте, сегодня я хотел бы вам рассказать о своих ощущений от демо-версии(тизера) Resident Evil 7 Beginning Hour.
Данная демо-версия выходила лишь на PS4, но потом появилась на ПК. Хороша ли демка? ДА!
В ней есть много секретов(если ютуб не смотреть), которые ты хочешь узнать; несколько концовок, которые отличаются друг от друга; жуткая атмосфера и многое другое. Демка не слишком долгая, но эмоций хватает на фразу: Shut up and give my money CAPCOM!!!. Именно из-за таких демок хочется брать игру. Именно из-за таких демок игровая индустрия может продвигаться вперёд. Эта демка лучший пример того, как разработчики относятся к своим фанатом и покупателям, ведь демку ОБНОВЛЯЛИ 3 РАЗА. ОБНОЛЯЛИ ДЕМКУ, где это видано, господа? Притом не баг-фиксы простые, а контент пилили. КОНТЕНТОМ ДЕМКУ ОБНОВЛЯЛИ!
Эта демка охрененна, как и демка МГС5,как и демка Outlast 2.
Это было моё собственное мнение, которое может не совпадать с вашим(полностью или частично), всем спасибо,всем удачи и пока.

author: {'steamid': '76561198158371218', 'num_games_owned': 243, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1589112990}

author: {'steamid': '76561198317946191', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1685029259}

author: {'steamid': '76561198046711907', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1484744429}
review:
I dont know what its suppsoed to be, but it doesnt feel like a RE at all, neither new nor original ones.

First, whats with whole mystical narrative ? I feel like im playing SH or EW rather than RE game. Maybe it will get better in full game, but to date i dont remember any RE game that had such outwordly vibe to it(aside of supersticions by locals, but that is another story entirely).
Second issue for me is game consistency. How to hell is player supposed to figure out how to get a fuse on first playthru ? Giving him a hint only AFTER he could possible get it, so its only achievable on second playthru feels extremely cheap. And 80% of demo is locked behind this completely obscure step. Am i to presume that in full game player will only be able to achieve good ending is he plays right tune on a piano, that is only available till chapter 4, with music shets for it found only in chapter 5 ? 
And dont even get me started on solving 5 murders sequence, that is completely random and sequences are not connected in any way. Player have to go to some completley random spots and do some completely random actions, that "solves" the murder(not really tho, it just gives some cryptic note that means nothing).
Inventory doesnt look particularly encouraging either. Hopefully its expandable RE4 style. But inventory controls are also fairly good.
Constant runnign back and forth for no apparent reason, combined with perpetual pixelhunting and  lack of any logic on why and when something is made availabe or is unlocked. Demo doesnt have multiple paths, it has one, that is then segmented and each segment have tiny dead end, as "true/good" ending encompases 99+% of content that is associated with other endings.
On the good side demo runs extremely well. Conrols also seem to be solid.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081728694', 'num_games_owned': 198, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1484662370}
review: This game is so much more unique and different than any other horror games I've ever seen. Unlike the generic horror games you've seen nowadays, this game lacks so many ways that modern game developers do to scare the players, take jumpscare for example. This game just fucks with your mind, not by visual, but by ambience and audio as well. By combining both audio, visual and gameplay together, it makes this game a masterpiece. When people play horror games, they are scared of when will the next jumpscare hit them, but not this game. After finishing this game, I've now known what the true feeling of horror is in a game, its not a temporary feeling that fades off after a jumpscare, its the feeling of fear of what you're about to see when you turn a corner. This game uses the three elements (audio, visual and gameplay) so well that the feeling of fear inside you builds up and doesn't stop. This game is like Babadook in modern horror cinema. It brings back what horror games should truly be and how it should be made. I wouldn't hestitate to get this game when it comes out, I am already so very satisfied with the demo alone

author: {'steamid': '76561198023496900', 'num_games_owned': 223, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1529033933}
review:
Played this on:

Intel Core i3 4010U @ 1.7GHz
Intel HD Graphics 4000
6GB RAM

1366x768 (resolution scaling 0.6)
Most settings low/off

Completely playable. 30-45 FPS in most areas. Rarely dropped below 30. Got up to 57 at one point. This is a very well-optimized game. People who fall a little short of the minimum requirements should be able to run this easily, and run it well at that. I was very impressed with the game's performance.

As for the demo itself, my first experience with it was on PS4 (only installed on my laptop out of curiosity) and it was a great one. The atmosphere was spot on and I felt genuine fear my first time playing, even before the final update. I can understand why people were quick to judge this game when the first iteration of the demo came out. There was very little to connect it to the Resident Evil series beyond a creepy atmosphere and its title. I had faith, however, and I was not disappointed. After the final update rolled out, there was really no question that this was going to be a Resident Evil game. I won't spoil it totally, but the demo includes elements that were core parts of the experience of the classic titles, and classic survival horror in general. The game gets compared to Outlast a lot, but I can say 100% that this 40 minute demo has deeper gameplay than the entirety of Outlast.

This is survival horror.

If you're on the fence about Resident Evil 7, you really owe it to yourself to give it a chance and play this demo. The 24th can't come soon enough.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075048082', 'num_games_owned': 46, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1484503010}
review:
Игру Resident Evil 7 (Demo) прошел на одном дыхании, причем не раз, и посмотрел несколько концовок. 
Минусов игры впринцепи не нашел, да и не стоит цепляться за них, ведь игра демо, и в полной разработчики все недочеты исправят. Единственно, что не хватает каких нибудь головоломок, подумать как открыть, а не тупо искать ключ от двери, и т д. 
Ну а плюсов просто уйма, графика на высшем уровне, правда за окнами, все таки стоит сделать какой то фон, к примеру тот же лес. Ну о физике игры тут не стоит говорить, ведь она тут не причем. Как " страшилка " игра годная, на протяжении всего времени находишься в каком то напряжении, постоянные звуки и шумы, но это все не назойливо и не надоедливо. Правда на пятое прохождение игры стало все равно, и страшного ничего не было. Значит игра по сути на пару раз, первый раз почувствовать всю атмосферу, наслодиться адреналином, а остальные разы чисто посмотреть концовки, что можно еще сделать.  
В полной версии конечно локацию расширят, впечатлений я думаю будет больше. 
В итоге могу сказать, любителям "хоррор" она очень понравится, но ожидать какие то мысленные ходы не стоит, ибо головоломки тут впринцепи отсутствуют. 
От Resident Evil 7 остался доволен!

author: {'steamid': '76561197991587416', 'num_games_owned': 365, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1484662851}
review:
This is NOT a Resident Evil game, and that's ok. Giving the newest Resident Evil a recommend is a bit tough because of this but there is a lot to unpack here, so let's take a look.

I first played Resident Evil when I was 8 years old, back in 1996, and that shit terrified me. But it was fun, and interesting. Figuring out puzzles, blasting zombies, following the semi-corny storyline and the terrible live action acting. It was a great experience, and I think that's what a lot of people long for, is that same experience. So, what we've been getting since then is a survival/shooter/puzzle game. As time goes on I got older and the games got less and less scary, or creepy, possibly because I was used to the games or just fatigued from Capcom following basically the same formula. But honestly, that's what I liked, the shooting zombies and solving puzzles, it was a bit mindless and in earlier titles, a bit scary.

So here it is, this game is not that! It's creepy, and even genuinely scary in some parts. Scary in a way that the old games were not. You feel helpless and trapped. The feel of this game is very good. I think Capcom did a great job developing the demo and making it feel like it's supposed to. It is not a very linear either, because things change based on what you do in what order, creating multiple different outcomes and scenarios. 

In older titles, I never felt trapped, or helpless like this. There would be parts that were like "oh this is bad," but nothing like I feel when I play this game. This game feels like texas chainsaw massacre. This game is first person, and plays a lot like Alien Isolation. The creatures in this game don't remind me of resident evil creatures, and the villains are more like movie villains. Stark differences in the previous RE titles and this. In past titles, you had safety in firepower, which is something I miss sorely in this game. 

Bottom line, if Alien Isolation is your thing, and you want to apply that formula to a texas chainsaw massacre story, then by all means, this game is for you. I recommend this game because it plays a lot like alien isolation, it's genuinely creepy, it has a great feel to it, the audio is excellent, the story so far is elusive and interesting and it's entirely different than the current RE titles.

I do NOT recommend it if you are looking to blast zombies or even if you think this is a resident evil game.

Things I really hated: If you mess up, you have to redo EVERYTHING over... incredibly annoying. Puzzles were a bit harder than expected.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978856141', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1484673527}
review:
Bon, après crash crash et recrash "pas assez de mémoire" alors que j'en ai encore plein de libre, j'ai fini par fermer firefox et tout ça a l'air de mieux se passer... après l'épisode Street Fighter V Capcom semble encore nous faire de la bonne petite daube...

Bref, pour ce qui est de la démo en elle même, l'ambiance est là la première fois qu'on la fait mais j'espère quand même que le jeu complet ne sera pas comme ça, trop bourré de script, si tu vas là avant d'avoir fait ça t'as tel item, si tu y vas après il n'y est plus mais tu as cette clé, sans parler du fait qu'on dirait un try hard and die mais une fois que t'as fait un passage une fois le suivant tu n'as plus aucun stress par rapport aux bruitages et effets qu'ils ont mis, et le passage interminable de la cassette vidéo à refaire à chaque fois si on veut tenter d'autres choses, sans parler du mur invisible pendant ce passage justement pour ne pas suivre le gars qui va "disparaitre", ...

Du coup en tant que fan des RE de la première heure j'ai d'abord eu (si on met les crash de côté) une super impression, puis le soufflet est retombé aussi sec !

author: {'steamid': '76561198248900124', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1484602600}
review:
This is the right direction for Resident Evil! I loved the demo. I havent been excited for a game in this series in a while. It is absolutely creepy as you prowl through this creaky old house trying to get your bearings. I thought the controls were easy to pick up so I don't know what a lot of other people were complaining about. I love that you just start going and everything isn't just laid out for you. I can't wait for the full version.

I recommend playing around with the graphics before you start playing. It was pretty laggy for me at first but I found a setup that worked great. The enviornment was very detailed and it was fun to do stuff like open the fridge.. eek. 

Hope y'all have fun! :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198052227260', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1484589132}
review:
Uff, das wird ein Pflichtkauf für mich! 
Sound, Grafik und die beklemmende Atmosphäre sind grandios und erinnern tatsächlich an gute und viele alte Resident Evil 1 Stunden mit ständig präsentem Spannungsbogen!

Müsst ihr unbedingt mal testen, wenn ihr RE1 genauso gemocht habt, wie ich ;-).
Die Egoperspektive stört mich überhaupt nicht. Sie macht das ganze Szenario nur noch beklemmender und ersetzt die fiesen statischen Kameraeinstellungen von früher sehr gut.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119629560', 'num_games_owned': 763, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1484186784}
review:
For those that end up playing 10 minutes and quitting because they get the bad ending [b](SPOILER)[/b] [spoiler] when you get punched out by that guy when you open the back door [/spoiler], I URGE you to not stop there. There is so much more to this demo.

Yes, it is very complicated (imo too complicated for a demo to get the good ending) but the mechanics are amazing.

There is so much more for you to find and explore, little jumpscares you may have missed, or a couple endings you haven't seen.

Please finish this demo, if you have to watch a walkthrough, fine. But I  would recommend that you watch the walkthrough in incriments and see if you can figure some things out for yourself. 

Best of luck playing this demo! I hope you love it as much as I did

Sí este demo es idéntico al juego original estamos ante una verdadera joya y tal vez ante la resurrección de la saga Resident Evil. Algo que vale la pena jugar y probar antes de comprar el juego para saber si es lo que estás buscando, recuerda que no es un juego de acción, es un survival horror.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142322653', 'num_games_owned': 202, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1484511882}
review:
Если честно ожидания перед игрой были страшнее, чем сама игра. Ну вот, сел играть: ужасающая записка, в которой с тобой сделают все и даже больше; банка/коробка под ногой со страшным звуком; шум за стеной, вызывающий уныние; скримеры отдельная тема( Уолтер Уайт, резко принимающий тебя в семью(да, это страшно));  лагающий фонарик - несомненный знак качества любого хоррора. 
Вывод: по тизеру не судят(плохо), конечно, но н***й там Уайт??

author: {'steamid': '76561198028870637', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1484488464}
review: Являясь поклонником серии, я, как и многие другие ждал перезапуска франшизы, особенно почувствовав эту необходимость после выхода шестой части, где на мой взгляд случился апофеоз экшн-механики 4-й части (персонаж мог одновременно бегать и стрелять, а все происходящее на экране напоминало боевик с Чаком Норрисом лол) В демо версии сразу стало ясно, что от нее отказались. Это снова будет медленный, интересный и по-настоящему хардкорный хоррор-экшн, пускай с видом от первого лица, но с присущей всем предыдущим частям атмосферностью и сюжетом, от которого будет сложно оторваться. Жду с нетерпением выхода данной иры ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198140813038', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1485094150}
review:
Frustratingly difficult to get the good ending but the atmosphere, the thoughtful puzzles and the spooks are exactly what i want from resident evil again! Thumbs up to capcom for releasing a demo when many games never have one these days and the fact that is quite alot of depth even for a demo. Also the performance was solid 60 fps on mostly high settings at 1440p with a GTX 970 so even better!

Cant wait for a full release

author: {'steamid': '76561198091101884', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1484597092}
review:
PS4のほうでもだいぶ遊びましたがせっかくなのでPC版もDLしてみました。

かつてサバイバルホラーとして私が虜になったバイオハザードシリーズも、
気がつけばただ敵がゾンビやクリーチャーなだけのTPSライクなゲームへと変貌を遂げ
そのジャンルに興味が無い私は10年以上バイオシリーズから遠ざかっていましたが
7体験版では久しぶりにかつてのようなホラーエンタテイメントを味わうことが出来ました。

製品版にも大いに期待しています。

author: {'steamid': '76561197993436635', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1485150426}
review:
Another game where if it weren't for a production company/dev house catering to the console market would have been an EPIC game... as it is, you have the same old, 5 year old crappy character animation and graphics that kowtow to old technology that monkeys with consoles have to use.  So, a game that should be awesome for a PC user looks like queer garbage that was ported from a console... again.  I'm so tired of paying for crap like that.  LOL at the consistent cameo that the "aim assistance" makes in every one of these ported games proving that no monkey should play an fps game with a controller - not if you aren't even required to aim accurately.  
So over it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006241897', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1484428842}
review:
Game is pretty dumb. The secret lever, after watching the video it can be pulled from a mile away, but before watching the video you have to be as close as possible, which gave me the impression it could not be used without watching the video first. Had to look up a walkthrough on the internet before I realized that the interact-distance changes, for no good reason.

Items also andomly disappear and appear out of thin air. Before watching the video the secret room contains the fuse, after watching the video the fuse is magically gone and replaced with a key. What for?

The basement similarly made no sense. On my way back up to the first floor the "bad guy" (the one who teleports around the house) suddenly blocked the door, and equally suddenly a monster appeared and attacked me. It killed me on both attempts to figure out what to do. Then I looked up that walkthrough again, and it seems that the bad guy after a little while stops blocking the door so that you can run away from the monster. What for? Did the bad guy suddenly need a smoke? Does he have extremely short attention span and forgot about me? It's just so stupid.

Sure the game has sort of cool atmosphere, but it's such a mess. Definely don't pick up the full game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198253615964', 'num_games_owned': 176, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1484379904}
review: 我见过的最用心的试玩，游戏素质没的说啊。又是生化危机突破性改革，买买买

author: {'steamid': '76561198148753115', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1485235232}
review:
+近年来画面最写实的日本游戏，与MGSV有得一拼。手部贴图尤其好评（有没有人和我一样，按着格挡键，然后看主角的手看了十分钟的）
+极佳的PC优化，实测960m中画质垂直同步稳定60帧。集显仍然可以有30帧。
+声效惊人，楼上，楼下，左边，右边，后面，各种各样的声音从四面八方发出，让你不得不停下来判断哪里是否有恐怖的东西等着你。
+创新的第一人称，生化危机系列第一次引入第一人称，效果出人意料的好。（喷第一人称的，你们只是第三人称玩家而已，配不上生化危机老玩家这个名头）
+爽快的近战攻击（斧子），虽然斧头除了打楼梯上的画，毫无卵用。打僵尸？分分钟教你做人。
+麻雀虽小，五脏俱全。demo版内容短小精悍，包含了一条主线，一个录像带支线，和一个隐藏谜题（肮脏的硬币），但是这个谜题实在有点无厘头，不看攻略很难打出来。
-射击手感如同一坨X，PC上尤其明显，用手柄好歹有个震动。枪声实在不敢恭维，如同放闷P一般难听。
这个demo说不上惊艳，至少玩完让人浮想联翩，预购的等不及了_(:з」∠)_
9.5/10，射击手感给个大大差评，其他必须高分。

author: {'steamid': '76561198198319593', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1482486159}
review:
Solo es un teaser, pero promete...

Probé este teaser hace ya unos cuantos dias, y lo que más me sorprendió fue la inmersión que hay en el juego en sí... es un pasada.

Por ahora, solamente e jugado al teaser y no a la versión completa que aún no está disponible, por lo que, solamente puedo valorar a grandes rasgos el juego.

Cuando comentas en foros despues de jugar a este teaser te das cuenta de que hay muchas ramificaciones, es decir, aunque el final del teaser sea el mismo, puedes recoger diferentes items, visitar diferentes partes de la casa... grandes posibilidades.

Le recomendaría este juego (versión completa a partir 24/01/17) a un amante del terror psicológico. Si, por lo contrario, no eres un amante de este tipo de juegos, o nunca los has probado, siempre puedes darle una oportunidad y jugar el teaser, es gratis.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020172988', 'num_games_owned': 843, 'num_reviews': 144, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1484323596}
review:
Resident Predesivil...

Como fan de la vieja escuela, no está mal tecnicamente. Es más terror que acción, pero es predecible a más no poder. Es generico como pelicula gringa de terror (no te asusta), ya sabes de antemano que "el amigo desechable" va a aparecer muerto, que el "viejo con cara de loco" al final te va a noquear y apareceras amarrado, etc.

Ojalá el juego completo no sea así, pero es un juego de terror sumamente generico.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016496819', 'num_games_owned': 624, 'num_reviews': 167, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1484320879}

author: {'steamid': '76561198002452055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 138, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1483999704}
review:
I když možná HC fanoušky nepotěší, že je hra tak trochu mimo RE universum a kromě absence klasických postav přichází ve zcela novém FPS pojetí, mě tohle demo celkem mile překvapilo.

Atmosféra je hutná, občas jsem si připadal jak při hraní survival klasik jako Silent Hill a RE, tekovej ten pocit kdy by člověk nejradši zůstal zavřenej v pokoji a nikam se nehnul :)
Demo má několik různých konců, podle toho jak hrajete.
Je patrné že série se snaží vrátit k původnímu pojetí survival horror adventury (prohledávání místností, sbírání a používání různých předmětů, kombinování, atd.), alespoň podle dema to na žádný bullet fest zatím nevypadá, což může být pozitivní zpráva pro ty, komu se RE serie od 5. dílu zdála moc akční.

Nejlepší představu si ale myslím udělá každý sám, někomu to sedne jak prdel na hrnec, někdo nad tím ohrne nos, ale zkusit si to může každý zdarma :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198145108948', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1484348747}
review:
Franchement fan de la licence, je ne m'attendais pas à un jeu comme celui là. Resident Evil nous a habitué avec RE4, RE5 et RE6 à un jeu d'action qui met l'horreur de coté... là c'est tout l'inverse ... et je peux vous dire que personellement comme le titre le dit, la PLS est totale .. l'ambiance de Resident Evil est bien présente, les graphismes sont beaux et les bruitages nous mettent vraiment dans le bain.
Je trouve que de revenir au coté horreur du jeu est une très bonne chose de la part de Capcom et pour ma part c'est très réussi ... 
Démo finie et jeu précommandé !! 
Hâte de me faire des grosses frayeurs le 24 janvier

review:
WOW is all I have to say

TL:DR : Download the demo and "try" it. It's going to set the mood for the entire game. 

The music 10/10 
The atmosphere 10/10 
The graphics 100/10 
The overall experience scaredthefuck out of me/10

Let me put this into perspective for you guys who say 
"this isn't resident evil"
"this looks stupid"
"not buying this" 
"not even giving it a chance"
"no RE characters?"
"nothing to do with the actual storyline"

You would be completely wrong. 

This game is going to be fucking fantastic! This is the only game besides DOOM I've pre ordered in my life , and look how well DOOM turned out to be? Best FPS of the year. 

Before DOOM was released , everyone judged it by a "multiplayer beta" and DOOM isn't built on MP , it's built on singleplayer and boy did it deliver. I was laughing my ass off watch everyone go back on their words and say how great it was.  

Now with that in mind , Resident Evil 7 doesn't have to "feel" like RE and it doesn't have to "look" like RE for you to enjoy it. 

This demo sets the mood for the entire game and it looks / feels absolutely terrifying.  I've never been actually scared by a video game in a long time , but this demo showed off what is to come. 

And it's going to be worth every gigabyte and penny.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053970967', 'num_games_owned': 2296, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1484221508}
review:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iVobaUrEUF8

Si bien esto tiene algunas referencias en cuanto a lo jugable con los Resident Evil antiguos, esto ya no es realmente un Resident Evil. Quizas nos falta poder adentrarnos al juego completo para conocer su historia, pero ahora mismo con la demo, no tiene que ver en nada con la franquicia.

Pero, eso no necesariamente lo hace un mal juego, de hecho es  muy bueno. Podría criticar un poco los gráficos, pero cuando recuerdo el caso de Outlast donde los buenos gráficos  le quitaban ese mistiscimo a la ambientacion, doy gracias de que este RE7 tenga este estilo. Es como una grabación de videocamara de esas que mostraban hace muchos años y realmente te daban cierto miedo.

Recomiendo jugar la demo, y espero con ansias el juego final.  Esto ya no es Resident Evil, pero  puede que sea algo mejor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198213335467', 'num_games_owned': 363, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1484214593}
review:
Очень интересная игра получается. Это не привычный Resident-шутер, и даже не первые части, где стрельбы было мало, а упор делался на хоррор-атмосферу. ИМХО, для меня это было довольно близко к Outlast и Silent hill, что дает игре несомненный плюс. Правда, действует только один раз, пока не успел узнать сюжета. При повторном прохождении, разумеется, эмоции уже не те)

Графика шикарная, практически фотореалистческая, правда, мало деталей, с которыми можно повзаимодействовать, что очень печально. И разные концовки... надеюсь, основная игра все-таки не будет завязана на том, что и в какой последовательности ты потрогал. А так - гуд, жду и куплю, когда выйдет.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070076555', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1585427547}
review: Eu jogo resident evil deis de criança, ja joguei o 1, o 4, o 5, o 6 e entre outros, e sinceramente eu acho que déram uma pequena (GRANDE) errada nesse resident evil 7, porque de todos os outros que eu ja joguei, nenhum tem nada a ver com o 7, por exemplo, o resident evil 7 é em primeira pessoa, a historia do resident evil 7 nao é uma continuaçao dos outros anteriores, e por enquanto nao vi zumbi nenhum, apenas o que parecem ser fantasmas ou algo assim (Igual o Outlast), mesmo o jogo parecendo outlast ele é um jogo bem legal, legendas em portugues, graficos bons, boa jogabilidade, e da uns sustos sim e um pouco de medo. Recomendo, Mas eu acho que ele provavelmente é uma copia de Outlast, mas pelo menos é uma copia bem feita kk, so que pra quem ta procurando resident evil aqui, nao ira encontrar, porque esse jogo nao tem nada a ver com resident evil.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047542978', 'num_games_owned': 141, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1486225109}
review: Игра мне очень понравилась, обязательно куплю, ни капли не пожалел о потраченном времени и месте на ЖД. Очень угнетающая атмосфера, хоть в процессе игры стандартных скримеров нет, только одна в катсцене. Первый раз я вообще не понял, что делать, бродил туда сюда в поисках чего-нибудь(не замтил болторез), пришлось искать выход в интернете, но нашел способ, который был предусмотрен как способ на второе прохождение, потом оказалось, что тот способ, который был предусмотрен на первое прохождение (плохая концовка) в корне отличается от других (истиная концовка и концовка с заражением). В общем тизер очень разнообразный, всем советую пройти хотя бы его, даже тем, кто всей душой ненавидит хорроры(я и сам ненавижу).7 заражённых из 5

review: このシリーズは初代とコードベロニカ、5しかやったことが無いにわかファンですらないが、体験版の時点では過去最大級に面白くない雰囲気が漂っている。ホラー映画やホラゲーはかなり好きな人間だと自負しているが、このゲームはスプラッタ要素を強めただけのホラーもどきじゃないのかと。ジャパニーズホラー要素は無さそうであるし、かといってびっくり系要素も薄葬であった。映像クオリティは格段に上がっているが、ただそれだけであり、劣化コピー品と言う印象しか残らない体験版と言うのが印象。

author: {'steamid': '76561198064716813', 'num_games_owned': 61, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1484751634}

author: {'steamid': '76561197968212484', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1484077919}
review:
It's nice to see them trying out a first person game, but this just feels cheap (in the sense of quick deaths and illogical actions) and poorly thought out. 
Items are hidden in obscure places, the monster in the demo can be delayed by only a specific way that I doubt anyone would think to do - because it's not something anyone would think to do in real life.
It just felt totally on rails and not in an enjoyable way. (missing) Fingers crossed the full game actually has a lot of replay value and multiple path selections, although I very much doubt it will as the story relies on everything being done a certain way. 

Very fittingly this reminded me of the original Resident Evil games - loads of locked doors, and seemingly endless trial and error.

I was especially annoyed by the total lack of logic in escaping: [spoiler]Why is it the obvious escape route leads to game over, yet the more complex and easier to stop escape leads to a win? It's total nonsense, and not even remotely rewarding or enjoyable.[/spoiler]


P.S. Well done on getting Walter White to play the main bad guy in this series. No half measures!

author: {'steamid': '76561198034813527', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1484244916}
review:
RE6 was terminal cancer, so RE7 is a huge improvement, if you take RE6 as threshold.
HOWEVER, this is not Resident Evil in any way, which is nothing bad imo.
It's more of a AAA Outlast / Amnesia, clone. Which, I hope, will turn out just as good as the both I just mentioned.

But I'm still very disappointed by the missing 21:9 support.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073804190', 'num_games_owned': 526, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 671, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 671, 'last_played': 1620183216}
review:
Очень крутой тизер однозначно советую поиграть. А теперь о будущем, игру не советую покупать за такую-то цену. Цена явна завышена, как и у большинства игр и поэтому отодвину я эту покупку года так на два не потому что у меня нет денег, а потому что в игровой индустрии большая конкуренция и я всегда смогу найти несколько игр за такую же цену и после того как я вернусь к этой игре она подешевеет в три раза.
А теперь об игре, а точнее о новом рождении. Хочу особенно выделить атмосферу, которая меня не покидала на протяжении нескольких часов которые я провел в игре. С графикой проблем нет, все красиво и четко.
А вот стержень игры является здесь проблемой, считаю загадки слишком заумными, да не спорю вы заделали отличные загадки, но как их разгадать если нет не каких подсказок, но вы мне скажете, что они на то и загадки чтобы давать подсказку только в тексте загадки, ну ладно проехали.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=839823947
Итог: классный тизер обязательно пройдите его для того что бы понять зайдет вам игра или нет.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999786343', 'num_games_owned': 3499, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1484072574}
review:
Okay, i think i have to write this review. Or more like my feelings regarding this new Resident Evil. Just for record, i've played every Resident Evil game, and still own the best of them (original trilogy for PSX, code veronica and X), and RE belongs to my collection of the best videogame series (with Tomb Raider, Silent Hill, Assassin's Creed, etc).

[u][b]TL;DR: We've already seen this teaser/demo. And i don't like it. This is not Resident Evil for me. But I am open-minded, and i will not trashtalk about game before playing. I am reviewing this demo. I had no RE feel from it. But i will play RE 7 as well, maybe it will change my opinion. I still recommend this demo. Why? It's free, and there are not enough demos for new games :) /TL;DR[/b][/u]

[b]So, first of all. RE VII Teaser: Beginning Hour. I don't like it. Why?[/b] Because i don't feel Resident Evil from it. Let me explain it deeper. P.T. - "demo" for Silent Hills. Was amazing, scary, beautiful, and got me exited for Silent Hills. But it was cancelled. And i was sad. But, capcom probably saw the hype it started. They took their opportunity and created this. For me, this is just worse copy of P.T., which has nothing to do with Resident Evil, but they wanted to restart the series, and this is probably the right marketing move. I can see it. And I am not saying that this game (RE VII) will be bad. I don't know it yet. I just don't like this demo. I will compare it to P.T. once more, because i think P.T. was better. Why? Because nobody knew what it was. Nobody knew what to do and how to finish it. Actually, there were some walkthroughs, but nothing specific. There were no hints in that game. And it was just scarier than this. No real clues. "Same" corridor in the house, again, and again, and again. Capcom made this worse copy of it. Why? Because of ghosts. Because of some Blair Witch stupid TV show. Because of some degenerated family (movie Wrong Turn). No zombies. Guns. It wasn't that scary, that shocky. I refused to play P.T., i actually turned that game off few times. This one? Hmm, atmosphere is nice, but i was able to finish it twice, without problem. Original Resident Evil? Hell, that was actually scary!

Okay, stop with comparing it to P.T. [b]I will now compare it to original Resident Evil[/b], because that has more value. Many people are saying, that this Teaser is "more Resident Evil than RE 4-6". I say: bullsh*t. Yeah, they changed RE from scary survival horror to action game, but at least it still had its plot and characters. I can't say RE 5 and 6 were great games, and definitely not horror games, but at least i could say they are RE. Yeah, we can argue what RE means.
Hmm, i read some discussions and stuff. People are arguing, that this (RE VII: Beginning Hour) is similar to original RE, because you have limited inventory (uhh, yeah, bcs RE is only game with this), it is scary (duh, lot of horror games are scary), there will be herbs (okay, that is actually true, but this one thing is not making RE from a random game), etc.

[h1]What is missing in this to be Resident Evil game?[/h1]
- great and scary soundtrack (like original trilogy had + code veronica), 
- umbrella + some famous faces from series (well, if it is really a restart of the series, i can understand new faces, but then i want umbrella, or at least some connections and stuff), 
- zombies (duh, obviously!), puzzles (like original trilogy had), 
- not small sh**ty old house with hillbilly family (but i don't know much about the game, so i can't really argue with this... i just... check the original RE game, big rich mansion with some hardcore puzzles and stuff, and it was just a cover for laboratory...and now? really this house from some 70s lowbudget horror movie? naah :/ )
- typewriters for saving (but it's hard to find those in house like in this teaser) + SAVE ROOMS!
- more RE feeling (like the original gave me - and don't say it's impossible, as the remaster was able to provide me that feeling again)
- 3rd person camera would be nice as an option (similar to RE 4, 5 and 6) - but that's just me, i don't like these 1st person things... i can understand that, PS just released PSVR, RE was always PS game, and now they can cooperate in that, but still, adding a 3rd person camera option would be nice
- some real nice story, plot twist, etc.
- if this is really a restart, and we are not going to see old faces again (ofc we will see them, remake of RE2 is coming), then i need plenty of easter eggs, references and stuff

[u]That's it. I don't like this Teaser, and i will probably don't like the game, if it will be the same. But i will buy it to see the story and to review it. Resident evil is one of my favourite franchises, so i have to. [b]Hmm, i don't like it, but still, i recomment it? Why? Because, why not :) It's free, and it's better than most of horrror games under 10 euros on Steam. Also, it is nice to have a demo in these days.[/b][/u] Yeah, we saw it on some expo, on E3 and everywhere else, so they had it ready for promo, but still. There are plenty games which you can try on E3 and others expo, but only if you are there. If you can't attend the expo, you are screwed and you can only watch videos on youtube. So yeah, i like this move, to release this as demo. 
PS: i will mention Tomb Raider as well :) I loved it, especially original 5 games. But after Underworld, there was restart (same as RE now). And i was afraid. It lost many old fans, gained many new fans. Tomb Raider (2013) was fun game, with not great story, but i enjoyed it. New Tomb Raider (RotTR - 2015/2016) was much better, but still not that great. That's why i am afraid of new RE. That's why i hope Konami will never touch Silent Hill again. Yes, Resident evil went down with quality. But restart :/ Well, we will see in 2-3 weeks :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198037194568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1484036850}
review:
***Enthält Spoiler***
Als Fan der ersten Stunde freut es mich das Capcom, so scheint es, sich die Wünsche der Fans zu Herzen genommen hat und wieder einen Resident Evil Teil auf den Markt bringt welcher der Serie, oder besser gesagt den ersten 3 Teilen gerecht wird. 
All jene die sich als Resident Evil Veteranen bezeichnen und sich nach den "ich hab die Hosen voll" Augenblicken sehnen wird endlich wieder etwas hervorragendes, sofern man das dem kurzen Teaser entnehmen kann, aufgetischt!
Ein paar wenige Kritikpunkte gibt es meinerseits dennoch!
Zum einen finde ich die Lightning Effekte nicht ausgewogen, sprich es gibt Räume die komplett schwarz sind und rein gar nichts zu erkennen ist. Ebenso bescheiden ist der Lichteffekt der Taschenlampe eures Begleiters wenn ihr die Vorgeschichte spielt. Ich hoffe das wird bis zum Release noch behoben oder zumindest in einem späteren Patch angeglichen, ansonsten bleibt nur die Helligkeit hochzudrehen.

Aber selbst mit den kleinen Mankos freue ich mich wieder auf Gänsehaut und Herzinfarkt!

author: {'steamid': '76561198047841627', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1483761050}
review:
Extremely well done. For me, it does something most (if not all) other horror games don't: it reminds me of my nightmares and manages to capture their vibe. Which is to say, it is grotesque, both realistic and stylized, vivid, repulsive, and bizarre. 

Also, props for releasing the demo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198163027074', 'num_games_owned': 297, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 49, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1651156228}
review:
Ingiocabile
Non so per quanto riguarda il gameplay, l'atmosfera o la storia, non sono tanto il mio gusto ma oggettivamente non posso cannarli
L'unico vero problema per me è che non si vede niente alla luminosità consigliata e alzandola al massimo vedo tutto viola, quindi o non vedi o vedi da schifo
Il problema è grave se pensate che metà del tempo l'ho passato tastando muro a tentoni a cercare porte senza avere feedback su dove stessi rivolto o a cercare un personaggio in un ambiente completamente buio
E l'altra metà nei menù ad aggiustare la luminosità(al massimo)

Probabilmente prenderò la versione completa solo se diventerò cieco, dato che l'esperienza visiva non ne risentirebbe

EDIT:

Dopo aver riprovato, pare il mio fosse un bug e mi sia fatto tutto il playthrough con la torcia disattivata
Perciò boh suppongo adesso sia consigliato visto che è gratis?

author: {'steamid': '76561198138324753', 'num_games_owned': 202, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1483969626}
review:
Besser als so manches Full-Game!
Bei dieser Demo bekommen Horrorfans alles, was sie wollen. Ein eindrucksvoll atmosphärischer Sound, eine Grafik die schon fast photorealistisch daherkommt und ein ständig beklemmendes Gefühl des Unwohlseins. Sollte Capcom diese
i-Tüpfelchen auch im vollen Game halten, dann sehe ich diesen Titel endlich aus dem RE-Langeweile-Sumpf emporsteigen und in einer Liga mit den ganz Grossen Horror-Games spielen. 
Sofern jetzt noch die VR-Umsetzung dafür sorgt, dass ich mich lieber in die virtuelle Welt begebe, statt mit Maus und Tastatur vor dem Monitor zu hocken, dann ist  Resident Evil 7 das erste Spiel, welches dies schafft und hat Potential sowohl zum neuen VR-Alphatier als auch zu meinem Horror-Top-Titel des Jahres 2017.

Voller Vorfreude beende ich die Demo mit Appetit auf mehr!

author: {'steamid': '76561198216248685', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1485013108}

author: {'steamid': '76561198134510807', 'num_games_owned': 252, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1483283638}
review:
坐等正式版发售！不要纠结第一人称视角了（我个人是很不喜欢第一人称视角的），但只要游戏能做的好。视角什么的不需要太纠结。（123代和456代，以及外传系列，不都做过视角上的变化么）顺便一提我个人最爱的永远是2代。

7代试玩无疑让我找到了初代版本的感觉，个人评分的话我给9/10分。希望正式版不要让我失望就好~

完美结局+肮脏的硬币获取简易流程：

1、暗门取保险丝。
2、地下室过道抽屉取笔记本。
3、三楼取地下室钥匙，阅读旁边文字（笑声1）。
4、地下室取阁楼钥匙，不要被丧尸伤到，避免感染。（注1）
5、三楼电视后面取赛璐璐假手。
6、一楼过道抽屉取假手指，组合后指认到下的柜子（尸体1）。
7、入口房间动物尸体上取钳子。
8、餐厅旁边过道柜子用钳子开柜门取录像带。
9、上三楼尽头靠近木头门（笑声2）。
10、地下室指认裹尸袋（尸体2）。
11、上二楼楼梯破坏照片（笑声3）。
12、镜子屋里指认木头门（尸体3）。
13、面对镜子猛回头（左摇杆+B键/PS4〇键）（笑声4）。
14、三楼指认蓝白电线（尸体4）。
15、看录像带找女鬼（看到楼梯上的女鬼，或者镜子对面屋子里的女鬼，其它位置不确定是否能触发笑声）。
16、地下室蹲下靠近娃娃（笑声5）。
17、餐厅锅里（尸体5）。
18、上三楼，进入白色带血手印的门（每出发一个笑声多一些手印），拿到硬币。
19、上梯子从阁楼窗户逃出，完成完美结局。

攻略流程根据B站UP主白沙演示视频整理：

http://www.bilibili.com/video/av7407837

原文地址：
http://www.cosersky.com/1704

author: {'steamid': '76561198264172315', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1483935156}
review:
[h1] 生化危机7DEMO游玩感受	[/h1]
[b] CNM的台灯，CNM的影子，CNM的录像，你以为这就能吓到我？！没门儿！[spoiler] 千万别开声音……呜呜……也别用手柄玩，最后……我要妈妈……我收到了惊吓……呜呜	[/spoiler]	[/b]
[i] 恐怖气氛营造的很好，解密要素也得到了很强的体现……不过没正统系列的人物？那这就不应该叫做正统续作了吧！如果有我艾达王小姐姐我就考虑买！当然要那时候我的心灵变得很强大了……	[/i]
[u]五个小时后更新	[/u]
[i] 据说这个DEMO与本体无关……	[/i]
[b] 话说这第一人称视角你让我还怎么快乐地玩我的艾达王老姐姐啊！！！
所以！我最终决定！不预购了！！！[/b]
[spoiler] 似乎能冠冕堂皇地掩盖我没钱的事实（手动滑稽）	[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198127868127', 'num_games_owned': 215, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 376, 'last_played': 1483816290}
review: Pra mim ficou meio lagado, não achei que está muito bem otimizado ainda, mas é a demo então vou pegar leve ^^ Eu simplesmente... AMEI a demo!!!!! Consegui o dirty coin, o que foi MUITO difícil, pois o puzzle é realmente tenso e se não cuidar dos detalhes, você simplesmente tem que começar tudo de novo... Pra fazer o True Ending é MUITO difícil e tem que jogar muitas vezes para pegar o jeito e não se ferir com aquela maldita criatura. Mas caso você tenha conseguido fazer o True Ending E pegar a moeda então meus parabéns cara, somos dois! Simplesmente super difícil, pra matar a criatura é preciso dar TODOS os tiros de todas as munições que encontramos na casa e ainda algumas machadadas no final.... Damn! Estou vendo que o jogo mesmo será extremamente complicado, vão voltar com o Survival Horror que os fãs tanto pediram, com puzzles e ambiente interativo para ser usado contra o inimigo, pois com armas não vamos conseguir matar ninguém! Precisaremos muito de estratégias, o que vai deixar o jogo super emocionante! Enfim, demo 9/10 aprovada! Tirei um ponto pela otimização, mas eu adorei, achei muito assustadora mesmo e estou super animada pro jogo em si!!! <3 Vem RE7!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198044520238', 'num_games_owned': 21, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1487644171}
review:
Ya Tengo actualizado los Drivers de La tarjeta de Video y no me arranca El Demo de Este Juego se Inicia el Juego pero Aparece en Modo de Ventana pasan los Logotipos  y a los pocos segundos un Cartel con lo siguiente
