author: {'steamid': '76561198094693416', 'num_games_owned': 240, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1484440986}
review:
Это было невероятно, я не уверен кто именно придумал идею демо версий перед полноценным релизом, или кто ее возродил, но тот чувак определенно попадет в рай без очереди.
По поводу самой демки, афигенная оптимизация, на моем ноуте (i7 2,4 и Geforce 740m) работает вообще без подттормаживаний при почти максимальной графе,и все это при почти кинематографичной графике...я рад что хоть кто то в наше время еще не забыл что игры следует оптимизировать перед продажей, спасибо вам.
Геймплейно же, аутласт мне непонравился, это был тупой раннер с примесью скримеров и голых задниц. Тут же...одно слово, вау, вау и еще раз вау. Ребята без лишних фоновых музык, без лишних жестов дали тебе прочувствовать настоящую жуть...поиграв я сразу предзаказал игру...побольше бы таких демо

Если же не верите и хотите сами посмотреть, вперед и с песней

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j2CQkDfGN-g

author: {'steamid': '76561198045767631', 'num_games_owned': 60, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 400, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 400, 'last_played': 1482588040}
review:
演示版在正式版发布前一个月PC端推出，玩了一下觉得很有意思。演示版主要是先给玩家体验一下生化危机7是怎么样的感觉，之
后再推出正式版本。

Resident Evil 7 / Biohazard 7 Teaser: Beginning Hour 翻译过来就是 生化危机7预告：起始时
레지던트 이블 7 / 바이오하자드 7 예고: 시작 시 

游戏中主要是解谜比较多，有仨个结局，半年之前PS4端好像还有接电话的结局，当然不好的结局基本都是被屋子里的大叔捶一顿，哈哈。这三个结局是坏结局，感染结局，完美结局，不知道官方以哪个结局为官方结局，应该是完美结局吧，男主角被人当疯子了。游戏有点像寂静岭，不同的选择不同的线路就会有不同的结局。游戏中整个环境场景玩起来也跟寂静岭风格很相像，给人一种寂静岭表里世界和寂静岭日式恐怖的感觉，尤其是突然在录像带房间门口出现的漫步大叔和录像带里头房子里一闪而过的女鬼，还有闪烁的台灯以及破烂掉皮的墙壁，挂满各种部位被丝条吊着的小草人房间等等。

另外游戏最终还可以拿脏币，用结合的一阳指在房间里特定的角落触发倒塌声，走到特定的物品和角落前触发少女诡异的傻笑声，一共要整五次，会有五个血色的手掌印出现在有逃生天窗的那个阁楼里的密室门上，肮脏的硬币就在这个密室里，血色手掌印是在倒塌声之后出现的，估计这是闹鬼现象，哈哈。游戏有自动存档，肮脏的硬币是用来转移继承到生化危机7正式版上，也不知道有什么用。

这里以我的经验对地下室的那个躺尸娃娃为什么蹲下靠近没有听到少女诡异傻笑声作个攻略解说。想要听到那逗逼的傻笑声需要看录像带，并且在录像带里要抓拍到女鬼，女鬼会出现在门外，小草人房间，通往阁楼的楼梯扶手边等等，只要抓拍到就行，女鬼出现的位置是随机的，而且出现的频率也是随机的，因此可能看一次录像带也没看得到，要多看几遍。第二，要在录像带里东摸摸西摸摸，饭桌上能打开的汤煲就去打开看一下，微波炉桌子下面背后的角落里有个撬物棒需要捡起来收着（我看过一个老外的脏币攻略视频，他把撬物棒捡起来后撬开了放有斧头的抽屉直接影响到男主角不需要到地下室拿撬物棒即可直接在打开的抽屉里拿斧头。这么做也行，但是我试过这样拿不了脏币，也有可能是我哪个步骤做错了，因此老外这样做也可以拿脏币，而我不可以。但我最后没有这样试过，也可以拿脏币。）等等。录像带一般看到女鬼和触碰下能按F的东西就按F即可，也很难说是要看几遍录像带，我第一次看了四五遍，第二次看了两遍，有的玩家看都不看就误打误撞拿到脏币了，这是很奇怪的地方。。。建议看录像带，可能拿到脏币更快更准些。

还有拿脏币的话，做攻略时房子里能拿的枪支弹药等东西能拿的都要拿，拿齐所有物品后可能才能最后拿到脏币。如果地下室的躺尸娃娃还没有傻笑声那可能是你漏了什么步骤，倒塌声和傻笑声是有固定触发顺序的，不可以打乱，但物品可以随意顺序拿。
还有，拿脏币不可以被地下室怪物打到受感染，否则可能拿不了脏币，必须是完美逃出天窗的结局。

总体来说这个演示版比较贴近寂静岭，不能说是逃生那样的风格，个人比较喜欢这样诡异风格的。最后希望生化危机7会好玩些！

이것은 재미있는 게임!

author: {'steamid': '76561198108172634', 'num_games_owned': 205, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1511356969}
review:
steam的Demo比PS4版晚出了半年，这回steam应该是Demo的终极版，PS4的老版本Demo中还多了一个电话方式的结局，电话方式结局根据触发的条件有两种台词作为结尾（虽然最后结果都是一样），随着更新，这个结局被删掉了
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------->       
       这是生化危机吗？是的，这就是生化危机。
       
       有限的物品栏，匮缺的道具资源，经典的道具合成系统，快速转身功能，红色的手枪子弹盒子无一不诉说着这就是生化危机
      
       你要尽可能的翻箱倒柜搜寻场景中那匮缺的资源以寻求保命和收集各种用于解密的道具然后在有限的场景里来回徘徊直到触发开启下一道离开这里的门的条件，开门的瞬间是充满未知和恐惧的，你不知道门后面到底有什么，有时候你明知那里是你之前逃出过的地方，但为了剧情需要你必须回去，面对僵尸，你手中的武器都是然并卵，基本只能起到拖延对方的作用，依靠走位尽可能的不和僵尸纠缠

       那些说这游戏已经不是生化而是模仿PT和逃生的人，试问你们真的懂生化危机吗？，他们具备以上特点？ 还是说你们如此批判生化7仅仅是因为视角改为fps ？ 那么试问1-3代老生化的上帝视角 到4代转变为 TPS的视角又算什么呢？ 你们的说法毫无说服力，在我看来，生化7 的本质 和 启示录系列，1-3代老生化系列是没有太多本质区别的，这才是真正的原汁原味的生化危机，而不是6代的欧美大片 tu tu tu    ，相信在正式版中，会出现更多的经典道具，比如各种类型用的子弹盒子，各种颜色的可合成草药.....

author: {'steamid': '76561198317016937', 'num_games_owned': 100, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1482671130}
review:
从ps4发布试玩一直等到现在才玩到pc版的demo 这个系列之前的几部我只了解过，对于我的小破破笔记本带的起来我是超开心的
从demo看第七部和之前几部的游戏模式完全不同 就我个人来说我还是很喜欢这种逃生模式的

RE Engine做出的画面简直太细腻了真实感爆棚。细节方面做的很好，无论是光影还是物品材质，这应该是我今年玩过画面最写实的游戏。
剧情方面个人觉得完美结局的达成太困难了，五个谜题的触发毫无线索，如果不是提前知晓还是很难达成的。（我看攻略花了近三个小时才拿到肮脏的硬币这让我觉得第一位打出完美结局的兄弟简直神人）
虽然官方之前有说demo不会在正式版中出现，如果正式版也是demo的游戏模式的话，我会开心到飞起的（笑）

author: {'steamid': '76561197999337717', 'num_games_owned': 551, 'num_reviews': 151, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1482542884}
review:
A pretty neato demo for sure. Atmosphere is great, multiple things to discover with lots of secrets, and the dialogue feels very natural as well. Overall a great little game that you can get through in about fifteen minutes or try to find everything over the course of an hour or so. Scares are sadly meh though, jump scares and shocks are predictable if you've played a horror game before, but still rides high enough with its atmosphere that it succeeds.

I'm actually pretty excited about what they're planning on doing with the full game. Though I hope they keep a consistent tone with this rather than make a really flashy demo and drop the ball in the full game. So I'm remaining cautiously optimistic.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989611402', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 80, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1482544397}
review:
I'm coming from a dozen playthroughs of RE 2 and 4, arguably the bread winners of classic and modern RE.

Although it felt slightly staged, it was still organically spooky and desperate.  The RE Engine is amazing; it feels fresh and disturbingly realistic.  

The locations in RE 5 and 6 seemed generic and unimportant, but this demo house is the real deal; very detailed and personal.  I'm not sure if they can maintain this sense of dread throughout the whole game, but if they do, they'll be setting the bar for modern horror games exceptionally high.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010933431', 'num_games_owned': 610, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1484202900}
review:
"WELCOME TO THE FAMILY SON"

The survival horror that started it all has brought back "survival" and "horror" in a familiar PT like gameplay while retaining the old school resident evil formula of limited ammo and scavenging. This is definitely a welcome breath of fresh air into the series after fan disappointment from RE5 and 6, although I'm sure "hardcore" fans will disagree. This demo is definitely a step in the right direction regardless of whether fans of the series will complain about it. Since this is just a demo, obviously things will be subjected to change but as of right now I am looking forward to RE7.

If you can, definitely run the game at the highest settings, you won't regret it.

Pros
-Great optimization, great controls.
-Looks pretty and Next Gen for a new generation of Resident Evil.
-Great atmosphere.
-Several endings.
-Secrets everywhere!
-Subtle jumpscares and "oh shit" moments.

Cons
-Some people had issues with launching the game (no problem here) but hopefully a patch will be released to address these issues.
-Some people will complain that this is a blantant copy of PT, but then again, the original Silent Hill (1999) was pretty much inspired by the original Resident Evil (1996)

author: {'steamid': '76561198175729795', 'num_games_owned': 190, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1482600483}
review:
A demo está fantástica. Não se precipite achando que vai encontrar algum personagem conhecido, porque não vai.

Depois de muito tempo repetindo a mesma fórmula, Resident Evil finalmente retorna às origens: terror.

A mudança para visão em primeira pessoa foi fantástica: você fica limitado ao que está à sua frente, e os efeitos de iluminação contribuem para a sensação de "território desconhecido". Da mesma forma, os efeitos sonoros são fantásticos e criam uma ambientação excepcional com tábuas rangendo, batidas e passos aumentado a tensão.

Os gráficos estão espetaculares, cheio de sombras e partículas cobrindo o cenário. Os movimentos dos personagens são realistas a física dos objetos corresponde muito bem à realidade.

A movimentação lembra jogos como Alien Isolation e Outlast e os controles funcionam bem tanto no controle quanto no teclado.

Minha única recomendação ao jogar é lembrar que a demo não entra na história principal de Resident Evil. Considere como um momento "paralelo" apenas para conhecer qual será o tom do jogo final.

Enfim, se Resident Evil 7 conseguir entregar o jogo completo tão bem quanto entregou a demo, com certeza será um dos melhores jogos de 2017!

Nota: 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198023493992', 'num_games_owned': 179, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1485664491}

Had to pause a few times and collect myself. It's exactly what I'm looking for in a Resident Evil.
It's about a 30 minute teaser BUT you could spend hours figuring out the extra stuff. There is some extremely well hidden stuff in here and there are multiple endings to this demo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026820528', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1482532931}
review: ¿Vuelve a los origenes? pero cuales......a mi me gusta este tipo de sistema como ya hicieron otras compañias en juegos como Outlast, por poner un ejemplo y creo que enfocar algo parecido al universo RE puede ser una buena idea, pero venderlo como que vuelve a los origenes...........será a los origenes de la historia por que si no...... Es que esta gente se creen que somos idiotas? o es que es una mala traducción de la publicidad que se vende en Japón? con esto aparte, Capcom sigue intentando estrujar la gallina de los huevos de oro, esta vez enfocado como en una peli de terror, obviando que este tipo de sistemas de juego te tiene que gustar, la gente de capcom ha cambiado los mata mata que han sido las ultimas entregas de la saga por este survival en primera persona que si mantiene una historia que te mantenga enganchado y unos doblajes, que no tiene pinta, pero esperemos mejor, puede ser un juego digno, por ahora le dejaremos en positivo, veremos como acaba esta historia

author: {'steamid': '76561198205177733', 'num_games_owned': 244, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 557, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1485043007}
review:
No me considero un fan de la saga RE, puesto que yo empece a jugarlo desde el 4 el cual nisiquiera acabe por que perdi mi progreso :v, dentro de los dos juegos siguientes refiriendome al 5 y 6,  no fueron de mi agrado puesto que en muchas ocasiones me llegaba a aburrir, vas a un lugar matas cosas, vas a otro matas otras cosas y bueno asi :v, pero con RE7 lo considere (sin haber visto el trailer de lanzamiento) por lo que decidi descargarme la demo, me termino gustando mucho puesto que a diferencia de RE5 Y RE6 te sientes realmente indefenso, por lo que esto te hace estar mas pegado a la pantalla y estar  explorando, Ademas  el juego esta muy bien optimizado, pero tampoco si tienes una mal PC no esperes que te lo pueda mover a 60 fps estables 

Pero sabemos que esto es una demo y algunas cosas pueden cambiar para bien o para mal, por lo que apartarlo o comprarlo antes de tiempo no se me hace una buena idea

author: {'steamid': '76561198037402265', 'num_games_owned': 380, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1482507366}
review:
Nem vagyok túlzottan a horror műfaj kedvelője, de úgy voltam vele, hogy egye-fene [i]cl_yoloka "1"[/i] kipróbálom a játék demo-ját.

Egyáltalán nem bántam meg, pozitívan csalódtam igaz, hogy nem vártam tőle túl sokat de ez a rövid félóra teljesen lekötött és végig fenntartotta az érdeklődésemet a játék iránt és eddig úgy néz ki, hogy nem csak a [b] már jól ismert #mindigbejönjumpscare-kel[/b] operál, ami már most jó jel, bár biztosra csak a megjelenés után mehetünk :)

Amin egy kicsit elcsodálkoztam azaz, hogy a [u]kipróbálható verzióban 3 különböző befejezést tudunk elérni, ami biztató a teljes játékra nézve.[/u]

[b]A grafika, az atmoszféra, a hangok minden ott van ahol lennie kell, a játék mechanikája is teljesen rendben van + még optimalizált is, ami nagyon nagy szó ha az elmúlt pár évet megnézzük játékok terén.[/b]

[h1]Welcome to the family, son.[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198131425312', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1488079536}
review:
[h1] Prepare-se para o retorno do 'Survival Horror' renovado [/h1]

A demo [u] Resident Evil 7 / Biohazard 7 Teaser: Beginning Hour [/u] nos traz a nova proposta da Capcom para a série. Depois da Biohazard ter perdido o seu caminho para um jogo de ação com história fraca a partir do RE4, a Capcom resolveu nos deliciar com uma reviravolta de 180° na saga, trazendo as características do estilo Terror Sobrevivência de volta. Neste Teaser já se percebe que comparado a uma parcela dos títulos da série, é diferente, mas parando para pensar um pouco, isso é Resident Evil!

Então, o que você vai provavelmente encontrar em Janeiro - e que aqui você já sente o gostinho:

- Terror e Sobrevivência, claro - de verdade dessa vez;
- A jornada do mistério e como o ambiente ajuda ou não a resolver-lós;
- Quebra-cabeças minha gente, e eu tô esperando aqueles que me faça sair do jogo e tentar outro dia;
- Muito susto!
- E Resident Evil com uma câmera diferente : )
ps. A otimização está ótima!!

Se chegou aqui e ainda está pensando em pegar ou testar, vá logo, ou chamo Wesker Matrix Badass.
Flw

author: {'steamid': '76561198005708172', 'num_games_owned': 675, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 85, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1484974078}
review: Capcom are going in the good direction with this one While its not RE4 or Classic Tank controle Resident evil. Its Seem like a Good First person Horror Game. The thing that  worries me is the lenght of the full game being a game that follows Outlast  and P.T gameplay because lets face it, they got inspiration from both of those games. i hope the game will last at least  10 hours  and not get boring by the end and the PC ports of the demo seems  really good and well optimized with a lot of options.  But as of right now i am not totally conviced of buying it at a full price.  I say give the demo a try and then make yourself your own opinion.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994830308', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1482349262}
review:
Um ótimo jogo, peguei a demo para testar e 99% do jogo estava perfeito, o único problema que achei, foi que sempre que eu tentava sair do jogo ele travava o meu windows 10 e eu tinha que reiniciar o computador. Quando ao gráfico achei fantástico, mesmo aproximando bem dos objetos não se via serrilhado nem bug, o único porém é que a pessoa que quiser jogar com tudo no máximo terá que ter um PC top, pois eu testei com a minha R7 370 4GB GAMING  e ela não deu conta. Entretanto quando vc muda para tudo no médio a diferença é tão pouco que mal da pra reparar e por ser um jogo bem escuro eu achei fantástico como foi feita a luminosidade do ambiente.

Eu não vou comprar por motivos financeiros, mas espero mais pra frente uma promoção e ai quem sabe né!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198315470983', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1482675295}
review:
First Resident Evil game since the original and Nemisis that made me scared to play the game waiting for the horrors to unfold.  While only a demo, it sets the scene for the full release coming in the new year.  Without spoiling too much, it definitely is a different direction to the previous games.  Highly recommend playing the demo to get a feel for this new direction of evil.  

Some may not like the approach Capcom is going with this latest installment but I feel its a breath of fresh air for a horror game.  Will be interesting to see if this is a stand alone game or if this will tie into the other 6 games.  Only time will tell...

review:
Кинцо на 10 минут. Не помнимаю, при чем слово "HOUR" в названии если реально от силы демки на 15 минут. И то если стоять и смотреть в холодильник, что там накидано.
Графика супер! Киноматографичность супер!
Но уже давно есть такой жанр на тытрубе- сняли кинцо 10 минут и перед тобой выбор из двух действий. Выбрал одно из них и сценарий дальше по выбору пошел.
P.S. На youtube такая игра бы была беслпатно и дешевле бы обошлась разработчикам )

review:
Не фанат серии, но тизер понравился. Могу только представить, каково было бы играть в Beginning Hour в VR шлеме, поскольку даже сидя перед обыкновенным монитором в темноте и надев наушники испытываешь гнетущее напряжение. Кроме того, пройдя демку, не стоит останавливаться на достигнутом - запустите её снова и наверняка найдёте много нового, вплоть до концовки.
P.S. Педиофобия - боязнь кукол, манекенов.

author: {'steamid': '76561198204444980', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1497066173}
review:
視点が一人称になり、全く新しいスタイルのバイオハザードといった感じです。
「生まれ変わったバイオ」とも取れるし、人によっては「名前を借りた別ゲー」という印象もあるかもしれないのでこの辺は賛否両論ありそうですが、ひとつのホラーゲームとして個人的にはとても楽しめました。
まず、PTやアウトラスト等の近年のホラー作品がもつ圧倒的なリアリティや恐怖感をかきたてる演出を、短い体験版の中にこれでもかと組み込んでいるのが好印象でした。めちゃくちゃ怖いです。
特筆すべきはそのグラフィックで、REエンジンという聞き慣れないエンジンだそうですが、壁や物の質感はもちろん舞っているホコリまでとにかく「リアルだ...」という感想しか出ませんでした。
そのわりに、R9 270X（GTX760相当）の古いグラボでも概ね高設定でしっかり60FPS出ていたので、最適化はしっかりされているみたいです。
限られたインベントリで取捨選択の必要があるアイテム管理の要素や、少ない弾数の管理なども古きよきバイオという感じがじていいですね。
謎解きの要素もありますが、バイオ4以降に慣れていたせいか自分には難易度が高いように感じられました。
トゥルーエンドまではなんとか行けたものの、製品版に引き継いで使えるアイテム「汚れたコイン」の入手はさっぱり分からなかったので攻略頼みでした。

以上のことからバイオ4～が好きな人よりは、それより昔の作品が好きな人に合っていると思います。
最近の主観視点系ホラーが好きな人にもぴったりですね。
製品版にとても期待できるクオリティの体験版でした。

author: {'steamid': '76561198124404446', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1482498537}
review:
In the lead up to E3, there were rumors that Resident Evil 7 would be shown and that it would return the series to its horror roots. Hearing that, I expected something like this...or this. To my surprise, I got something that seemed far more comparable to Hideo Kojima’s P.T. And while Resident Evil 7: Beginning Hour might have learned a few lessons from the ill fated Silent Hills demo, the more I played, the more I saw that Resident Evil 7 actually was channeling the tone and mood of the old games. It was simply doing it in a different way.

Let’s talk about one of the things that makes Resident Evil scary. The camera. Older Resident Evil games used prerendered background that deliberately and carefully composed your view of the action. Using these backgrounds, it was easy to hide enemies behind corner for jump scares or call attention to important environmental objects. In the original Resident Evil, this camera design was combined with two other things: tanks controls and tight corridors. Tank controls made it difficult to react to new threats by limiting mobility and the enclosed spaces of Spencer Mansion ensured the player would have difficulty avoiding foes.

For me, this is what made Resident Evil truly scary. It wasn’t the jump scares, although those dogs are still terrifying. It was the fact that I felt fragile. I didn’t feel in control. I felt compromised. This is what later titles in the series abandoned in favor of a more reactive, pulse pounding type of fear. In those games, areas were open but there were more enemies. The threat of an encroaching horde was terrifying but it wasn’t the same. So, how does, Resident Evil 7 head back to the original feeling? It uses a first person perspective.

A first person view does one thing really great for horror. It severely limits what you can and can’t see. In tight spaces, you can only really see what is in front of you. Beginning Hour uses this to great effect. Because the game takes place in a very limited and enclosed space, the first person view creates a highly claustrophobic feeling. Better, it recaptures that fear of not knowing what is being a corner. When we, as players, lack information, we tend to feel less comfortable. A first person view capitalizes on this by being very deliberate in what we can or can’t see.

In fact, the demo is very fond of implying action outside of our view. If you head upstairs, you can encounter some mannequins facing a wall but if you turn and place them out of your field of vision, those dummies turn to face you. Move around the corner and turn back, a new dummy has appeared. Now, the dummies aren’t actually turning or moving. Models are being switched or added to the world. But because all of this happens out of view, the implication of movement is enough. Beginning Hour uses this a lot in composing its scares. For instance, when heading into the basement to find your companion, you have to climb a ladder. While you’re on this ladder, the game prevents you from looking down or to the side. Which means that when you get to the bottom and turn around, the designers can be sure that most players are going to see exactly what they plan. In this case, your partner is Blair Witching against the wall. It’s manipulative but it shows that the designers understand the fundamental strengths of the first person view.

Additionally, like the original game, Beginning Hour stresses moving through spaces multiple times. This allows the game to make slight alterations to the environment. On one pass through the hallway, this lamp is fine. But when you head back, it begins to flicker. Because Beginning Hour asks that you navigate and then re-navigate space, it add these little affectations to make the game world seem a little bit wrong.

The demo actually relies on this a bit too much. While moments like the restricted movement on the ladder show an command of the first person view, we end up with something that’s scary but only once. Because the experience is curated so heavily, one playthrough gives you everything and you really begin to see the artifice when you repeat things. That moment when your partner disappears around the corner? The game doesn’t actually let you follow him. It adds an invisible wall. Beginning Hour has strong fundamentals but only manages its tone through a highly controlled experience.

Beginning Hour manages to achieve a type of horror but it doesn’t last. It’s sort of like a theme park ride. You’re caught on a track and while you can break off the rails if you try, the game very quickly finds a way to pull you back in. In some ways, I’m not sure if Beginning Hour’s designers gleaned the right lessons from P.T. That game was very deliberate as well, using the funneling nature of the house halls and the first person perspective to set up very deliberately composed moments.

Yet, P.T. and even the original Resident Evil games had just enough random factors to make things truly dreadful. In Resident Evil, it came down to things like ammo count or whether or not you burned a zombies body to prevent them from coming back as a Crimson Head. In P.T. there was the random possibility of ghost attacks. That lack of control is so terrifying that I didn’t even manage to record P.T. for longer than ten minutes. But Beginning Hour is so tightly organized and managed that while it manages to achieve the tone of the original games, I don’t quite know if it achieves the same level of dread.

What does the future hold for Resident Evil? It’s hard to say. Developers have stated that Beginning Hour isn’t representative of the final product. In some ways, that’s a relief. It means RE7 might find the final touches needed to be one of the best Resident evils ever.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037005340', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 117, 'last_played': 1485607071}
review:
I've played through a lot of horror games through the last couple of years, Amnesia, Outlast, Layer of Fear etc...
I will say that Resident Evil 7 is the only horror game that has creeped me out sincerely. 
The environment is scary, dynamic, detailed, and has you constantly checking every little area for loot and secrets.
The solution to every puzzle is unique, satisfying and causes you to analyse every word and item you've seen.
I played through each ending of this demo which took me about 2 hours. (With a little help from the internet)
If you are someone who was excited for PT then you can safely dry your tears with Resident Evil 7, as it offers a much similar atmosphere and intensity. Resident Evil 7 will have you looking behind yourself while you turn all your lights on.
The game ran and looked fantastic on medium/low setting for my GTX 770.
This is by far my most anticapated purchase of 2017.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069621143', 'num_games_owned': 173, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1482484010}

author: {'steamid': '76561198170101055', 'num_games_owned': 345, 'num_reviews': 146, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1482482065}
review:
What can I say about this game demo, not much. Its roughly around 20 minutes (that's if you choose to explore around the house a bit and find a few secrets) and definitely an intensive thriller. From start to finish this game had me on the edge of my seat and sometimes behind it. I'm not much into creepy horror games but this one definitely takes the cake, well this and Outlast of course. Like I said, it is a demo but there are a lot of secrets to be found. It doesn't involve any challenges rather than walking around and finding keys to open doors or hidden passage ways but its definitely worth the play. 

I recommend this to anyone of enjoys playing horror games and those Resident Evil fans

review: Not bad at all! I never liked the Resident Evil series from the start. I think I will enjoy this game and go back to the Resident Evil series and play it again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142227080', 'num_games_owned': 274, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1482463658}
review:
Eine Sehr Komplexe und krass gut gelungene Demo für Resident Evil 7.

[/spoiler] Mann fängt in einem Haus an , schlicht und gwöhnlich für Horrorspiele, und hat überall geräusche, Poltern und Klopfen. mann gelangt aus einem zimmer in die "küche" die schon sehr verrottet aussieht und wo ich lieber nicht essen würde (eigene meinung xDD). wenn man diese durchsucht und in den Kühlschrank guckt sieht mann schon Fleisch von maden zerfressen in schöne weinachtsbraten verteilt. genauso wies Oma halt immer macht ;). dannach gelangt mann in einen hintterraum wo Kühe Verroten und man ein item findet womit man weiter kommt. mehr spoiler ich euch nicht! :D [/spoiler]


Das Spiel hat eine Sehr Gelungene Grafik und Abwechselnde Lichteffektmomente. Ich empfehle Sehr die Lichteinstellungen etwas höher zu machen als dort beschrieben also " Nicht sichtbahr - kaum sichtbar " da man Munition und andere Items kaum sieht.

Die Texturen sind Schaurig schön ekelhaft toll und bieten ein tolles halbe stunde erlebniss. 

Wenn ihr fans von Horrorgames seit ist es ein Muss mindestens die Demo zu zocken. 

Ich finde das die Resident Evil macher sich echt ins Zeug gelegt Haben und würde dem spiel 8/10 punkten geben !!!

Pro : Gute Grafik - Gruseleffekte - Schöne Einführung - Gelungener Sound - Tutorial

Kontra : Spielzeit ( es dürfte ruhig mehr zu sehen sein 30 minuten sind mir leider zuwenig )

author: {'steamid': '76561197998703113', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1482465628}
review:
I have been an avid Resident Evil fan for over 19 years. And I am glad to say, Capcom has revived the series in the right direction.

Can't wait to play the full version of this game when it is out! Here's my summary for Resident Evil 7 demo.

Pros:
* The fear factor builds up slowly based on your impending doom
* Little to no cheap jump scares
* Atmospheric and Claustrophobic setting
* This game literally messes with your mind as the house you explore keeps chaning in as many creepy ways as possible

Cons:
* Can't punch boulders with Quick Time Events anymore!
* I want to play the full game now!

author: {'steamid': '76561198090617280', 'num_games_owned': 261, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1482905261}
review:
¡Al fin puedo analizar este demo! La espera valió al pena. >:D

Bueno, ¿por dónde empiezo? Empezaré criticando de lo que va la demo, luego las gráficas, la jugabilidad, y demás.

[h1]Objetivo de la demo[/h1]
Todos sabemos que el objetivo de una demo es mostrarnos cómo será el juego, y en el caso de éste no es la excepción.
Capcom había dicho que Beginning Hour no formaría parte del juego final, pero pienso que esto no será así por uno de los finales que este posee. Dejando de lado eso, aquí podremos ver los items, puzzles, enemigos, la exploración, la cinta de video, entre muchas otras que contendrá el juego. 

[h1]Gráficos y su optimización[/h1]
A pesar de que no tenga una Pc nivel Dios, pude correr el juego sin problemas por más que los Fps bajaran a medida cambiaba de habitación. El juego cuenta con una muy buena optimización, que tengas una Pc de la década de los '90 ya es otro tema. 
Los gráficos son fotorrealistas, brindándonos una calidad de la cual nos dejará maravillados hasta el más mínimo detalle.

[h1]Jugabilidad[/h1]
Sí, sí, sé que algunos están descontentos con este cambio, pero no todo debe permanecer igual.   
La saga Resident Evil sufrió cambios de cámara, eso ya deben de saberlo. Los clásicos comenzaron con la cámara Tercera Persona, plano completo; los modernos mantuvieron la Tercera Persona pero en plano medio. Ahora con la llegada la séptima entrega, esto significa que posiblemente la nueva trilogía contenga, de ahora en adelante, la Primera Persona.
Algunos de seguro dirán [i]"La saga Survivor y los Chronicles eran Primera Persona, ¿de eso no te quejas?"[/i] A ver, estos no los menciono porque no aportan en nada a la historia principal, por lo que son considerados Spin-Off, a estos se les perdona. (Aún no comprendo por qué consideran al primer Survivor canónico...)

Muchos andaban diciendo que el juego no tendría el modo de defendernos... Sinceramente, no sé de dónde sacaron tal cosa. Resident Evil siempre nos brindó esa mecánica. ¿Por qué no lo haría esta entrega?
Como sea, no es complicado acostumbrarse a los controles ni mucho menos a la cámara, con una pequeña excursión por la casa te vas familiarizando.

[h1]La cinta de video[/h1]
Como hemos podido ver, en una simple grabación podremos jugar con el espacio y tiempo, es decir; cambiar algunas cosas del pasado para que surtan efecto en el futuro. Un claro ejemplo fue cuando debemos agarrar el hacha; al despertar en la casa nos toparnos con un cajón cerrado de la cocina pidiendo que insertemos una llave, en la grabación podemos abrirlo tras conseguir la ganzúa y así poder conseguir el hacha en el tiempo presente. ¿Interesante, no? 

[h1]El regreso de los puzzles, items y exploración[/h1]
Los puzzles [b]explota cerebros[/b] y [b]roba tiempos[/b] regresan en este séptimo capítulo, algo que se esperaba con mucho cariño. ¡Pero eso no es todo! Las escases de munición también hace su presencia al igual que su inventario. Me hubiera gustado que añadiesen el baúl y las hierbas pero bueno, algo es algo, muchachos. 
¿Alguien extrañaba dar una de esas excursiones por las maravillas que brindaba Resident Evil? Pues, damas y caballeros, festejen porque... ¡ESTO VOLVERÁ! El camino que tendremos que recorrer ya no será lineal, sino que tendremos que explorar a fondo el juego para encontrar munición, cura y las llaves u objetos que nos abrirán un nuevo camino.

[h1]Enemigos[/h1]
Todos creímos que nos enfrentaríamos solamente a la familia Baker (¡Vamos! ¿Quién no pensó eso?), pero resulta que, no están solos. A lo largo del juego nos deberemos de pensar muy bien nuestra estrategia de ataque porque nos cruzaremos con unos infectados muy extraños y difíciles de matar. Un mal movimiento, despídete de tu vida.  

[h1]Finales[/h1]
Beginning Hour cuenta con tres finales. Uno verdadero y dos malos.
Para conseguirlos deberemos de realizar ciertas acciones que alteren el resultado para desbloquear uno de estos finales.

[h1]¿El dedo falso y el cuaderno blanco tienen validez?[/h1]
La respuesta: Sí. Ambos objetos están conectados con el poema que hallaremos en el ático. 
Una vez que conseguimos ambas cosas, deberemos de dirigirnos al áticos, leer el poema y oiremos la risa de una niña, y con ello, el cuaderno escrito con una de las pistas de una de las cinco víctimas, aquí deberemos de buscarlas, señalar el sitio donde fallecieron el dedo falso hasta que la visión de la cámara se distorsione un poco y escuchar el sonido de sus muertes e ir a buscar un sitio relacionado a estas para conseguir la siguiente risa y así hasta completar las cinco víctimas. 
Les diría cómo resolver este entretenido puzzle pero perdería su gracia.  

[h1]La atmósfera[/h1]
Se nota mucho esa tensión de espanto a lo desconocido. Lo que más me agrado de esto fue que no comienza en la noche como la mayoría de las películas o juegos de terror, sino en la luz del día. Capcom sí que sabe cómo provocar miedo sin esa necesidad de que el ambiente deba transcurrir a la luz de la luna acompañado del crudo invierno. 

[h1]Conclusión[/h1]
Beginning Hour es una muy buena demo, demasiado entretenida con una duración de 2 horas o más si quieres seguir explorando. 
A pesar de que muchos no consideren esta entrega como un Resident Evil (yo soy una de ellas, pero no le ando tirando puros comentarios negativos), promete mucho de lo que los verdaderos fans suplicaban desde hace varios años. El regreso del Survival Horror regresa tal y como Capcom estaba prometiendo (muchos no les creímos después de lo que hicieron con la sexta entrega).  
[u]Mi opinión personal[/u]: Como juego de terror es una maravilla, pero no logro verlo como un Resident Evil.  

[h1]Resultado Final:[/h1] 8.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198003262914', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1482435536}
review:
Aussi court que bon, et il est vraiment très court, ce teaser met diablement l'eau à la bouche.

Je ne sais pas si il est représentatif de ce que sera le jeu dans sa globalité, mais si tel est le cas, on pourra dire que Capcom a donné un sacré tournant à sa série.

On retrouvera avec délectation l'ambiance oppressante et la sensation d'un danger omniprésent qui faisait la force de cette saga, et exit l'action outrancière amorcée par le 4ème volet, et qui a flingué cette licence jusqu'à en accoucher de bêtes TPS insipides loins derrière la concurrence.

Bref, un retour aux sources qui redonne ses lettres de noblesse à ces 2 initiales, R.E, qui étaient la définition même du "Survival Horror".

Mais bien plus que cela, et emboîtant le pas aux productions tels que Penumbra, SOMA, Outlast ou encore Alien Isolation, la vue FPS (enfin !) et l'extrême vulnérabilité du joueur pousse le côté Survival dans ses derniers retranchements.

Ajouter à cela une ambiance glauque au possible (digne d'un Massacre à la tronçonneuse ou d'un House of 1000 Corpses), des textures de grandes qualités, une gestion des lumières impeccable et une optimisation au poil (en espérant que ce n'est pas un effort réservé à ce teaser), et vous obtenez ce qui pourrait être le futur étalon du genre.

Merci Capcom pour ces quelques minutes de pur bonheur et croisons les doigts pour que le reste soit du même accabit.

En espérant aussi qu'ils arrivent à trouver un juste équilibre entre narration et jeu et qu'on ne soit pas avant tout un spectateur baladé d'un script à l'autre comme c'est malheureusement le cas des jeux cités plus haut.

Edit : Pour les puristes de l'immersion, il est possible de virer le HUD, la mire et toutes les aides.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082839779', 'num_games_owned': 92, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1482402914}
review:
Už po prvních zvěstech o hře , se mi dostalo překvapení v podobě hraní z pohledy prví osoby , což je pro Resident Evil sérii dost neobvyklé i když už tu něco podobného bylo třeba v Resident Evil Survivor, Survivor 2 Code: Veronica a Dead Aim a taky Umbrella a Darkside Chronicles  a nebyl jsem si uplně jistý jestli je to správný krok. Po odehrání celého dema ( i všech variant co se konce týká)  si začínám být jistej , že je to určitě dobrý krok. Inspirace Outlastem je znát , ale to není nic co by hře škodilo. Vypadá to , že i absence totálního maskarování všeho pomocí zbraní nebude taková hrůza a upřímě představa tichého postupu hrou , a pozorného naslouchání , jestli se za váma někde nekrade nějakej zloprdelník mě dost láká .Hratelnosti to nijak neubírá a navíc to dopomáhá atmosféře , které se vrací k hororovým kořenům , což je další zajímavá změna. Když už bych měl zminovat změny , určitě stojí za řeč flash back sekvence , kterou nám dali vývojáři ochutnat už v demu a která by mohla oživit gameplay. 
Nejsem fanboy Resident Evil série , ale odehrál jsem všechny díly a zatím to vypadá , že i nový díl , pokud si udrží tu atmosféru kterou nám nabídlo demo , rád zahraju taky.

review: После пройденной демо-версии, сложились только положительные мнения, а всё, из-за некой недосказанности (что за призрак, монстр в подвале, дед с его семьёй, «пять гостей» и грязная монета)? author: {'steamid': '76561198073628984', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1482434540}
review:
Performance:

I had no problems running the game (1080p), no crashes or freezes. I used settings that I knew would acheive a smooth 60fps, but haven't maxed out everything to see how the game runs at higher settings.

The Demo:

I found it difficult to call this a Resident Evil game after playing all the others in third person. There were no zombies - I acheived the 'bad ending', so if a 'good ending' is possible then there might be at least one? I don't know. That's not to say this is a bad demo, because that'd be far from the truth. This demo, although short, is great! The sound, look and atmosphere all come together to create a tense and gripping experience. The controls that we are able to use felt pretty good (bearing in mind we can't use all controls such as attack/shoot), although I found movement a bit slow at first which I got used to quickly.

There's some nice little things that immerse the player and makes you feel that you're not just a 'moving camera' like in other games such as the hand on the wall/door when you walk up to it.

There's not a whole lot I can say negative about the demo from my experience, although i'm sure there'll be some when the full game is released and are able to go more areas/do more activities/actions.

I would definately recomment playin this demo - even if you end up not liking it, it's free!

My specs:

--1080p--
i5-4670k (boosted to 4.2ghz)
MSI 1070 Armor (8GB)
16GB Ram
installed on SSD

Happy Gaming.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089095429', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1483162414}
review:
Bueno,  quiero comenzar diciendo que los RE que he jugado han sido el 2 en N64, el 4 y PS2 y el 5 en PC.
En primer lugar, para los que se quejan diciendo que es un cambio muy brusco, mierda, maduren.
Así mismo fue el paso del RE3 al R4, y para MUCHOS fans de la saga el 4 es una preciosidad, una maravilla.

El cambio de tercera a primera persona hace que podamos ver de una forma mucho más detallada los escenarios, metiendonos mucho más en los personas, además, estamos en la era de la primera persona, lo que se quiere conseguir en el 95% de los juegos de hoy en día es realismo.

Me parece una propuesta interesante, es una demo buena, me he dado cuenta que hay gente con menos de media hora de gameplay, no se si lo saben pero HAY 3 FINALES, EL FINAL DE LA PUERTA PRINCIPAL ES EL MÁS BÁSICO. Si investigan pueden encontrar cosas que cambian en el juego, algo que está genial ya que te obliga a investigar, la exploración es un factor que hace el juego mucho más interesante.

De la trama princiapl no se puede decir mucho, es una demo. Sabemos que somos camarógrafos, el productor muere asesinado por el "anfritión" de la casa  y el presentador no se sabe sigue vivo. Es interesante.

Tiene pinta de que eso de los cassettes de grabación serán como "recuerdos" jugables, a mi me gusta.
Además que se implementó mucho el suspenso y el terror de una forma natural, los juegos de terror tienen muy buena recibida actualmente, y mucho más en una demo.

En gráficos, 10/10, muy realístico, o por lo menos lo suficiente, el enfoque en los personas es genial.

Le tengo confianza al juego, no tanto como para reservarlo supongo, solo hay que esperar. DEMO: 9.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198209354020', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1508605102}
review: RE7 is a departure of what the franchise has been presenting us with so far. It has a feel of the original Alone in the Dark, Myst, and X-Files, Home episode. A rather strange combination, but it hit me right as soon as I started to explore the environment. This short intro gives you a glimpse of what the game could be, but it still leaves me wondering how the developers will unfold the storyline and continue keeping the player in a continuous state of paranoia. So far, I am still on-board with getting the game during the launch in hopes that the VR version will allow me to dust off my Oculus Rift and finally put it to a good use.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118127979', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1485284515}
review: После того, как затёр до дыр четвёртую часть RE, я просто забил на серию. Ладно, не забил, я всё же насладился переизданием первой и нулевой частей. Обе Revelations были тоже довольно неплохими. Однако пятая с шестой оказались колоссальным шлаком и ничто не предвещало...однако! Демка седьмой вышла просто шикарной.. Очень обнадёживает новый курс, взятый Capcom. Очень. Одназначно куплю полную версию.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010943475', 'num_games_owned': 721, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1482684508}
review:
L'unico modo per resuscitare Resident Evil, una serie che vive del proprio passato, visto i recenti flop come RE5 ed RE6 (giusto per citare solamente la saga principale), è non provare ad essere Resident Evil. E sembrerebbe proprio che questa sia la strada giusta da prendere.

Visuale in prima persona piuttosto che in terza, che strizza tanto l'occhio all'arrivo del visore VR per PS4, e che sicuramente darà una bella spinta per quanto riguarda l'atmosfera a tutti coloro che avranno il piacere di sfruttare la realtà virtuale.

Atmosfera ben fatta, almeno in questo teaser: sensazione di paura e di curiosità al tempo stesso. Ambientazione più da Silent Hill, piuttosto che da Resident Evil.

Comparto grafico e sonoro ottimi.

review: Being a die hard fan of Resident Evil series I must say there is not a lot of action in the whole demo which should not be the case. In resident evil 1 2 3 4 and so on you get to see your first zombie in first few minutes of the game and you are either running away from it or shooing your way out. In the whole demo you can not kill anything. I have seen some online videos, this guy apparently will survive 3 shots to the head and if trying to find the next cutscene is all that this game is then i must say that i will only be buying it years from when it is maybe available for a dollar at steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106122985', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1483981811}
review:
Oyunun grafiklerini en yükseğe aldım ve oyuna girdim, çok iyi çalıştı derken oyunda elimiz bağlı ve yanımızdaki kişi ellerimizdeki ipi keserken oyun çalışmayı durdurdu hatası verdi.. Uzun lafın kısası olumlu ve olumsuz yorumlara bakaraktan ve oyundaki bu aynı yerde çökme hatası yüzünden şimdilik önermiyorum ama yamadan sonra incelememi düzenleyeceğim.

Edit: Demo versiyonu için patch çıktı ve sonunda oyunu sorunsuz bir şekilde oynuyorum. Size şunu söyleyebilirim, oyun her ne kadar Resident Evil'a benzemese de gerçekten bu sefer olmuş ama korku ve tür hakkında olmuş. Keşke zombili olsaydı ve kült o özlediğimiz Resident Evil tarzı olsaydı tadından yenmezdi ama bu sefer oyun olmuş gibi geldi bana. Oyunda tabanca buldum ve kullandım gerçekten beğendim.

review:
Awesome "interactive teaser", the best way to make your opinion about a game before the release... Now I can certify i'm going to pull my credit card outta my wallet and spend my money. Great job, graphics looks absolutely gorgeous, the atmosphere is terrific, the level-deisgn is incredible, the gameplay is quite good, the mystery is captivating (even for the little tiny moment I played) and the game seems to be very well optimized since I played it on a NON-PLUGGED laptop with every options on ULTRA in a 1080p resolution with a constant fluidity...
Long story short ; horror games are getting way too scary these days...

author: {'steamid': '76561198250196266', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 520, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1517732764}
review:
Да, многие подвергли игру критике, но это лучшее, что происходило с серией за последние 8 лет. Демка дает нам отличную возможность узнать, чего нам стоит ждать от игры. 
Плюсы:
+ атмосфера хоррора (вид от первого лица как нельзя кстати под это дело отлично заходит.)
+ вполне свободный геймплей (взависимости от действий игрока, можно получить несколько концовок.)
+ загадки, секреты (привет от "P.T")
+ внимание к деталям, коих очень много.
Минусы: 
- отсутвие записей/документов которые бы хоть как-то проливали свет на происходящее (их наличие свойственно для первых частей серии. Там, где от игрока не требовалось быстрого прождения кое было в последних частях)). Серьезный промах. У игры должен быть лор. 
- масштаб происходящего (может когда покажут игру будет виднее, но пока демо и геймлей 3-ей главы, это все что мы имеем.) Надеюсь все не ограничится этой "семьей", или же их роль раскроется более широко, по мере прохождения игры.

В принципе самое важное сказал, мелочится не буду. Для любитей хорроров обязательна к ознакомлению. Такого мы еще не видели. 
Так же хотел бы обратиться к той аудитории, которая "разочарована" новой игрой (и это еще мягко сказано). Просто дайте игре шанс. Закройте глаза на все выделенные вами недостатки. Есть много отличных примеров где эксперименты буквально возрождали серию. На игру возложены большие надежды. 

Всего приятного.)

review:
Dalla demo si percepisce la qualità del titolo , riesce ad incutere ansia e paura ma al tempo stesso incuriosice ; come gioco horror in prima persona è assolutamente approvato.
Sembrerebbe tutto molto bello , però non aspettatevi un Resident Evil , perchè di resident evil in questa demo non se ne vede , ci sono accenni ma niente di più...
Grafica carina , atmosfera  ben fatta , audio buono , ripeto promettente come gioco horror ma se siete Fan puritsti dei primi tre capitoli della saga statene alla larga fidatevi , potreste rimanerne delusi , al massimo acquistate il gioco dopo  il lancio e dopo aver visto qualche gameplay .

Voto demo :  7

Voto dal punto di vista RE : 4

author: {'steamid': '76561198010969903', 'num_games_owned': 1414, 'num_reviews': 174, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1482413146}
review: на резидент похоже слабо, скорее смесь аутласта с сайлентхиллом, однако в целом демка хороша в плане постановки, графена и неочевидности решения вопроса. хотя не думаю что мне по душе такое продолжение именно резидента, с уклоном в хоррор про душевнобольных. может быть продумают какую то предысторию, в результате которой выживание в условиях "результатов неправомерного использования биологического оружия" скатилось к шароебенью по дому и тыканью куда попало рукой от куклы под ехидный детский смех. к тому же в игре встретился всего лишь 1(один!) монстр одаленно напоминающий боо из прошлой части и мельком показали кого то похожего на зомби. лучше бы запилили отдельную франшизу а не мучали рез, но подождем, поглядим.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162220578', 'num_games_owned': 380, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1482409089}
review:
Bueno, ya jugué la demo, y he de decir que me ha gustado bastante, realmente ya la tenía vista, ya sabía como iba a cabar, pero aun asi el jodido juego me puso en tensión y me pego unos 2 sustos, tiene una atmosfera (al menos dentro de la casa) bastante buena, aun que si hablamos de la trama tampoco es que explique mucho, no hay presentación practicamente, por lo que no puedo tomarmelo en serio... quizás el mejor papel que ha tenido el juego son los sonidos, es lo que mas me ha puesto nervioso y lo que ha echo que tenga que ir caminando y girando con cuidado para cualquier lado, se me ha hecho corto, sí, pero para el juego final solo quisierá que no pasarán ninguna de estas 2 cosas:

1: que no abuses con los jumpscare (o como se diga) vamos, que ya tiene buena atmosfera, no hace falta meter sustos todo el rato

y 2: que la historia sea larga, para que valgan la pena esos 60€... aun que conociendo la industría de hoy en día... y a capcom... en fin, feliz navidad.





NOTA: 6.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198000860784', 'num_games_owned': 1048, 'num_reviews': 188, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1494318630}
review:
Resident Evil 7 - Demo

W wersji Demo lądujęmy w domu,budzimy się na podłodze i szukamy wyjścia z koszmarnego domu.

Ogólnie kilka minut można już zobaczyć z czym będziemy mieli do czynienia,czyli powrót do korzeni będzie więcej straszenia a mniej strzelania tak można z tego wywnioskować. 

Nowy silnik graficzny w którym widać potencjał gry lecz fatalna optymalizacja i spadki FPS sprawiają problemy techniczne,ale do premiery jeszcze daleko myślę że to naprawią. 

+
Grafika
Horror

-
Optymalizacja
Spadki FPS

author: {'steamid': '76561198066455177', 'num_games_owned': 308, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1482246348}
review:
I had high hopes for this game and it didn't disappoint.It feels like a RE game,puzzles,spooky atmosphere.
The sounds and the graphics are amazing.I was skeptic about the PC port,but it's well optimized,runs 60fps at max settings 1080p,so kudos to Capcom for taking care of the PC version.I'm hoping that the final product will be just as good as the teaser.The new first person view is awesome,I like it,gives the game a much more realistic feel.The demo has great replayabilty cause it has multiple endings good/bad so will the final game.I can't wait for the the release of this game,definitely a day one buy purchase for me if they don't f*ck up the release.

author: {'steamid': '76561198318591658', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1485093710}
review:
Hab zwar erst ne halbe Stunde gespielt aber kann sagen es macht Spaß.
Es gibt ein paar negativ Punkte:
- Steuerung etwas schwerfällig, fühlt sich träge an
- bis jetzt nur Jumpscares

Positiv:
- WAS FÜR EINE GEILE ATMO!!eins11, warum auch "Grusel"Elemente einbauen wenn man so ein Haus hat, es ist super designt und es gibt viel zu entdecken mit vielen Details
- mehr als man von einer Demo erwartet
- läuft super stabil 
- coole verständliche Story

Wird ja so nicht in Resi selbst drin sein.
Was man von First und Thirdperson hält ist jedem selbst überlassen.
Finde First super weil es das Sichfeld einschränkt und so zum Felling beiträgt obwohl es alles etwas träge ist.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038168123', 'num_games_owned': 629, 'num_reviews': 152, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1539411055}
review:
Bueno... La verdad es que no se bien como empezar éste análisis...

Tengo sentimientos encontrados con ésta saga, RE fue en su momento mi saga favorita y los juegos clásicos hasta día de hoy me siguen divirtiendo. Pero todos sabemos en lo que se fue convirtiendo....

Desde el RE 5 que CAPCOM nos viene diciendo que la saga va a volver a sus orígenes y con cada nueva entrega la saga se alejaba más de dichos orígenes. Pero con ésta entrega (o la demo al menos) es lo más cerca que la saga a estado de lo que antaño fue. Vuelven los puzzles (gracias a Dios) y la escasez de munición (GRACIAS A DIOS!). A mi en  lo personal no me molesta la cámara en 1ra persona (entiendo que el estilo tanque de las entregas originales ya quedo obsoleto y el nuevo sistema de movimiento que implementaron en las versiones HD del Remake y el Zero dan más problemas y dolores de cabeza de lo que uno esperaría) y mezclado con el sonido, la verdad que lo llevan muy bien.

Pero vamos al grano y basta de divagar... 
¿Este juego es otro Amnesia/Outlas/etc?
No.
¿Vuelven las cosas clásicas de los viejos RE?
Sólo hasta cierto punto. (de lo que pude ver en la Demo)
¿Vale la pena descargar la demo?
Por supuesto! Tanto te guste o no la saga, es una demo interesante y entretenida. Y si sos de esos fans que no pueden aceptar que los RE de la PS1 son eso.... RE de la PS1, te vas a encontrar con algo que te va a sorprender.
¿Entonces corro a reservar el juego?
Ni se te ocurra! XD jajaja. Hasta el momento el juego pinta bien, pero la verdad es que no se puede apreciar mucho.

Si llegaste hasta aca te agradezco el que te tomases la molestia de leer mi modesto análisis. Muchas gracias! :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198034381066', 'num_games_owned': 197, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1482380763}
review:
Ich bin ein kleiner Fan von Horrorgames und muss sagen das RE7 da für einen teaser schon ein ziemlich gutes feeling mit Gänsehautfaktor vermittelt!
Grafik, Stabilität und Steuerung überzeugen sofort.
Viel besser als die vorherigen Teile.

System:
Intel Core i5 6600K 4x3,5GhZ
GeForce GTX 1070 OC 8GB
16GB DDR4-3000 RAM
MSI Z170A Gaming Pro Carbon
27" LG Monitor
7.1 Surround Sound Headset

Mit dem Setup und auf Maximalen Grafikeinstellungen wirkt das ganze sehr (fast schon zu) realistisch .
Ich persöhnlich verzichte hier gerne auf den Einsatz einer VR Brille.
Der Teaser ist eine absolute empfehlung zum Anspielen und RE7 ist bereits auf meiner Wunschliste.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047685041', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1482380982}

author: {'steamid': '76561198120631091', 'num_games_owned': 770, 'num_reviews': 206, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1482379219}
review:
It was interesting.
I ran through it quickly and got a bad ending, but then came back and finished the true ending and did some of the secrets.
Now I have a coin that apparently transfers to the final game.
This felt very "hands off", and I hope the final game turns out just like that. 
Honestly though, the decription for the true ending was pretty stupid, and felt like a cop out. Especially since I had the VHS with evidence in my inventory. 

I also want to point out that I'm not much of a RE veteran, and it seems like this game is getting the usual roast from it's community. Though I don't care, the RE series has never felt "stable" to me anyway. Though I do think this switch to first-person feels like a cash in on the PT and Outlast experiences.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057894301', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1579260588}
review:
Great Optimization! As always from Capcom :) I'm crashing at the beginning of the game though, right after opening the 1st door the game crashes. Have updated my gpu installed the Redists, my pc is also updated.. I first thought it's my 4 GB RAM (kinda still think it is) but i saw videos in YouTube using only 4 GB ram (I have even higher specs) which means they also recording.. So.. why?? My Hard Drive?? CPU?? I'm playing so smoothly inside the 1st room, i know this game is awesome and i can only stay in that room :(..
CPU: AMD A4-4000 APU HD Graphics with Radeon 3.00 GHz
GPU: GT 730 DDR3 2 GB 
4 GB RAM

- After the patch

Still the same problem! when i get out the 1st door the game crashes. There's no problem with the other door the small one where you get the fuse but the first white door when i get out crashes the game instantly

author: {'steamid': '76561197977241119', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1482377376}
review:
It's been a while since I've felt the way I feel about RE7. The last time I felt this way was when I played RE4. RE4 was something I had never experienced before. 

As a PC gamer I have to support this game. They've released a sweet demo. It is well optimized. I have the same demo on PS4. Graphics on PS4 are trash compared to this version. How often do triple AAA's release a demo?? Come on!

Obviously they are trying to make a real impression with this game. They've released a well optimized demo. They know the series needed to change in a big way. This is it. This is an RE revolution. You should hop on board. I really wish that other game developers would reinvent their intellectual property the way that Capcom has with RE7.

Let's talk a minute about the executive producer of this game Jun Takeuchi. Jun worked on RE1, RE2 and RE5. 

"Following the release of Resident Evil 6, producer Masachika Kawata noted, Capcom had a lot of internal discussion regarding the direction of the next installment. Capcom staffers recognized that the scale of the last game, which had bioterrorism attacks happening across the world, had grown out of hand and as a result what made the series special had been lost. To regain that, Kawata's boss, Jun Takeuchi, who is the executive producer of the game, requested that the series be "stripped down to its core": horror. The developers figured scaling back the game to one location and using a first-person perspective to immerse the players in the environments, would be the best way to achieve that."

I highly recommend this demo. As a 32 year old gamer I can tell you, my gamer gut says this final game is going to be one hell of a scary ride.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051264185', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1482384093}
review:
中高でグれて地方の興行プロレス巡業に出ていた兄が、改心して「家業を継ぎたい」と実家に戻ってきた感覚。
　敵は、倒すとハイライトされた弾薬を落とす障害物ではなく、"そこを歩く、という恐怖" の本質的な脅威として登場します。
ドアを開けるのが嫌、曲がり角を曲がるのが嫌、変な音がしたけど後ろを振り向くのが嫌。
初代～ベロニカ以降は薄れてしまった、貧弱な武装と限られた物資で取捨選択を繰り返しながら生還を目指すホラーゲームの今更が帰ってきたようです。おかえりなさい。

author: {'steamid': '76561198083603873', 'num_games_owned': 275, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1482501725}
review:
Excelente teaser. Deixa o jogador muito apreensivo pelo jogo que está por vir. Parece que de uma vez por todas, Resident Evil voltou a ser um jogo de Survival Horror. RE7 parece ser o RE mais Resident Evil dos últimos anos. É inegável que o jogo tem uma influência enorme de Outlast, mas todos os elementos de RE estão lá. 

E pra ser sincero eu estou adorando o fato de que a demo não tem NADA a ver com a saga principal, pq eu ainda acredito que esse jogo vai ser como RE1 e RE4, onde vc é literalmente jogado dentro de uma situação e não entende nada do que está acontecendo. Sinceramente estou torcendo pro jogo ter uma história meio lenta como Alien: Isolation. Que demore pras coisas começarem a fazer sentido, mas que em algum determinado momento da história, exista uma reviravolta que ligue este jogo com toda a trama de RE. Realmente estou gostando demais do que eu vi.

Em um determinado momento da demo, parece que enfrentamos um Uroboros. Se for, o game tem que se passar no mínimo ao mesmo tempo que RE5. Mas tem uma foto de um helicóptero que pode remeter ao primeiro jogo. Talvez seja uma família que viva nos arredores da mansão, mas o jogo se passe depois de RE6 mesmo. Tipo... como ficou uma família que vivia nos arredores da mansão...

author: {'steamid': '76561198050082279', 'num_games_owned': 682, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1644635656}
review: Currently I am debating wether or not Resident Evil 7: Biohazard is something I am interested in, This is such as farcry from other RE titles, but I like it currently in this Teaser demo. The tension I felt was similar to what I felt in Alien: Isolation, and the secrets are invigerating. While it is off putting If I think of it as Resident Evil title compared to the first 6's third person perspective, ir is a great game just the same,

author: {'steamid': '76561198033568195', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1482369221}
review:
O jogo está muito bom, apesar de ter fugido um pouco da sua "originalidade", está bem feito bem otimizado e deu para render bons sustos, pelo menos foi o meu caso e nesse pouco tempo de jogo. 

A Capcom aprendeu um pouco com os Indies de terror que vem saindo ultimamente, principalmente os mais famosos Outlast e Amnesia. 

Sinto cheiro de jogo bom vindo aí. Que venha!

author: {'steamid': '76561198011043132', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1603547857}
review: Нет русского это огромный минус для игры. Есть даже итальянский... Графика похожа на 4 Рез. Герой не отражается в зеркалах, только фонарик, может тогда вообще не следовало делать зеркала?! Управление отзывчивое, единственное что оставило хорошее впечатление. Кучи трупов животных, черви и прочие нечистоты не придают атмосферы игре, а скорее задаешся вопросом: - "как это все тут появилось и зачем?!" Однозначно найдутся те кому игра зайдет. Будем ждать релиза и смотреть что изменится. В таком исполнении покупать игру я не стану.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099061411', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1484621344}
review: Very well made, solid gameplay mechanics with smooth movement that isn't too slow or choppy. some stuttering issues personally (still not sure what the problem is: game or pc? im very much so above the requirements[i56600k and msi gtx 970]) but nothing that leaves the game completely unplayable. definitely a suspenseful and terrifying experience. would recommend not watching any videos beforehand to strengthen the scare factor however even if you do you will most likely still be on the edge of your seat as i was. if anyone with a similar stuttering issue has any solution or ideas they would be greatly appreciated as i would love to fully enjoy this otherwise wonderfully made demo to a game i can only imagine will be even better. definitely in my list of must-haves and it's only a demo for an unreleased game, which is very impressive. haven't finished it yet but i certainly will, even sooner if i find a fix for the stuttering.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060406830', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1482365704}
review:
Das ist kein Resident Evil

Keine Zombis gesehen, keine Waffen, kein altes Herrenhaus, keine Hunde, keine Kräuter zum sammeln. Nur so ein dummes Hurrorspiel was es schon tausendfach von anderen kleinen Entwicklern gibt.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986529486', 'num_games_owned': 724, 'num_reviews': 590, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1482364542}
review:
Let me remind you that they couldn't fucking figure out how to make a Resident Evil game so they're presenting this one as being new hot shit. What's really happening here is that Japan is so disconnected from modern gaming that they've finally resorted to, and let me put it in capitals COPYING A SIX YEAR OLD GAME THAT IS COMPLETELY UNRELATED IN THEME BECAUSE THEY ARE OUT OF IDEAS. 

OH fuck they AREN'T COPYING IT THEY'RE JUST SIX YEARS LATE TO THE PARTY. I'm not sure which is worse.

Lots of good things here but it doesn't make any functional sense, much like the original Resident Evil. The puzzles aren't technically puzzles and don't follow any sort of logic and barely follow a narrative. The only way to figure out anything is to spend an obscene amount of time analyzing the game or just to play it over and over (which would take you EONS to find the true ending of this game, there is zero information to use and the only way anybody figured out anything at all is because of the internet's clandestine aggregate unending research). That isn't a hallmark of a clever game as much as it is a cliche of bad game design. Anybody can hide random unrelated objects in scenery. What is lacking in actual gameplay logic or design is made up for in the enviornment and atmosphere.

Recommend only because I don't know if the final game will be any good. It could be hit or miss.

author: {'steamid': '76561198139107781', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 420, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 362, 'last_played': 1486070292}
review:
I only liked Resident Evil 4 on gamecube when it came out and i loved it. Then i saw all the other Resident evil games and i hated them, But i saw the trailer for this game and it looked amazing, And it was! I can run this game on high to very high settins at above 60 fps, however i use V-sync, on my pc. Cant wait tell the full game comes out!! i have to see more!
My specs: Amd FX 6350
Gigabyte GTX 750 Ti (Advertised at 4gb of vram but really it has 2gb of vram)
8gb of DDR 3 ram (7.89 usable)

author: {'steamid': '76561197960626849', 'num_games_owned': 319, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1482362605}
review:
Just a short teaser, calling it a demo would be generous, but different endings gives you more replayability.  I'm not sure if this is taken from the game's main story or what, but if the game is anything like this short teaser than I have very high hopes for it.  Before playing, I was expecting the sequel to the disappointing RE6 to be quite lackluster.  But the move to first person while bringing back survival horror is a great change to the franchise.

If the demo is any indicator of the game itself, it's an easy buy at full price.

But this teaser is free so try it yourself.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097445539', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1485072234}

author: {'steamid': '76561198050504813', 'num_games_owned': 705, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1482355987}
review:
Ah Resident Evil sen bu hallere nasıl geldin ya!
Şu yeni oyuncular kazanmak için eski oyuncuları umursamıyorlar hesabı bir oyun
Hikâye bakımından eski serilerle hiç bir alâkası olmayan tamamen Outlast özentisi bir oyun

Yeni moda oldu zaten efsane serilerin içine sıçmak bir sürü oyun sayabilirim
Resident Evil 7 (Saçma sapan sesler verip oyuncuyu korkutalım sonra bir adam yumrukla bayıltsın çok korkunç!)
Metal Gear Solid V (Snake git 10 tane aç yabani köpek kes!)
God of War (TPS olması oyunun bozulması için yeter!)
Call of Duty Black Ops 3 (Ana karakteri biz oluşturuyoruz göye bizi oyunun içine daha çok adapte ediyorlarmış!)
...

Artık sıkıldım ya hayatımı adadığım seriler ölüyor gözümün önünde ve ben dayanamıyorum artık Resident Evil'ın o karakterleri hepsinin ayrı bir hikâyesi olması başka yerlerden gelmeleri...

Hayâller Resident Evil ama hayatlar Outlast

GÖZLER YAŞLI :'(

author: {'steamid': '76561198160707469', 'num_games_owned': 508, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 460, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1485278812}
review:
[h1] Resident Hill/Silent Evil  [/h1]

Знаете, я не понимаю, почему разработчики решили назвать данный проект Resident Evil, да еще и с 7-й в название. У этой игры с Resident Evil общее только название - во всем остальном это какой-то Silent Hill (особенно со всей этой мистикой, которая резику ну совсем не присуща - онли зараженные). Кто играл в Тихие Холмы и видел демку многострадальной P.T., тот, думаю, заметит очевидное сходство со всем этим. По всей видимости разработчики сильно вдохновились работами Кодзимы с Дель Торо и Кэиитиро Тоямы (ну или просто сперли удачный концепт). Не вижу в этом ничего плохого, однако название по-прежнему вводит в небольшой ступор.

[h1] Сюжетная составляющая [/h1]
Игра начинается с небольшого флешбэка, после которого вы очнетесь на полу в темной комнате и получите цель выбраться из некоего заброшенного дома. По сюжету в этот дом приезжает съемочная группа (вы в качестве оператора, само собой) для заснятия одной из серий шоу об охотниках за приведениями, и, конечно же, нарывается на неприятности. Типичная история, обыгранная в куче разных фильмов ужасов, так что сюжетных изысков не ждите. Однако подача этого самого сюжета все искупает, ведь потом вы поймете, что в начале был вовсе не флешбэк и только ваши действия могут все изменить. Понятное дело, что благодаря этому игра имеет несколько довольно неплохих концовок. В одной из них упоминается ЛСД, под которым, видимо, находились разработчики, когда придумывали условия для истинной концовки. Даже не знаю, кто в здравом уме допетрит, как ее выполнить, не задействовав при этом подсказки. Японцы... Что с них взять.

[h1] Хоррор составляющая [/h1]
В плане хоррора все довольно хорошо. Без тупых скримеров, конечно, не обошлось, но они представлены в малом количестве и в принципе не раздражают, как это обычно бывает. Помимо этого игра так же старается пугать еще и своей атмосферой, давя на нервы созданием параноидального ощущения, что кто-то рядом. Шорохи за стеной, скрипы половиц и прочие посторонние звуки - все это работает на атмосферу и довольно сильно давит на подсознание. Приемы старые и избитые, но действенные. Хичкок одобряет.

[h1] Графическая составляющая [/h1]
Графика в игре ни разу не фотореалистична и не похожа на то, что нам показывали на ранних скриншотах и в геймплее (если играть не в 4к, естестно). Она скорее ближе к VR версии игры (точнее идентична ей). Впрочем, такому не стоит удивляться в современных реалиях. Видимо это было сделано ради того, чтобы разброс в графике между обычной и VR версией был не слишком велик, а то люди, купившие шлемы за 40к, чувствовали бы себя обделенными. Тем не менее графенарий все равно выглядит вполне сносно. Вот в чем игра реально хороша, так это плане дизайна. Во многом именно он и вытягивает довольно посредственную графику. Местами игра может вызвать настоящее омерзение (в хорошем смысле, как бы это странно не звучало), настолько все круто проработано 

Оптимизация тоже вполне годная, как ни странно. Сначала казалось, что она на уровне Марианской впадины, но стоило отрубить кеширование теней и поставить масштабирование на 1, как все стало нормально. Хотя при таком уровне графики оптимизацию можно было сделать и получше. 

[h1] Геймплейная составляющая [/h1]
Если вы ждете каких-то геймплейных откровений, то смело проходите мимо, здесь вы их не найдете. Весь геймплей сводится к банальному исследованию локации в поисках какого-либо предмета, дабы продвинуться дальше. В этом и состоит суть местных "головоломок". Да и сама локация, мягко говоря, не велика: парочка коридоров, да комнат с разбросанными в них предметами - вот и все. Хотя чего еще ожидать от обычной демо-версии.

[h1] ВЕРДИКТ [/h1]
Да, это уже не резик в привычном его воплощение и разработчики явно лукавили, когда говорили, что вернут серию к корням. Но если абстрагироваться от сравнений с Silent Hill, то на выходе мы получаем довольно добротный, атмосферный олдовый хоррор с элементами головоломки, который может реально затянуть, при чем надолго.

[h1] 8 Welcome to the family, son из 10 [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561197960429200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1625109163}
review:
Boy, did the Resident Evil series need to make a change. Having explored all the variations of third-person action they could get out of a RE game, they've gone back to the drawing board and made something completely different.

I don't (currently) own a PS4, so I never got to play PT. This is about the next best thing. Not as outright terrifying as Alien: Isolation, but just as rich in enviromental detail.

The only real downside is that the demo requires you to do certain things in a certain *order* to get the best ending, so if that bugs you, consider yourself warned.

If the full game doesn't get too repetative and keeps up this level of attention to detail, I'm sold.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964866568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 208, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1482421447}
review:
I am really dissapointed. I love the RE franchise. All of it. Anime, movies, games and their spinoffs.
But this is just a joke. Poor attempt at copying PT.
The game in this particular demo at least, is a boring walker game and hidden object puzzle?
With what little horror it has, beeing silly jump scares that won't work on an adult person?
Demo should showcase what's the best that game has to offer, and when I think about the repetetive scenes I'd have to rewatch, I don't even want to bother with finding a good ending.
I would probably get it as a VR title for the VIVE, but since that is on an exclusive for a whole year, It will probably be the very FIRST Resident Evil title that I skip...

The other leaks that suggest there is more to the game, gunplay, etc... We will see. But If I would have to judge by this demo alone?

Hell no... This is a boring copy of indie games that are better, even though they have little to zero funding!
This is supposed to be an AAA title, what the hell happened? Budget cuts?
If you really want to get into this seeming lucrative genre... Be innovative, or at least be decent about it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012111055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 249, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1482359489}
review:
Vaya por delante que no soy fan de Resident Evil. Recuerdo haber jugado el primero hace eones y que en su momento me había gustado pero nunca me quedé enganchado a esta saga ni le tengo una especial estima como podría pasarme con Silent Hill, por poner un ejemplo similar. Tengo varios títulos de la franquicia en mi biblioteca y nunca encuentro prisa por jugarlos. Me dejan bastante indiferente. 

Me bajé la demo porque era gratis y me picó la curiosidad. Y lo poco que vi me ha gustado mucho. De hecho hacía tiempo que ni me preocupaba de si salía un nuevo RE y en cambio éste lo tengo en el punto de mira. Por lo que entiendo por ahí esta demo no tiene nada que ver con el producto final pero lo que sí hace es mostrar el motor en funcionamiento e, imagino, las ideas que traen para el videojuego. Pues bien: creo que cumple perfectamente su cometido.

Lo único que le veo malo a la demo es que es 'tramposa' con el único enemigo en juego. Aparece de la nada y desaparece de igualmente en la nada y vuelve a reaparecer cuando el guión lo considera adecuado. Entiendo que esto es únicamente un teaser y una demostración técnica, por lo que probablemente en el juego la cosa espero que sea más seria.

En mi caso diré que la demo ha cumplido su cometido: ha puesto el juego en mi punto de mira. Luego ya veremos como es en realidad.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988198909', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1485893629}
review:
Déjà, proposer une démo en 2016, cela mérite une médaille!!!
J'ai juste joué au premier resident evil sur saturn à l'époque mais j 'ai vu des letsplay des derniers épisodes qui resemblaient plus à des jeux de shoot qu'à des jeux d'horreurs.
Je trouve cela cool que capcom sorte de sa zone de confort et prenne le risque de renouveler sa série.
Après le rendu pourrait être améliorer et le FOV etendu. Le perso est un peut lent. Je me demande si au final cela ne va pas ressmbler à outlast.
A voir, mais belle demo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198053663941', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1482355837}
review:
OK... It's been a very, very long time since I was affected by a Horror-Genre game. But this Demo let me feel like I'm reliving all my childhood nightmares!

A must for all RE fans who enjoyed "RE4" and love some Hillbilly Horror a la "The Hills Have Eyes" with a little touch of "Outlast"

Awesome graphics! Smooth controls! And a really nice feeling to the game!

author: {'steamid': '76561197976559290', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1482361216}
review:
Die wenigsten kümmern sich heut ja noch um eine Demo. Nicht so hier bei Resident.
Die Demo macht bereits von Anfang an Lust auf mehr. Sowohl die Grafik, find ich zumindestens, ist bombastisch und detailgetreu.
Das beste aber wohl, es bringt die lang vermisste Gänsehaut und das Herzklopfen zurück.
Düstere Kulisse und passende Hintergrundatmosphäre inklusive in einem verlassenen Haus das bereits gleich auf semi-normale Verhältnisse der Besitzer schließen läßt. Hinzu ein Spiel im Spiel (VHS) ist auch ein kleines Schmankerl.
Wenn das Spiel in der Aufmachung weitergeht, dürfte es wohl eine klare Kaufempfehlung geben für alle Liebhaber dieses Genres.
Die Demo sollte bis dahin jeder mal zocken.
