author: {'steamid': '76561198127697157', 'num_games_owned': 395, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1482416866}
review: Honestly the best game demo I have played and I've only completed one playthrough. The ambience is terrifying and the sounds and attention to small details are great, especially with headphones (which I highly recommend). IMO the footsteps your character makes are the scariest part, as I've had to stay still several times to make sure they were mine, haha. Can't wait until the full game is released, and I'm sure it will be every bit scarier, and probably even more than I anticipate. 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198045458197', 'num_games_owned': 1037, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1482190021}
review: Отличный квест, только при чём тут Resident Evil? После таких слов обычно люди начинают вопить про "Тебе лишь бы пострелять" или "с прогиба хотел покидать".. но нет. Я большой фанат первых частей и играл их и в детстве и переигрывал в сознательном вопзрасте. Этот кусок квеста совсем ни похож ни на какие корни и классический резидент. Это игра без баланса экшна и квеста, это голый квест с мизерными элементами экшна. Если полная игра будет такой  (а судя по видео именно такой она и будет), то это будет самое большое разочарование года. Убери они цыфру 7 и было бы хорошо, но делать такие дикие эксперементы в номерной части  бросаясь в такие крайности, я думаю это не правильно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048437807', 'num_games_owned': 341, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1494875396}
review:
Мне очень понравилась эта демо-версия. Надеюсь полная игра не уступит ей по атмосфере и интересу к игре.

Это переосмысление серии и, на мой взгял, очень удачное.
Резидент больше не шутер - теперь его действительно можно назвать хоррором.
Жутко атмосферное звучание, приятная, хорошо оптимизированная картинка и ощущение замкнутости и страха не покинут вас до самого конца.

Прикладываю видео моего первого прохождения
Но я вернусь и, надеюсь, не раз :)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y60L5cERnrY&t=3s

author: {'steamid': '76561198015338202', 'num_games_owned': 2432, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1486536774}
review:
Very Scary - One of the Best RE ever...


I been playing all RE from the very first day since the out to PlayStation 1 in 90's. 
I played all of them for hours and hours, always played all the endings and whatever included.

And I must say that this one is really really very good!! I just played this on my 75" screen with 5.1 surround system only for 5 minutes as I didn’t had much time today --------- 



BUT HELL, THIS WAS SO REALISTICALLY FREAKING SCARY!!!!!! 



I felt like i was in that place myself and for a long time I never felt so scared in resident evil game since resident evil 1 and 2... I really dont understand why people hate this one so much...



Resident evil 0-1-2-3 nemesis and veronica shared a similar atmosphere. Then we had resident evil 4, starting area for more action oriented experience. Afterwards we had RE5-RE6 which were very good co-op games. Revelations for more old school with mixed feelings of co-op experience. Even Operation Raccoon City was a good game until windows live abonded it, i used to have so much fun on it when the servers were active.

And now we have RE7!!
Clearly the Most Horrifying Resident Evil ever made.!!!




I would say, anyone who is criticizing game is just not getting how good is this game and they are afraid of change only

author: {'steamid': '76561198110250881', 'num_games_owned': 734, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1482191822}
review:
The demo is alright. It feels like it was trying to take the mystery and intrigue of PT and the atmosphere of Outlast and make it into its own thing. I won't say it does a particularly fantastic job of either, but it's alright for what it is. This demo just kinda makes me miss PT even more. 
There is one particularly serious bug in the game that completely totalled my ability to play on KB/M by permanently screwing up the inputs for all of my keys (S was left, A was forward, Enter was Arrow Down, etc.) I just moved to a gamepad and thihgs were chill.
Multiple endings, very well done visuals, and good atmosphere. Though I do feel the scares were stupid and nonsensical (at some point, a mannequin is tossed at you by no one and it just left me confused more than anything.) 

TL;DR it's not original in any way, but it's fine for what it is. Try it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979864325', 'num_games_owned': 2629, 'num_reviews': 501, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1482273412}
review:
Странная танденция - писать обзор на демо-версии!)) Скоро обзоры на трейлеры можно будет в стиме писать, а затем... внимание... ОБЗОРЫ НА АНОНСИРОВАННЫЕ ПРОЕКТЫ!!! XD Крайне полезно, наверное...
Впрочем, раз это доступно и разрешено, своё мнение я выскажу.

Да, чёрт возьми, я чертовски рад, что получил в подарок предзаказ Resident Evil 7 на свой День рождения!
Кажется... хотя нет, не кажется! Нас 100% ждёт очередной переворот в серии! Этот переворот примет не каждый, и это тоже 100% факт, но на мой личный взгляд CAPCOM на верном пути. 
Картинка, звук, атмосфера, геймплей, вариативность - во всяком случае в демо-версии всё выполнено на высококачественном уровне. Освещение, насыщенность, детализация, интерактивность... Хоть по скриншотам игра и напоминает Outlast, но кажется нас ждёт хоррор на порядок выше. 
С нетерпением жду заветной даты!

author: {'steamid': '76561197987702753', 'num_games_owned': 168, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1482229109}
review:
An interesting twist on the RE series, fans of the "old school" feel of resident evil games will appreciate this one, especially if you are fortunate enough to be in posession of a VR headset. Personally, after playing this chilling demo on my modest 1920x1080 screen, I can safely say I will never be using a VR headset for anything other than POV pornography.

If this game doesn't put the sh*ts up you, then you should probably be bungee jumping for a career or something.

Unlike recent games in the RE series, which are more action-orientated than survival horror, RE7 appears to be going back to it's roots, with an interesting transition to first person, if you have a heart condition of any kind -- avoid. It's not [i]all[/i] cliché jump scares either - very few infact. The atmosphere is very immersive, you will be afraid to turn around, you will be afraid to open doors, to me, this what RE is all about, or at least was, "back in the day".

I recommend playing with the lights off and the curtains closed, but you should probably also wear your least-treasured underwear when playing and be sure to stick to the games recommended brightness levels - it really adds to the immersion.

Good luck.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005049831', 'num_games_owned': 307, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1482676727}
review:
Порно - чистый шоколад!
Атмосферости добавляет немецкая озвучка!
Готов согласиться с тем, что это действительно ХОРОРР.
Хорорр наступает тогда, когда выкручиваешь все настройки на максимум,
а некст ген графики - кот наплакал(скриншоты прилагаются), при всём при этом,
частота кадров проседает аж до 20 ФПС.
Незнаю, это видимо какая-то "гениальная" концепция от CAPCOM. 
А лично от меня - красный пальчик вниз))!
 
 P.S. Система:
CPU - Intel Core I7 3770k
GPU  - MSI GTX 1060 6Gb OC
MEM - Patriot Viper Xtreme DDR3 2400 Mhz 2x4GB
SSD - OCZ Thoshiba TR150 480Gb
MB - MSI Z77A-G45

Считаю, что для данной системы, не составит трудности
прорисовка низкополигональных обьектов с
 низкокачественной картой наложения текстур,
коими данная демоверсия насыщена.
Но разработчики, видимо считают по другому.

Но как говорил гражданин Паниковский, - "Пилите, Шура, пилите!"

author: {'steamid': '76561198090932920', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1483048668}
review:
Lo recomiendo me gusto... Gracias CAPCOM por solucionar los problemas de compatibilidad con microprocesadores Phenon. Tengo pensado cambiarlo, pero no tan pronto, para mi sigue siendo un camión mi Phenon II x6... Y el juego me funciona de maravilla, no tuve bajones de frames en ningun momento. 
Lo jugue todo en "ALTO", y estuvo siempre a 60 FPS y se ve muy bien. Por ahi me anime a subirle un poco mas, a ver como se comporta.
Ya en el juego, me gusto, esta bueno. Tiene muy buena ambientación. Lo jugue con auriculares. Si te metes de lleno en el juego, te tiene pendiente de todo. Los ruidos de muebles, los maniquies que se cambian de lugar, que te pone algun que otro pelo de punta y algun que otro sonido, que hacen que estes pendiente de que nadie te sorprenda por detras... La calidad grafica me encanto. Y esos pequeños detalles de movimiento de cuando estas cerca de una pared, en la que el personaje se apoya con su mano... Me gusto. 
Aclaro que soy fan de la saga, lo juego de sus inicios. Lo que no afecta en nada, mi recomendación. Porque, aunque en esta demo, solo sea eso una demo. Y que hasta hora lo unico que vi de resident evil, fue una foto de un helicoptero con el logo de Umbrella. Me dio mas curiosidad de saber de que se trata la trama... 
Me gusto. Lo recomiendo... 
Espero poder comprarmelo...
Bueno los dejo, voy a seguir jugando. Gracias.

Mi equipo:
Procesador:      AMD Phenon II X6 1090T Processor 3.20 GHz
Memoria:          8,00 GB de RAM DDR 3 1333
Sist. Operativo: Windows 10 Pro (Original) 64 bits
Placa de video: GEFORCE GTX 1060 6 GB

author: {'steamid': '76561198094406343', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 206, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1632179618}
review:
I am a fan of the Resident Evil franchise, and let me tell you that this is the one i am the most excited for since Resident Evil 1-2-3. There is something about this one that just brings back the pure horror of the old Resident Evils. If you like survival-horror, try this, you will fall in love instantly. And for those Resident Evil fans that hates the style they went with, try the demo, its free, and you'll see for yourselves that this game have great potential.

The only problem i have like a few others, is that the game doesnt run smoothly unless i put it all at medium. I have a GTX 970 and i7 4790K, so i think i should be able to max the settings without having huge framedrops. But i trust in Capcom, they will fix these issues.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048610420', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1483426006}
review:
Resident Evil 7 / Biohazard 7 Teaser: Beginning Hour

@21/12/2016

เกมดีกว่าที่คิดเเฮะ บ่นกันเยอะว่า RE ภาคหลังๆ บู้เยอะมากเกินไป ภาคนี้เลยมาแบบหลอนๆ
เดโมเกมนี้ เล่นสำรวจและไขปริศนาดีๆ 
มันมีฉากจบอยู่ประมาณ 4 แบบ

[spoiler]
1 - หนีออกมาได้ (True Ending)
2 - ติดเชื้อตายห่า (Infected Ending)
3 - เกือบหนีรอด ถ้าเจ๊ไม่โทรมา (The End of the path is near)
4 - เปิดประตูและเจอไอ้แก่ต่อย (Bad Ending)
[/spoiler]

ผมเล่นเดโมจบไปรอบแรก ได้ฉากจบแบบ 4 คือ[spoiler]เปิดประตูหนีออกมาแล้วเจอตาแก่ต่อย[/spoiler] ซึ่งเป็นฉากจบแบบ Bad ภายในเวลา 20 นาที
หลังจากผมมานั่งคิด "อะไรฟะ ให้มาเปิดวิดีโอดูและเข้าห้องลับไปเอากุญแจมาไขออกจบเดโมแค่เนี่ย?" 
ตอนแรกผมนึกว่าเกมเดโมมันมีฉากจบแบบเดียว

แต่หลังจากลองมาเล่นซ้ำๆ ดูปรากฎว่า ตัวเกมมันมีปริศนาและแนวทางในการจบแต่ละแบบกว่าที่คิดแฮะ 
ผมเดาว่าหลายคนคงจบเดโมนี้แบบที่ 4 กันเยอะแน่ๆ ไม่รู้ว่าเกมตัวจริงจะมีฉากจบเยอะขนาดนี้หรือเปล่า?

หรือเดโมนี้อาจจะมีฉากจบมากกว่า 4 แบบก็ได้ ปริศนาไอเท็มบางตัวที่ได้มาผมก็ยังไขไม่ออกว่า มันให้เอาไว้ทำอะไร
(นิ้วตุ๊กตาเทียม + มือตุ๊กตาเทียม , หนังสือสมุดเปล่า) ไม่รู้ว่ามีผลต่อฉากจบในเดโมหรือเปล่า

แต่โดยรวมแล้วเกมโอเคเลย ถึงแม้มันจะดูออกแปลกๆ ในจักรวาล RE ที่เราเล่นๆ มาก็เถอะ

[h1]**เดโมนี้ หากไขปริศนาของบ้านหลังนี้จนครบ เดโมจะทำการเซฟข้อมูล ซึ่งถ้าใครซื้อตัวเกม RE7 ตัวเต็มจะได้ไอเท็มพิเศษบางอย่างจากการไขปริศนาของเดโมไปใช้ด้วยครับ**[/h1]

นิ้วตุ๊กตาเทียม + มือตุ๊กตาเทียม , หนังสือสมุดเปล่า เอาไว้ทำอะไร?


[spoiler]
เอาไว้จดข้อความเรื่องราวที่เกิดขึ้นในบ้าน ส่วนมือเทียมเอาไว้ชี้จุดเกิดเหตุฆาตกรรมทั้ง 5 จุดในบ้าน หากทำได้ประตูขวามือชั้น 3 ข้างทางออกทางหน้าต่างจะสามารถเปิดเข้าไปได้ โดยประตูจะมีรอยมือเปื้อนเลือด เมื่อเข้าไปในห้องจะมีเก้าอี้พร้อมข้อความ "You are the best ever" พร้อมกับเหรียญอะไรสักอย่าง

เมื่อเก็บและออกหน้าต่างหนีไปได้เกมจะทำการเซฟไว้ และใครซื้อเกม RE7 ตัวเต็มมาเล่น มันจะทำการอ่านเซฟเดโมที่เราเล่น เพื่อปลดล็อดไอเท็มพิเศษ
[/spoiler]

สามารถดูวิธีการแก้ไขปริศนาในเดโมทั้งหมดได้ตามวิดีโอด้านล่าง

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IsBa1hAEnrA

review:
注意，有所剧透，请选择观看

[h1]回归恐怖的十字路口——生化危机7(前瞻，正文会在稍后几天更新）[/h1]

[b]Everybody is dead 无人生还

I Was raised in a deep dark hole 在伸手不见五指的黑暗之中

The prisoner with no parole 一个永不见天日的囚犯

The lock me up and took my soul它们囚禁我的身体，腐蚀我的灵魂

I called him and he will come我呼唤着他的名字，等着他的到来

He'll be torn apart但他最终会四分五裂


《Go Tell Aunt Rhody》(根据游戏实意有所改动，并非直译，剩余部分会在正式版补全）[/b]


主角Ethan Winter将要去拯救他失踪的妻子Mia(米娅）（本作编剧为Richard Pearsey，代表作《F.E.A.R》，加上封面的小女孩，宣传措辞（在黑暗里等待你的是爱，还是别的东西？）以及Demo里的灵异现象，实际上剧情走向有些人已经可以猜到了[spoiler]（Mia就是生化危机7里的女鬼）[/spoiler]》

时间线在R6之后，会有一个老角色露面（？），主要反派为贝克一家，为病毒适应者，Demo里的一拳超人老头为家主杰克.贝克，而在回忆录像带则会提到儿子卢卡斯.贝克，正片还会有家主的老婆玛格丽特.贝克以及卡米尔.贝克，都会以Boss战形式击败，在普通流程中，地位类似于杀不死的追击者。

[h1]游戏机制大幅改动是好是坏？[/h1]

事实上《生化危机7》并非是首次在系统上大刀阔斧改动的正统作品。回溯过去那些标题带数字的《生化危机》正统作品会发现一个有趣的现象——每隔3代会进行1次大改。而且似乎有一个规律，从1代通常是创新作，刷新玩家认知。至2代则是规则内容逐渐完善，玩家媒体之间的口碑水涨船高。再到3代创新进入瓶颈，销量和口碑都相对疲软和下滑。而这个发展规律可以完全应用在《生化危机1~3》与《生化危机4~6》上。

[h1]革新转型的成功是可以复制的吗？[/h1]

在进一步谈及《生化危机7》革新带来的利与弊之前，不得不提到当年在系列中同样极具争议的《生化危机4》。时至今日谈起《生化危机4》，人们都会抱着缅怀的心想起这是生化危机之父三上真司的最后一款作品。许多玩家至今仍然抱着是《生化危机4》之后再无生化危机的观点。但在《生化危机4》发售之初，围绕着本作的争议要大大的盖过了对它的赞誉；游戏改成了第三人称视角，熟悉的丧尸和浣熊市被换成了寄生虫和不知名的东欧小村庄，游戏风格偏向动作，恐怖气氛大减。外加最后本作原先宣布独占NGC但最后劈腿PS2的风波也给Capcom招来了卡婊的“美名”

如今随着时间的推移，已经没有人能够质疑《生化危机4》所达到的高度——满载赞誉而归，并且成为了当年公认的年度游戏（也是TGA 10年以来唯一的日式游戏，地位不言而喻）

[h1]一款不以传统人物视角展开的生化危机？[/h1]

生化危机系列时至今日已经是一个发展了20年之久的常青树系列了，不可否认的是，很多玩家至今仍在追随生化危机系列的原因并不是因为生化危机真的还有什么相比其他游戏而言独树一帜的系统或玩法。而只是难以割舍那些伴随着自己青年时代一路走过来的熟悉面孔和他们未完成的故事。

将主角设定为一个被卷入事故的普通人是一次大胆的举动，同时也是一把双刃剑。一方面来说，以一个孤立无援普通人的视角展开旅程确实能营造更强的无助气氛与游戏的神秘感，有利于增加生存恐怖的感觉，然而缺乏老面孔也会增加系列粉丝之间的疏离感。

author: {'steamid': '76561198127886579', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1482253516}
review: Decepcionado..realmente dececpcionado como FAN  de esta saga que tanta alegria me dio desde mi niñez hasta hoy dia con 27 años..Diran que juzgo antes de tiempo.. que el juego no esta terminado" , que cuando este terminado no va a ser asi" , " que la casa no va a formar parte del juego" todo lo que quieran!! pero buscaron darle frescura a la saga y se fueron de contexto..acabo de probar la demo solo por curiosidad.. por que ya sabia de que se trataba.. y no me lleno ni un poco, no me toco la emocion.. si ya se que es un demo.. pero este "juego" no se puede llamar Resident Evil" es un insulto.. mucho mas que sea la 7, donde estan nuestros viejos y queridos personajes? Chris, Leon, Jill, Claire? Por que no explotar una nueva Resident Evil 7 con Jill como protagonista? ( y no estoy hablando de historias alternativas como las Revelations que son una PORONGA, si no darle nuevamente un lugar en la historia de la saga a este personaje que tanto nos divirtio en Resident Evil 3 Nemesis)  A caso no dejo un final abierto la ultima entrega? De que se trata todo esto? lo que yo pienso.. es simple y sencillo, hoy en dia lo que vende es esto.. Horror en primera persona con pesimas historias, pero es lo que les gusta a los NIÑOS RATA y que lamentablemente son mayoria en estos dias.. CAPCOM! preocupate por darnos una alegria a los viejos jugadores de Resident evil, llenanos de ese no se que, que generaba jugar una Resident Evil.. En resumen.. no gastaria un solo dolar en este PLAGIO DI PLAGIO denominado "Resident Evil 7"  VERGUENZA LES TENDRIA QUE DAR PONJAS DE ORTO! ESPERE 4 AÑOS PARA ESTO?.. SIEMPRE CON LA ESPECTATIVA DE.."CUANDO SALDRA RESIDENT EVIL 7..?" " SE DICE QUE VAN A VOLVER A LAS RAICES DEL SURVIVAL HORROR" Uno se espera otra cosa no esto.

review:

Requisitos Mínimos

Sistema Operativo: WINDOWS 7, 8, 8.1, 10 64-BIT.
Procesador: Intel Core i5-4460, 2.70GHz o AMD FX-6300 o mejor.
Memoria RAM: 8 GB RAM.
Tarjeta Gráfica: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 o AMD Radeon R7 260x.

Requisitos Recomendados

Notas adicionales: CPU/GPU para 60FPS.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066845494', 'num_games_owned': 403, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1482352405}
review:
Не хотел писать обзор, все и так знают, что демка шикарная в плане геймплея и всё такое но про это написать я просто не мог. Из сглаживания есть:

- SMAA, который в данной игре абсолютно не сглаживает объекты, а делает их мерцающими при движении.
- FXAA, который тупо мылит картинку. При чём не только ту часть, которую нужно сглаживать. А всё.
- TAA, делат тоже, что и FXAA, но в 2 раза хуже выглядит.
Что за позор, в 2016 не использовать MSAA или хотя бы, реально годный, SMAA нормально настроить?
А в целом производительность порадовала, игра по графону 2012 год(что не плохо), работает соответствуеще хорошо на современном железе, и обилие настроек, не только графических, порадовала (но перевод хромает).
Красный палец из-за сглаживания (для тупых)

author: {'steamid': '76561198025266680', 'num_games_owned': 784, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1483887121}
review:
Разрабы всё-таки исправили неработоспособность игры на процах без SSE4.1. Хочу сказать всем, кто называл меня и других игроков, столкнувшихся с такой проблемой, "бомжами", что игра идёт прекрасно в стабильные 60 фпс на средних настройках на Phenom II x4 945 + GTX 750Ti.

Сама игра не имеет ничего общего с предыдущими играми серии. Но обладает атмосферой (которая больше схожа с Silent Hill), несколькими концовками и одной довольно сложной загадкой (я не осилил без гайда). Посмотрим, что будет в полной версии.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001678955', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1482247451}
review:
No. Non mi ha convinto.
Al di là del comparto grafico che ovviamente può sempre migliorare, ma non ho davvero nessun motivo per gridare al miracolo. RE è RE, punto, e non si discute! Questo titolo sembra una mossa commerciale che fa credere nel "andiamo dove vanno tutti, che qualche spicciolo torna pure a noi", e quindi non mi piace.
E' cme se la saga di star wars all'improvviso la cambiassero e la facessero stile star trek. NONC C'ENTRA NIENTE!
Imho, RE è entrato nella storia dei videgiochi proprio grazie alla problema zombie, non ai fantasmi che non si capsce che vogliono.
Vabè. ogniuno pensa a quello che vuole, resta il fatto che se avessero fatto un RE zombie fatto decente, (ma decente sul serio, non acciappa soldi come tutti) avrebbero vinto a mani basse

author: {'steamid': '76561198028818880', 'num_games_owned': 354, 'num_reviews': 364, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1482175773}
review:
Teaser a zaroven hratelna demoverzia k siedmemu Resident Evil, ktorej obsah sa v plnej hre uz neobjavi. Kratka originalna ukazka s rozsirenim pribehoveho pozadia dava jasne tusit navrat ku korenom serie. Hutnu atmosferu a vsade pritomny strach je citit z kazdeho kutu prehnilej usadlosti uz teraz. Zmena kamery, zda sa, hre nijak neublizila a po osahani si klasickych hernych mechanik je jasne, ze o ziadny dalsi klon "walking hororu" tu nepojde. 

Vyzera to tak, ze Resident Evil sa siedmym pokracovanim naozaj vracia k povodnemu konceptu prvych hier s klasickou RE hratelnostou v modernom pojati. Audiovizual je bez dalsich debat na velmi vysokej urovni a ak sa objavi aspon minimalne rovnako optimalizovany, ako v tejto ukazke, tak vitaj spat "usidlene zlo".

author: {'steamid': '76561198140739278', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1482293165}
review: 在玩outlast之前，看re7demo视频觉得还可以。现在自己体验了之后，感觉别人说生化危机7：逃生，一点都不为过；接受了4、5、6代的设定之后，有点难以接受。顺便，demo用960m跑，默认设置1080p，fps最低40+，卡不卡，见仁见智

author: {'steamid': '76561198200201969', 'num_games_owned': 342, 'num_reviews': 141, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1482243902}
review:
Più che una vera demo è un teaser, come tra l'altro precisato già nel titolo, quindi aspettatevi una durata molto breve (una ventina di minuti, volendo esagerare, con un peso oltre i 3 gb). La prima impressione è buona, anzi ottima: questo resident evil sembra un survival horror che fa nuovamente leva anche sulle paure psicologiche. 
Atmosfera ben realizzata, suoni inquietanti e allo stesso tempo calma apparente, che ti fa pensare ogni 3 secondi "ecco, adesso salta fuori qualcosa di spaventoso da una porta o dal frigo, e mi fa fuori".
Non ho riscontrato nessun crash o altre problematiche su un pc con una 980m.

Titolo sicuramente da seguire, vedremo col rilascio.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098692671', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1482242680}
review:
与前几代相比，Teaser的风格由接近于突突突的TPS打丧尸回归了原先的冒险解谜风格，而且变成了第一人称。前几作中主角个个身怀绝技来多少丧失都可以给你全突死，而Teaser里一只丧尸就是致命的威胁。
        就Teaser而言，场景和道具都包含了非常大的信息量，而且有多种结局，非常值得仔细探索和多次尝试。如果流程再长一点，它的内容甚至比一些独立解谜小游戏还要丰富。
        Teaser在恐怖气氛上也渲染得很好，玩出了和《恶灵俯身》或者《寂静岭》一样的恐怖游戏的感觉。如果抛开生化危机的背景，或许可以把它当作一个新的故事。
        在优化方面，相比于本年度成堆的渣优化游戏，本作简直是优化界的一股清流。也不排除因为全是室内场景所以帧数较高的可能。
        最后，如果喜欢前几作的风格，可能不会对本作感兴趣；如果喜欢恐怖解谜游戏，或者喜欢最初几代《生化危机》的风格，从Teaser来看，《生化危机7》是非常值得购买的。

author: {'steamid': '76561197964587505', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1482240942}
review:
[h1]Wishlist +1[/h1]

This is much better than I was expecting it to be. The series needed a drastic change and they seem to have nailed the balance of simple puzzles, exploration and atmosphere. All those reviews complaining about the cheap scares and cliches are missing the point ;)  

Also, I have 3-4 year old tech powering this win 10 PC and it runs amazing with everything turned on which makes me very confident this will not be the usual awful PC port we've come to expect these days..definitely going to buy this when my pile of shame gets a bit smaller.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974120082', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 268, 'last_played': 1482236878}
review:
Mir gefällt die Demo sehr gut. Wenn das fertige Spiel die Atmosphäre und die Spannung weiter so halten kann, ist das Spiel gekauft. 
Hatte vor der Demo ein Lets Play mit VR Unterstützung gesehen und war da schon begeistert. 

Das ist auch ein Grund, warum RE7 in Egosicht programmiert wurde. VR. 
Schade ist nur, dass Sony ein Jahr Exklusivrechte an der VR Unterstützung hat. Danach wird es wohl auf dem PC kommen. Das ist ein riesen Grund für mich ein VR-Headset zu kaufen. Der Typ in dem Video hat sich so sehr angeschissen im VR Modus, das war richtig herrlich anzusehen :D.  Da hätte ich auch große Lust drauf.

Endlich wieder ein Resi, welches den Kauf wert sein wird!

author: {'steamid': '76561198087311722', 'num_games_owned': 476, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1482318745}
review:
従来のバイオハザードシリーズとは全く違う作品です。
これまでホラーゲームは苦手ですが、バイオハザードは例外的にプレイ出来ました。
しかし、今作は自分はクリアできそうにないほど怖いです。

ゾンビの怖さとは違う、精神的に不安になる怖さです。
SAN値が削られるとはまさにこのことですね。

グラフィック周りに関しては
core i7-3770K + RX480 CFX(1x1最適化)
FHD 最高設定
イメージクオリティ 
1.2 150fps #ちらつきが激しかったので、数秒しか確認していない
1.5 20-100fps(ave95)
2   20-50fps(ave40)
参考 CFX off イメージクオリティ2 45fps

ftpは基本的には安定していますが、扉を開けると一瞬20近くまでガクッと落ちます。
多分、AMDの事前定義プロファイル(現状ない)ではなく、1x1最適化でのCFXを使用しているので、描画命令のスケジューリング最適化不足が原因でしょう。

ファンや温度周りに関しては2000rpmで70度を少し切る程度、そこまで負荷が高くなるわけでもなさそうです。
また、CPU使用率も特定コアに偏らず、均一に使われているように見えます。

このあたりの最適化の問題は発売時にはドライバのアップデートで解決されるでしょう。
4K等の解像度は今後確認し、レビューも更新しようと思います。

12/21追記
4K 最高設定
イメージクオリティ
1.0 45fps
1.2 30fps
1.5 20fps
という感じでした。
[spoiler] マネキン怖い [spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198170763711', 'num_games_owned': 285, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1482241480}
review:
Resident Evil 7 с первых минут хочется сравнить с Outlast. 
Потрясающая и зловещая атмосфера.
Разработчики пытаются не перезапустить серию, а попробовать себя в укрепившемся и нынче достаточно популярном поджанре FPS - хоррора, при этом не забывают захватить VR-аудиторию.
В принципе не страшно, если не играть.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034702307', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1482269742}
review: Sans être véritablement surpris après avoir traversé tremblotant de peur la démo, la découverte de Resident Evil 7 fut un moment à l'intensité rarement égalée. La survie prend tout son sens dans cet épisode en revenant aux fondamentaux qui faisaient la force de la saga par le passé, tout en innovant afin de convenir aux besoins du marché moderne. Attendre d'un survival-horror de finir traumatisé est un droit et le titre de Capcom relève le défi haut la main. Épuisant à parcourir et déconseillé aux cardiaques, RE7 se donne les moyens de ses ambitions et cherche avant tout à plaire aux fans de la première heure. Après un épisode 6 porté sur l'action, il est temps de prendre son courage à deux mains, recharger la pétoire de grand'pa et d'affronter nos peurs primaires. On soulignera tout de même un gros point négatif quant la première ouverture du jeu qui se fera en mode fenêtrée et aux maniaques de la configuration du clavier qui se feront avoir au mode QWERTY (en fait aucun bug, remettez le en mode plein écran, pas besoin de configurer le déplacement du personnage incarné)...

author: {'steamid': '76561198166824326', 'num_games_owned': 599, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1482239416}

author: {'steamid': '76561198093210889', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 206, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1485265078}
review:
Scary at first. Yeah, this game  just proves that mankind is only scared at the unkown. But when I've played this demo for about ten times in a row, the scary-shit scenes and jump scares won't scare me anymore. Anyways, this demo was good and it just proved that Capcom have actually learned to make a good PC port right off the bat before the release of a game. If this demo is very optimized on my four-year old PC, how much more at the release? I can only hope that this will be the case. With this in mind, I will surely buy the full game. 

I'd better start earning some money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087005744', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 334, 'last_played': 1483865019}
review:
the roots of Resident Evil are back in this title. item management, how to survive. oh i forgot. this game has so much mysteries and riddles. if you can't solve the riddles, maybe you have to look for the walkthrough.

and, be aware. this game is so horror. there are so many gimmicks that can make you 'jumpscare'

x4 845 standard clock + 8 gigs of RAM + GTX 1050 Ti can run this game with very high graphic settings @ 1080P and get approximately 60-80 FPS. love it!

for now, good job Capcom!

author: {'steamid': '76561198315283284', 'num_games_owned': 1064, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1483713141}
review:
打个完美结局真费时，我发现那个怪物是可以用那9发子弹打死的，只要可以保证至少4枪爆头那个怪，其他几发只要别打空枪，游戏会黑一下屏，然后那个怪就会消失。还有那个女鬼真难找
It indeed took me a long time to achieve a perfect ending, and I found that the monster could be killed with 9 bullets as long as you can shoot it in the head, and the ghost is really difficult to discover.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122309440', 'num_games_owned': 683, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1485575978}
review:
Resident Evil 7 / Biohazard 7 Teaser:Beginning Hour นั้นเป็นตัวเกมเดโมที่ออกมาตอน RE 7 เปิดตัวซึ่งสาวกคอนโซลน่าจะได้เล่นกันจนหน่ำแล้วล่ะ ซึ่งตัวเกมนั้นมีอะไรเปลี่ยนแปลงไปมากน้อยเพียงใด เชิญอ่านบทวิจารณ์ผมได้เลย (ส่วน Resident Evil ขอเรียกย่อว่า RE แล้วกันครับ เพราะมันยาว 5555+)

[b]เนื้อเรื่อง(Story)[/b]
โดยในเดโมนั้นจะยังไม่ได้มีรายละเอียดตัวเกมออกมามาก ซึ่งคุณจะได้รับบทเป็นชายคนหนึ่งที่ตื่นขึ้นมาบ้านร้างแห่งนี้ ซึ่งตัวคุณก็ไม่รู็เช่นกันว่ามาได้ยังไง แต่ซึ่งที่คุณรู้คือหาทางออกจากที่นี้ ในคหสต.ถือว่าเป็นเกม RE ที่ออกมาได้แปลกตาพอสมควร โดยที่ส่วนมาก RE จะเปิดตัวด้วยไวรัสหรือปรสิตถล่มเมือง แล้วก็ต้องมีผู้รอดชีวิตหาทางเอาตัวรอด ซึ่งทางผู้พัฒนาน่าจะเปลี่ยนบทไปมากพอสมควร ถึงว่าเปิดตัวได้อย่างลึกลับและน่าสนใจอย่างยิ่งครับ สำหรับการกลับมาครั้งนี้
[b]เกมเพล(Gameplay)[/b]
เป็นที่น่าตกใจมากที่ตัวเกมนั้นได้ใช้มุมมองบุคคลที่ 1 (FPS) โดยปกติที่คุ้นตาน่าเป็นมุมมองบุคคลที่ 3 มากกว่า 555+ (นอกเรื่องๆ) โดยเท่าที่ดูตัวเกมนั้นจะกลับเข้าสู่รากเหง้าของ RE โดยพอสมควร (ไม่เน้นเเอกชั้น เน้นปริศนา+ความสยองมากกว่า) ซึ่งขอยอมรับว่าทำได้ถูกทางพอสมควร ส่วนที่เหลือคงต้องดูตัวเต็มกันแล้วล่ะ ศัตรูภายในเดโมที่เจอมีเเค่ตัวเดียว นั้นคือสัตว์ประหลาดหรืออะไรสักอย่างไม่ทราบเช่นกัน (ให้เดาน่าเป็น B.O.W ไม่ก็ปรสิตมั้ง)
[b]กราฟิก(Graphic)[/b]
ขอบอกสั้นๆว่าออฟชั่นมันมีเยอะมาก มีให้ปรับทั้งเทคเจอร์,แสงเงา,พื้นผิว ฯลฯ โดยนั่งปรับไปก็งงกันไป 555+
กราฟิกนั้นได้ออกมาสมจริงดีครับ มีรายละเอียดที่ดูดีมาก เช่น อาหารเน่าจะมีแมลงสาบหรือหนอนไช่อยู่ซึ่งแสดงถึงความขยะแขยง+ชวนอ้วก ได้ดีครับ
[b]เพอฟอมเมินซ(Performance)[/b]
ตัวเกมเป็นเดโมเลยตัดสินไรมากไม่ได้ครับ แต่ยอมรับว่า การด์จอ GTX950M ผมนี้สามารถปรับเกือบสุดได้ Framerate 60+ ซึ่งเป็นการพอร์ทได้ดีมาก

สรุป
Resident Evil 7 หรือ Biohazard 7 Teaser อันนี้เป็นการเปิดสู่โลกเก่าและใหม่ของ Resident Evil ที่ทำได้แปลกตาและแปลกใจได้สมควร ซึ่งทางผมก็คงต้องรอตัวเต็มปล่อยออกมาแล้วพิสูจน์แล้วล่ะ

author: {'steamid': '76561197988436243', 'num_games_owned': 235, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1482238104}
review:
Nach ganzen 16 minuten schon durch XD Aber es gibt zu hoffen das es wieder richtig gut wird.
Auch wenn es für mich absolut nix mit RE 1-2-3 zu tun hat. die teile waren einfach die besten. Aber nach teil 6 kann es nur besser werden. Mir ist noch immer nicht klar wie man eine serie so versauen kann.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053517581', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1482236479}
review: Это НЕ RESIDENT EVIL! Это совсем другая игра! Неужели фантазии не хватило нормальное название придумать? Сделали глубоко вторичный клон и дали ему название легендарной серии. Я не знаю, как это оценивать. Играть не хочется. С другим названием, может и ничего было бы. Но когда такой клон называют  "новым взглядом" на игру легендарной серии, это просто обман. Печально это всё...

author: {'steamid': '76561198061544000', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1482837646}
review:
Finalmente un resident evil come si deve!!! prima o terza persona non importa, tutte e 2 le visuali hanno pro e contro, capcom ha rischiato molto mettendo la prima, ma se si vuole rivoluzionare la saga per migliorarla sotto tanti punti negativi che avevano i precedenti capitoli ben venga. Ho giocato molto ai precedenti e mi hanno divertito, però mancavano i salti sulla sedia, le munizioni limitate e quel senso di realismo di non di essere dei super soldati... Fortunatamente però hanno implementato un sistema di difesa con armi bianche e da fuoco, se l'avessero fatto come outlast l'avrei lasciato sullo scaffale siccome nei titoli nella quale bisogna solo scappare mi stanno sulle balle. Mi sento di dare una recensione positiva al gioco, sperando che la versione finale abbia un bel pò di contenuti da offrire.
Potete trovare qua sotto un video benchmark con un'i5 4690K ed una GTX 960 da 4GB, oltre al 1080p ho eseguito anche i test a 1440p e 4K, spero di essere d'aiuto a qualcuno. Forse passerò alla 1060, in caso se volete a breve qualche altro bench/risultati con settaggi appositi avete solo da chiedere.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=98UzCeiRpUk&t=2s

author: {'steamid': '76561198001045459', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1482233915}
review:
3 GB para una demo de 15 minutos en la que los escenarios se repiten varias veces???
Por otro lado, esto no es un Resident Evil. Cualquiera que jugara a los primeros (0-3) lo reconocerá. Han tomado el nombre para sacar provecho.
Si buscas un Resident Evil te sentiras engañado... aqui solo tienes el título (Es como si a Motorstorm le llamaran Gran Turismo). Si quieres un juego de terror tipo The Evil Within quizás este pueda servir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198305666565', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1599745050}
review:
Dated looking graphics and terrible horror cliché but nice try Capcom.

I admit it tries hard to emulate the original PSOne RE game but the game design is totally baffling. 

Objects magically appear or disappear depending on my actions (eg. backdoor key). When I finally got the handgun, the basement monster decides not to show up despite appearing every other time I'm unarmed in the basement. Great timing!

The gameplay is also too rigid. For example, I need a bolt cutter to cut the chains but I can't used my handgun to shoot it? Of course not, this isn't that type of game.

Please buy The Evil Within instead of this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042506408', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1482233054}
review:
Потрясающе! Вставляет так же, как в своё время вставлял Outlast, на него же всё действо и похоже больше всего (и играется получше, чем, собственно, демка второго Outlast).

Можно пробежать за 3-5 минут, ничего не увидеть и ничего не понять.
Можно углубиться в исследование дома и за полчаса получить концовку получше.
А можно вооружиться советами бывалых (или уймой терпения и свободного времени) и залипнуть часа на два, расследовать несколько убийств, увидеть призраков, получить истинную концовку и некую загадочную няшку, которую можно будет перенести в большую игру.

author: {'steamid': '76561198320688028', 'num_games_owned': 293, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1485174612}
review: 伴随着轻度的头晕和让人不太习惯的视角，我真切的感受到，恐怖游戏的鼻祖，生化危机又回来了，这些年，已经记不清玩了多少，不管是恶灵附体，还是寂静岭，又或者是鬼屋魔影，从最开始的恐惧，变为杀戮的快感，从受害者慢慢演变为施虐者，从胆怯的男孩变为坚定的无神论者，年龄的增长，眼界的开阔，让我无所畏惧，所向披靡，每一颗子弹都毫无感情，亦不用思考，我的手从来不抖，以前是为了生存，后来是为了杀戮，所到之处，尸横遍野，剩下了空虚与麻木，感受不到任何情感的波动，这次的生化危机，让我再次感觉到了那种感觉，对未知的恐惧，每次推开一扇门，我都能感受到自己的紧张，这种久违的感觉，希望正式版不要让我失望

author: {'steamid': '76561197972310542', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1482285595}
review: Very cool way to do a demo, the devs seem to have jammed a boatload of secrets and different ways to beat this teaser. I am now looking forward to Res Evil 7.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026300512', 'num_games_owned': 479, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 180, 'last_played': 1482315729}
review:
Great Teaser/Demo. Definitely makes me want to play more and hypes me up for the full game.

Phenomenal graphics and sound design, well placed horror elements and generally scares you at all times without resorting to cheap jumpscares. It runs really well, too.

I'm not even bothered much by the fact that this is a Resident Evil game, this is definitely better than some of the more recent games and I'm definitely looking forward to it. Seriously some may be bothered that this is carrying the name RE but if the full game is just like this demo, then I'll be very pleased.

It's free anyway so why not give it a try?

author: {'steamid': '76561198069735211', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1482228169}
review: Now THIS is the appropriate direction future Resident Evil games should go in. I will admit I miss the over the top perspective of the classic games (1,2,3,CV) and do not expect those to ever return but first person is truthfully the next best choice.  It is Incredibly immersive and adds to the atmosphere and overall spooky vibe of the game. This is a complete 180 from the awful mess 6 turned out to be.  If this teaser is truly indicative of the full game on release, then we are all in store for one of the greatest horror experiences yet.  Bravo, Capcom.  Bravo

review: Сразу понятно что тут даже радом с RE не стояло,кто то пишет я так долго ждал такого RE что?Такого Re?Настоящего хоррора,такми хоррорами как этот, забит весь интернет. Тут даже близко нпичего нет от старыго доброго RE,какието паранормальные передвижения объектов,какието маньяки,непонятно что это за игра,толи скример,толи хз что это,скинули все г в одну такрелку и перемешали.Только и видно графа у круто,вот и все комменты.Или кто там бегает вещи у тебя за спиной передвигает,или брасает их из за угла,зомби? или маньяк решил тебя попугать бегая и раскидывая вещи,и со скоростью света передвигая их за спиной,Игра ни чего общего с Re не имеет и ненстанет им не когда.Подходящее название для игры,Паранормальные Маньяки,или Выживи или здохни,кароче -10,графой одной не будешь сыт.Как фанатам не рекомендую как графодрочерам то ради бога.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984240274', 'num_games_owned': 2708, 'num_reviews': 460, 'playtime_forever': 89, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1482227222}
review: W sumie, to ze "starego, dobrego" Resident Evil niewiele tu zostało. Mam wrażenie, że twórcy bardziej chcieli pójść w kierunku współczesnych horrorów typu jump-scare i jednocześnie wykorzystać anulowanie wyczekiwanego Silent Hills. Demo klimatem bardzo przypomina to, co mogliśmy zobaczyć w Silent Hills P.T.. Osobiście mnie nie porwało, aczkolwiek fanom Outlasta i tego typu gierek, z pewnością przypadnie do gustu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028552126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 602, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1485242523}
review:
EDITO:
Mis impresiones tras el parche de hoy 27/12, con el que por fin puedo correr el juego (sin el parche me crasheaba justo al darle a jugar, ni siquiera iniciaba).

Por fin he podido jugar y dedicarle unas 3 horas para ver qué nos ofrece este nuevo Re7 y también he estado jugueteado con el nuevo RE Engine a ver qué es capaz de hacer en términos de optimización, etc.

He de decir que me sorprende gratamente esta vuelta de tuerca que Capcom ha querido darle a su franquicia estrella y bajo mi punto de vista si el juego nos ofrece más de lo que hemos visto en esta demo y en grandes cantidades, yo firmo para que continuen por este camino.

La sensación de "no saber" y "no ser consciente" de esta nueva perspectiva en la serie están muy bien conseguidas. En todo juego de terror y superviviencia que se precie, el desconocer lo que puede haber tras de nosotros es un "must", y en esto, este nuevo Re7 saca sobresaliente. Mirar hacia atrás y con el rabillo del ojo, cada esquina, cada recoveco, avanzando con más miedo que vergüenza es, para mí, todo un acierto en este nuevo amanecer de la saga. Además  jugablemente la verdad es que Capcom lo ha llenado de contenido y si esto es un atisbo de lo que podrá hacerse en el producto completo, lo alabo totalmente. 

El nuevo RE Engine se mueve fenomenal y fluido, y aunque no es especialmente impresionante, creo que va a cumplir sobradamente para con el título, ya que le sienta genial y le da a Resident Evil nuevos niveles de realismo que en mi opinión ya iban haciendo falta. Algún que otro problema me ha dado la oclusión ambiental, con algunos pequeños drops en el framerate y con las sombras, que parece ser que son demasiado demandantes en este nuevo motor gráfico, pero como esto aún es una demo no me voy a poner quisquilloso a ese respecto. En términos generales se mueve genial y sin despeinarse.

Por tanto, y de momento, me alegra cambiar mi "no recomendación" por un "sí, señor, recomendado" y esperar a que llegue la fecha de su lanzamiento y ver si el producto completo es capaz de ofrecer lo que esta gran demo promete: un nuevo resurgir y un nuevo enfoque a una gran saga que ha ido perdiendo un poco el fuelle y la identidad durante los últimos años.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026156889', 'num_games_owned': 2161, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1482158799}
review:
Es una demo, así que tampoco es que haya mucho que opinar, veo que en los análisis algunos hasta lo critican como si fuera el juego completo xDDD las cosas que hay que leer.
Peeero que no sea el juego completo, no significa que uno no pueda opinar de lo que se ve en esta demo, lo más vistoso del cambio es que sea en primera persona, a los fans de los originales esto es lo que seguramente más les choque, yo que no me considero fan, también me siento raro jugandolo, es una demo "Corta" que se alarga más si te propones sacar los demás finales, que si, tiene más de 1.
También hay un item extra bastante rebuscado que parece ser que se guarda para los que compren el juego y así poder transferirlo (Sinceramente mucho no me interesa, lo conseguí por exprimir la demo simplemente)
Lo sentí como una mezcla de Outlast y Layers of Fear, incluso tirando a cosas sobrenaturales a lo Silent Hill, pero hay que diferenciar, la demo si me gustó, me entretuvo que es lo que importa, el problema es que con el FFXV está pasando lo mismo, a gente le "entretiene" pero cuando ves que tiene de título Final Fantasy la cosa cambia, acá lo mismo, el juego lo veo con potencial, el problema es que detrás está el título Resident Evil y más importante, Capcom (Con las cagadas que se mandó últimamente) Pero tengo esperanzas en que, aunque sea en primera persona, vuelva a esa sensación Survival de los primeros, y que no sea simplemente un paseo con screamers, unos puzzles y algún que otro enfrentamiento, me dijeron que volvía el baúl para guardar cosas, en la demo no lo ví, y no he visto videos al respecto (Falta de interés supongo) Pero si es verdad, tal vez no esté todo tan perdido.
Tiene algunos problemas de rendimiento teniendo todo al máximo, pero con el mensaje que sale al principio del juego lavándose las manos de errores y que el soporte técnico no iba a responder, creo que se entiende jajaja.
La demo es gratis, así que para quien la quiera probar ahí está, a mi me dejó con un sabor agridulce, no sé si me gusta o no los cambios, es rarísimo, necesito ver el juego completo para poder saber, esto es una simple demo.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q2BiieApPhw

author: {'steamid': '76561198071855164', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1482932096}
review:
Vraiment pas mal. Il est évident (pour moi) que l'on s'approche d'un Outlast. Coté graphisme c'est beau mais au niveau texturing de près je m'attendais à mieux (peut-être qu'il y aura un DLC texture HD). L'ambiance est tendue à mort, on préfère largement marché que courrir. J'ai régler la luminosité avec les conseils du jeu, je trouve que la pseudo lampe de poche n'apporte pas assez de lumière et qu'il y a des grosses phases de noir, mais c'est aussi ce qui fait flipper.
J'ai fini la démo une fois basique, en fait je pense avoir fait le chemin le plus rapide pour la terminée. Du coup j'ai recommencé et trouver d'autres indices et surprenant c'est comme si je l'avais faite à l'envers. On peut trouver une arme dans cette démo, et tirer sur du Monster ! mais corriace, j'ai perdu à ce moment là. Je vais la refaire une troisième fois. Enfin pour finir, coté ambiance Resident Evil d'autrefois pour l'instant je ne ressent rien, pas de musique angoissante, pas de petit point de sauvegarde à la musique douce (et oui la musique ça y fait pour beaucoup), sauf peut-être une petite mise en bouche avec un indice laisser sur une table...umbrella...c'est vraiment le seul point qui me fait peur, je souhaite vraiment que ça monte crescendo expérimentation secrète etc...Bon voilà ça me donne quand même envie de jouer au reste du jeu, c'est déjà bien !

author: {'steamid': '76561198056186683', 'num_games_owned': 374, 'num_reviews': 251, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1482215276}
review:
I'm glad the focus is back on horror but at the end of the day all that matters to me is how good the game is. Fear is subjective and all but Resident Evil 7 wasn't scary to me. Not at all. It's still a decent game/teaser but I don't get the point of a demo where you don't actually get a sample of as core mechanic that is being in danger of being killed as you aren't being stalked by anyone. Yes the house groans and creaks but it's just ambient noises not the enemy. The point of puzzles in a horror game is to make it so your worried about solving them without being killed in the proccess by it or an enemy or killed on your way to the puzzle but here it's just dull wandering and lazy oops I fell off a shelf happenings.

It's not like you'll be hiding from your captor patrolling the house as you search for puzzle peices, trying to pu the peices together when ever there's a gap in his patrol for a breif moment before you go back into hiding. Instead you'll wander until you beat the demo and a cutscene kills you. I assume what I described above about hiding from hillbilly ganados will be in the final game but that's just an assumption. It does at least put the Resident and Evil back in Resident Evil. Try it for yourself as your milage may vary.

It controls well too but there were some bizzare immersion breaking flaws in the camera man section related to his hands being at his sides on his shadow {meaning that his head is a VHS camera) and how he climbs down a ladder with both hands whilst still supposedly holding a camera.I'm impressed by the port/version. Great new engine when compared to the MT Frameworks engine that was last used in Resident Evil Revelations 2. This and MGS:GZ/MGSV:TPP are the best "ports" I've seen in recent memory. Turn off the shader cache if your having trouble performance wise and watch the frames soar. It has a lot of graphics options for tweaking and thankfully the FOV can be defaulted to 90 which will make sure you don't get motion sick. My only complaints are it's lack of proper 8 MSAA or 21:9 support PC wise.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978131107', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 212, 'playtime_forever': 152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1482211860}
review: Hideo Kojima may no longer captain the helm of this industry flagship of stealth based RPG horror, but it's safe to say that it's in good hands under new management. My only complaint is that it's not very realistic ;-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198120722914', 'num_games_owned': 625, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1487935442}
review: 总的来说，这款demo展示的内容确实让我感到了老生化的感觉，子弹永远是不够的，存档可能由于一个小失误就不能再玩出好结局了，对环境物体的应用来对抗你几乎没法直接对付的怪物，非常复杂的解密，刻画人性的剧情，以及怪物之所以是怪物不是因为它被感染才是怪物，它本身内心就是一个怪物，这些非常精细的类似初代的设定被网上一堆浮躁的人直接说成了逃生续作，寂静岭续作，不像生化危机。然而我觉得除了主角换了之外，其他几乎所有元素都是历代生化里有的。逃跑为主基调的生化3，解密为主的生化0。1，这些游戏的影子在这作都能找到，生化粉们有什么不满的呢？就因为换了个视角？fps做视角的恐怖游戏不比tps氛围更好？就因为主角不认识？那些老人是不是等到80岁还要继续战斗啊？

review: Um clima tenso, um ambiente sonoro foda, puzzles especias, fugir de maneira difícil, lutar bem ou morrer. Munições contadas e uma experiência de terror bom! Consigo sentir o clima de Resident Evil ainda... A demo está bem otimizada e vale muito a pena a experiência. Muito recomendado! Aumentou muito o Hype pro jogo completo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198154393081', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1482229799}
review:
This is my first impression of Resident Evil 7 biohazard.

The story is about some sort of deranged or yet let me say the profanity, fucked up family living in an abandoned house, solving the family murder mystery. It's a first person camera view and the horror vibes are there as well. There's some puzzle sections as well, similar to its predecessor Resident Evil (talking about Resident Evil 1 and 2). I hope they will implement the item management before full game release. The sound design, hands down, the scariest and immersive sound design that made me scared (I played this game at day and still scared from sound design). Speaking of full release, this game is on demo, so they have time to add the features. On perfomance, this game runs surprisingly well on my rig (AMD FX 8350 @ 4.2 GHz, 8GBs RAM Dual Channel and GTX 1070) at 1080p. Thank god, it is not the terrible PC port. There are 3 endings in the game and murders that need to be solved if you want to (I didn't know that puzzle exists until I watch the murder mystery solved on Youtube). To be honest, I cannot wait for this game to come out and play the game at night time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198220684176', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1575323158}
review:
Resident Evil 7 (ou BioHazard 7) Mesmo com a mudança de camera que vem mudando antes começou com camera fixa depois camera em terceira pessoa e agora em primeira pessoa. Confesso que em primeira pessoa você consegue ter um pouco mais de medo do que em Terceira pessoa pois você tá na pele do personagem eu fiz o final ''Welcome to the Family Son'' e o infectado ainda não fiz o Bom :p continuando os graficos são bons não chegam a ser a MELHOR COISA EVER mas é rasuavel. 

Vantagens: 

Graficos bons. 

Jogabilidade Boa.

Medo grande. 

Desvantagem.

não sei se é meu PC mas quando eu boto em 60 FPS pelas configurações o personagem anda MAIS LENTO enquanto o jogo EM SI Continua normal. '-'

author: {'steamid': '76561198060483285', 'num_games_owned': 387, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1482229030}
review:
[h1]クッソ怖い[/h1]
　ながらく三人称視点を基本としたサバイバルホラーを世に送り出してきたバイオハザードシリーズ（Wii用のレールガンシューティングを除く）ですが、今回プレイヤーは一人称視点でサバイバルするらしいです。
　さて体験版をプレイしての感想ですが、もともとホラーは少々苦手な私で、プレイするこれが一人称視点となるとこれがものすごく怖い。館内の雰囲気やサウンド関連もよく出来ており、何かそこにいるのではないかという気持ちを常にプレイヤーに持たせてくれるホラーテイストに仕上がっています。近年リリースされたバイオハザードは[strike]ゴリラっぽい[/strike]ホラー？という印象が強かったので、それもあいまって製品版を非常に期待できる体験版だったと思います。
　また、PC版では気になるグラフィック面ですが、綺麗な割に重くはないと個人的には評価しています。GTX980Tiシングルで最高設定でも60fps付近を行ったり来たりするので十分だと私は思います。

[spoiler]ネタバレ追記
　少々苦戦もありましたが、無事True End到達、及び汚れたコイン入手完了しました。特典が楽しみですね。
　自分は少し手間取ったので恐らく楽になるだろう攻略のコツを置いておきます。まず地下室のモールデッドとの初遭遇ですが、すぐにバルブを取りそのままダッシュで戻ってWを押したままF連打で扉を蹴り開けましょう。ギリギリ攻撃を食らわずに脱出できます。斧で応戦するのは難しいと思います。
　その後ハンドガンを入手したら地下室に戻り、モールデッドを撃破します。撃破は彼の足を5回撃つことで可能です。この時ドア付近を行ったり来たりして狙いやすい位置にスポーンするまで出待ちするのが良いでしょう。撃破後はリスポーンしないため、楽に攻略ができます。
　また、手帳の5つ目のヒントを出現させるにはビデオ内で幽霊を見る必要があります。一箇所だけでも見つけられればそこでフラグが立つので、出るまで再生するのがいいと思います。[/spoiler]

review:
No seré tan hater, este juego está inspirado claramente en el clásico de Konami pero me sorprendió esta demo, se puede decir que logra lo prometido en darle una vuelta de tuerca que tanto pedían los fans de la saga ahora con esta temática mas la VR (la cual es para nada necesaria en realidad).

Suspenso, muy buenos graficos y a pesar de lo que diga la página las specs están infladas, así que correrá en varios PCs, habrá que esperar si se liga de alguna forma a la cronologia original (de lo cual estoy seguro por las plagas).

8.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198067990522', 'num_games_owned': 1016, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 498, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 498, 'last_played': 1482349751}
review:

review: 怎么说呢？我是第一次在STEAM上评论也是第一次玩生化系列的作品，听说这次的不像以往，回归正统所以玩了下，玩的过程中无论是恐怖的氛围塑造还是优化都是十分的不错，而且还有简体中文，好评!如果出了完整版，在手头紧张有余钱的情况下这是一个适合入手的一个游戏，最后希望后面的内容不要出现什么大问题，结束！

author: {'steamid': '76561197980694947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 182, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1482207851}
review:
Lets start with performances.  I had no crash or shutter issues, the game ran smooth.  I was able to play the game at 4K with everything maxed at rock solid 60fps with my 1080GTX.  So thumbs up for an excellent port so far. Creepy atmosphere and excellent sounds for the few legit scares.  At first it didn't feel like an RE game but after a while playing it you can get a sense of the old RE.  In terms of trial and error and different ways of approaching a scenario and multiple endings depend on what you do.  Remeber the load doors of RE? well thats gone but its smartly implemented by having you open the door slowly because of the anticipation of whats behind it.  The speed you open it is up to you.  I really like that.  

I managed to only get 2 of the bad ending and not the good ending.  I will have to try again.  This was what made the old RE so much fun.  Going back and trying new things.  So far I'm very excited what I experinced and looking forward to the final product.  Good Demo from CAPCOM.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997251990', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1601753242}
review:
Is recht lieb umgesetzt. Hat sehr stark den Charakter des Originalen Blair Witch Films mit Videokamera, VHS Kassetten und Grain-Effekten. Auch der interaktive Videorückblick, in diesem quasi wie von einem Wink aus der Vergangenheit mitgeteilt wird, wie es als nächstes für den Protagonisten vorangeht, ist eine Willkommene alternative als banal anzuzeigen: " da is der Pfeil , da musst hin den Schalter musst drücken dann passiert das und das".

 Alles in allem kein RE, mit klassischen Blick AUF den Protagonisten, sei es jetz von Überwachungsakamerasicht oder aber Schulterblick 3rd Person, NEIN! Keines von Beiden wird bedient. Die beklemmende durch den schwarzen Rand der nunmal nur rundleuchtenden Taschenlampe begrenzten EGOPERSPEKTIVE entsteht somit eine Szenerie im RE Universum, die seinesgleichen zumindest im Bereich rund um RE bis dato noch nicht bedient hat. Wer allerdings die Spiele SOMA, Dread Out und Amnesia kennt, wird sich auch hier gleich heimisch fühlen. Ob auch, wie diesen soeben genannten, bei RE der Geisteszstand einfluss haben wird ist leider im doch sehr kurzen TeaserDemo nicht ersichtlich gewesen. 

Unterm Strich ein recht solider kurzer Ausflug aber dennoch kann ich bei so kurzer Zeit nicht sagen ob es gut war oder doch nur eine Handbremsenaktion von CAPCOM, um auf den Zug des VR aufspringen zu können.....somit verbleibt mir nur zu empfehlen: Wer sich gerne in EGO-Sicht bewegt und ein klein wenig auf Horror und Psycho steht ist hier sicherlich auf der richtigen fährte. Und wer das nicht tut is hier definitiv nicht ganz richtig. Einen Actionkracher wie Teil 4, 5 und 6 is hier bestimmt nicht versteckt und ist sicherlich auch nicht gewollt.
 Die richtung ist klar vorgegeben. 
Und es ist gut das RE wieder an die Anfänge anknüpfen möchte ein Horrorshockspiel zu sein und keine kommerzielle Einheitsplörre.

 Mich persönlich freut es das RE diesen Weg geht, auch wenn ich mir wieder die Kameraperspektiven von 1,2,3 und Code Veronica zurückgewünscht hätte....aber das ist eine andere Geschichte.

author: {'steamid': '76561198301025287', 'num_games_owned': 352, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1484636072}
review:
The Resident Evil 7 teaser was fantastic! Capcom did an excellent job at capturing the eerie atmosphere of an unkempt, dilapidated homestead; very reminiscent of Texas Chainsaw Massacre and/or House of 1,000 Corpses.

The teaser also ran very smoothly on my machine, which has an i7-4790k 4.00 GHz, 32 GB, and a GTX 1080, at max settings.

I've always been a fan of the Resident Evil series, but started to lose interest after 4. Although this is quite different from the previous versions, I do think it's a step in the right direction. The new gameplay mechanics and atmosphere will breath new life into the Resident Evil series.

I highly recommend trying the Resident Evil 7 teaser!

author: {'steamid': '76561198029126609', 'num_games_owned': 428, 'num_reviews': 147, 'playtime_forever': 83, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1482198626}
review:
Overall its a really impressive demo. It sold me on the game and actually lined out how its probably gonna play like. 

Its got a fair amount of content, gameplay, secrets and replayibility. It looks pretty good and is well optomized as well. It certianly has more going for it than PT and the Outlast 2 demo. (No disrespect for PT its a great demo but RE7 demo has a lot more to it, and is actually coming out unlike silent hills RIP)

Its really fun going back to it a few times and finding secrets (sometimes by complete accident) and going for diffirent endings. Figuring out the level the first time was interesting too. Its not from the main game but a side story of it thats for sure. So nothing is really spoiled either which is a big plus. 

If you ask me its more like Resident evil 1-3 than RE 4-6 ever were. 

A+ really impressive and worth a shot for horror fans

author: {'steamid': '76561198092316088', 'num_games_owned': 525, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1483753386}
review:
La masacre de texas,digo.... resident evil 7 Demo definitivamente me ha gustado este cambio sobre todo porque ahora ya no encontraremos 30 balas de una si no como maximo 3 o 2 balas.esta claro que los baker no seran nuestros unicos enemigos ya que en el sotano hay un amigable "zombie" que es igual a los regeneradores de resident evil 4 pero no es el mismo ya que este maldito bicho intuyo que te seguiran a cualquier parte ya que ellos se disuelven como agua y pueden aparecer y esconderse cuando quieran,otra cosita que me gusto es que vuelven los puzzles osea que tendremos que estar atentos otra vez a todas las pistas que nos pongan,en eso la primera persona lo hace perfecto ya que nos permitira estar mas atentos al Entorno y no perdernos tanto aunque de todas formas el juego se basara en una casa o mansion de los baker aunque eso es solo en la demo en lo personal seria increible que la mansion solo sea una fase del juego y que podamos salir afuera u almenos a otros lugares,definitivamente este juego se ve que prometera aunque me hubiera gustado que hagan como en varios juegos y poder poner en tercera persona y primera persona para el gusto de los jugadores aunque en lo personal me gustan las 2,tambien esperemos que haya zombies clasicos y jefes con mutaciones como las de Birkin,tyrant o nemesis eso estaria muy bueno,se que esto es una demo y probablemente no tenga nada que ver con el juego final en el que espero que este Leon <3 sin embargo se ve que este juego promete bastante,me senti bastante nervioso cuando jugaba la demo, no solo la emocion si no algo que no sentia desde el ultimo resident evil clasico que jugue el cual fue "code veronica" se nota que estaremos con mucho suspenso, sin mas que decir bonita demo aunque algo corta,precompren el juego ya <3
PD: Conseguir La moneda sucia cuesta lo suyo sobre todo por el el tema del fantasma jeje ojala den algo bonito para cuando salga el juego a cambio de esa moneda.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038552524', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1482200829}
review:
Waited so long for the demo to come to PC! If you have yet to try it or wondering if you should, JUST TRY IT BRO.

Experienced very smooth gameplay, no lags, no glitches, no nothing.

Horror would be the first word that came to mind when playing this demo~ the atmosphere gives off that vibe~ you never know when the scares are coming xP

My first playthrough was quick as I had the bad ending, running around, get that bolt cutter, watch the video, found a key, saw a man, get out of the house only to be welcomed to the family.

Second playthrough, I got the infected after getting whacked by an infected while trying to get the door opened.

Third playthrough was the longest, I spent 2 hours+ on this one to solve the five murders with the dummy finger. 

I spent most time on getting the last giggle! I got stuck for a long while before I searched online and turns out, you have to watch the video tape twice in a row in order to see some ghosts sighting (I saw mine on the stairs, not sure about other sightings, it was really quick to show and up and disappear, I thought it was the broken neck ghost from Fatal Frame for a second there xD), I solved all the murders and got a dirty coin (which will be transfered to the main game) as a reward before I head out of the attic for the true ending.

I got an axe to whack that photo frame so the gun was useless for me, didn't get to fire it at anything,

Most painful experience of this demo for me is the video watching as it was slow... really slow... I watched it eight times because I didn't know I have to watch it twice in a row before I went to see that doll on the floor in the basement..

This demo made me even more exicted for the day of the release!

I love the games series, it doesn't matter if it's horror or action, I love the Resident Evil franchise except for the live action movies. Loving the series ever since I played Resident Evil 3 back in 1999.

This review came from a fan who started playing Resident Evil since 1999 when she was five going six xP

author: {'steamid': '76561198010015660', 'num_games_owned': 1305, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1482200644}
review:
First person shooter where you can't aim down your sights. No thanks. 


What, you want more than that? [i]Fine[/i]...


Re7 looks to be a very atmospheric game. Sound design is nice, graphics are very nice, the overall design is good. But Capcom has apparently decided to reinvent the wheel this time around, and pretend no one has made a shooter since [i]Quake[/i]. So, rather than the smoothly fluid combat system we had in Re6, we get a really clunky, awkward, right-at-home-in-[i]Left 4 Dead[/i] setup that's just disappointing. 

"But it's horror!" you insist. "You shouldn't be...comptent."

Well, actually, no. And in any case, I don't think it's that hard to grasp those funny little notches on top of your gun are for aiming. You can't actually aim your gun; instead, you kind of awkwardly squint at the side of it and a little glowing dot that magically appears in the center of the screen, ala [i]Fallout 3[/i]. You know what's not a good shooter? [i]Fallout 3[/i]. So maybe Capcom shouldn't be borrowing outdated mechanics from bad games that aren't even in their genre.

Melee in [i]Resident Evil[/i] has always been awkward, apart from [i]Deadly Silence[/i] on the DS (seriously, go buy that game; it's great)  and of course, the newer games, and Capcom has managed to emulate the older game's irritating habit of colliding with objects you can't see very well but not actually managing to hit the enemy. You have an axe, and while this is somewhat useful for breaking things, and would probably be handy if I ever need to start a fire, in combat its only real utility appears to be ramping up the tension by getting stuck in [i]every[/i] [i]single[/i] [i]model[/i] except what you're actually trying to hit. Yeah, pass.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001221200', 'num_games_owned': 1163, 'num_reviews': 169, 'playtime_forever': 229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1489104437}
review:
As far the demo was, it played rather nicely for me with no crashes. There isn't much to speak of in combat outside of being confronted by a monster that you will try to shoot at or knockdown with a nearby object. The demo however does prove to be atmospheric for those willing to listen to their surroundings as they try to escape the derelict home of a family man.

If one wants to know how the finished product will be, the demo will give on an impression to show whether or not the game itself may be worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057232770', 'num_games_owned': 854, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1482199333}
review:
I won't review this as much as i'll just describe my opinion on the PC port and some things about the demo. 
This is mostly a PC Port analysis.
It's a very good demo that captures the feeling of PT, except not as crazily scary, but it is crazily detailed. The demo is great, really. The issue comes by something else; The PC Port. It runs absolutely smoothly but the game does consistently crash if you're in windowed mode and you minimize it, and if you minimize it while in full screen it'll just lead to a black screen, making you Ctrl+Alt+Tab and close the game by Task Manager which seems terrible and it is just as annoying as it sounds. Trying to do the secret coin ending is pretty shit as if you die by the monster, and start over, it'll just give you the audio and a frozen black screen and audio continues perfectly but it's still frozen, it also happens whenever you leave the Options Menu which sucks, but that one is only temporairly. Overall it is a great port although there are some issues, great optimization, only issue is that it is crashy and rough around the edges but if you play it nicely you won't get issues. 

10/10 for Demo
8.5/10 for PC Port (7 or 6 if it wasn't because of Optimization)
Definately recommended for lovers of survival horror games, or lovers of horror, GOOD HORROR, in general.

author: {'steamid': '76561198139991464', 'num_games_owned': 124, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1482738315}
review:
关于 这个游戏 的设置问题：
1： 游戏默认50hz的屏幕刷新率，所以请调成60，否则会感觉鼠标慢
2：游戏的声音默认是小动态，调成大动态，否则声音渣渣；另外模拟环绕声也别开，开了以后定位反而不好。

GTX1060 i5 6500 ：除了那个内部分辨率默认1，1080p下别的全部开到最吃配置的特效，开同步垂直，稳定60fps。

内容评价（有轻微剧透）：[spoiler] 难度一般（之前有幸玩过PS4版本的），气氛营造的相当恐怖，不过那个[i] 造型呆呆的怪兽	[/i] 一出场，瞬间没有恐怖气氛了，让人感觉：小孩子玩意儿，也就那样。	[/spoiler]

review: Это просто феноменально! С выходом 5 части я засомневался в адекватности Capcom, и в том что они делают с по настоящему культовой, и мною так любимой серией. А когда вышла 6 часть, я мягко говоря был шокирован, и готов уже похоронить для себя всю серию. Теперь вышла эта демка, и это что-то невероятное. В игру вернулись головоломки, в игру вернулась давящяя атмосфера, в игру вернулось чувство одиночества и опасности. Если они еще и сейвы на пишущих машинках сделают... Вобщем демку я советую обсолютно всем, а если и игра не подкачает, то она займет почетное место в моей коллекции.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059860637', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1482600576}
review:
Como juego de horror en primera persona claro que lo recomiendo, esta muy bien cuidado y muy bien optimizado, pero como fan de la saga de RE debo decir que de Resident Evil no tiene casi nada (pese a ser un survival horror en primera persona), mas bien parece ser un clon bien hecho de Outlast y del cancelado Silent Hills (PT). 

Corre sin problemas a 45 - 50 fps con una GTX 960, Core i7 y 8GB Ram. 

Recomendado si buscas un buen juego de horror, pero no esperes que sea fiel al nombre de Resident Evil, si buscas un RE clásico mejor espera el Remake de Resident Evil 2, o compra los excelentes remakes de Resident Evil 1 y Resident Evil 0. 

Por mi parte si lo compraré, hay un mundo de diferencia entre lo poco que se ve de RE7 y el horrendo Resident Evil 6, me temía lo peor con RE7 pero su calidad como juego de horror promete mucho (debo aclarar que RE5 si me gusto).

author: {'steamid': '76561198075188416', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1482132570}
review:
[h1] Uma pequena DEMOnstração da volta ao Horror de Sobreviência [/h1]

Foram 20 anos de muitas sensações diferentes passando pelos títulos da série Resident Evil. Um jogo que revolucionou com o terror de sobrevivência, e que deixou sua marca ao longo dos anos, mas que se perdeu em meio ao apelo do mercado, e passou por uma crise de identidade, fazendo com que até mesmo os fãs se perguntassem: O que faz de Resident Evil o clássico que conquistou legiões de fãs e criou um nome de tanto peso na indústria dos games?

Seria a câmera travada e com ângulos diferentes limitando a visão nos cenários? Seria o clima claustrfóbico de uma mansão bizarra e a trilha sonoro arrepiante e envolvente? Seriam os zumbis...Ah os nossos queridos zumbis e toda a trupe de armas biológicas? Seria então a escasses de munição e gerenciamento de itens, ou até mesmo o enredo de filme B repleto de clichês e momentos de vergonha alheia com péssimas atuações na dublagem?

Bom, eu poderia listar mais um monte de elemento que se é enfiado goela abaixo pelos pseudo fãs que não admitem que a evolução é algo necessário pra que um jogo, mesmo que este tenha uma identidade própria, [i]"sobreviva. "[/i]

Mais do mesmo faz perder o interesse e o brilho, e com certeza Resident Evil já triunfou na mudança e fracassou inúmeras vezes também na mesma.

Com a ação trazida no revolucionário Resident Evil 4, e uma nova ameaça de pragas controladas, tornando as pessoas fantoches bem aproveitados e não meros zumbis sem inteligência, nos deparamos com mudança pra melhor na série, que mesmo de uma modo diferente, ainda nos trazia a sensação familiar de estarmos por nossa conta, em uma luta pra sobreviver à uma enrascada pesada envolvendo muito sangue, cabeças explodindo e novas mecânicas que vieram com a nova geração de consoles da época.

A Capcom então, decidiu por mergulhar de cabeça na ação, e deixou de lado elementos ainda existentes em Resident Evil 4, que tornavam a franquia atrativa pros fãs da série e com um ar de renovação. Surgiu então, Resident Evil 5, que de Resident Evil trouxe toneladas a menos de elementos de horror de sobrevivência, apenas contando a história iniciada na mansão Spencer nas montanhas Arklay ao estilo Call of Duty, muita meleca preta, batalhas épicas contra criaturas gigantes que mais pareciam os chefes de um game de God of War e Wesker, o novo escolhido da Matrix pra liderar Zion à vitória sobre as máquinas.

Nesse ponto, Resident Evil já não era de fato, o mesmo jogo que nos arrancou sustos e momentos de desespero na pele de Jill e Chris, mas sim, um jogo repleto de ação que deixou muitos insatisfeitos, e acabou criando um novo vírus: 

                                                                             [b] [i] PreFM - Virus [/i] [/b]


[i] PSEODUS RESEVIL FANS MIMUS [/i] , ou como eu gosto de chamar os pseudos fãs mimados de Resident Evil.

Este vírus se propagou criando armas biológicas capazes de apenas com o som estridente do choro, e com a incrível agilidade de escrever um texto mal feito e mal formatado, repleto de erros de concordância gramatical, queimar os olhos e derretes os ouvidos de suas vítimas.

Resident Evil então, passou de um survival horror com crise de identidade e cheio de ação, pra uma briguinha idiota entre crianças mimadas, e uma empresa que mal sabia o mal residente que havia criado.

No meio desse fogo cruzado, nós, os verdadeiros fãs da série, e principalmente fãs do gênero, nos viamos rodeados por um shooter capenga, histórias mal feitas e a salada mais impossível de engolir do mundo que continha de tudo um pouco de cada um dos jogos até então lançados da série: Residentt Evil 6.

O jogos foi um fracasso, pois na tentativa de agradar os [i] PSEODUS RESEVIL FANS MIMUS [/i] e ainda vender pros amantes de ação e jogos de guerra, a série Resident Evil se perdeu em definitivo,e precisava de uma desintoxicação urgente.

E no meio desse caos, séries spin-offs como Revelations, Remasterizações e remake, fizeram grande parte desse clareamento na até então visão embaçada da Capcom que seguia em um caminho totalmente perdido.

A Capcom percebeu que não era A nem muito menos B que definiam o que era ou não Resident Evil, mas sim a sensação que causava em cada pessoa que jogava, e cada detalhe que chamava a atenção, não se prendendo à uma regra, e sim há uma porrada de sentimentos que juntos nos faziam querer devorar um game da série até o fim pra saciar aquela vontade inexplicável de entrar em um pesadelo de 32 bits.

Ao encontrar novamente um caminho, a Capcom decidiu se deixar levar por esse sentimento, e mergulhou em um novo e revigorante pesadelo, com tecnologia e recursos à disposição, a Capcom iniciou a produção do jogo que Resident Evil seria, caso fosse inventado nos dias de hoje: Um horror de sobrevivência, capaz de te fazer sentir um frio na espinha. um jogo capaz de te causar uma sensação horrível de falta de poder e medo de abrir a próxima porta. A necessidade de deixar de lado esses medos, e encarar o desafio de descobrir uma estratégia eficaz para passar pro próximo nível. O clássico, se expressando de um modo mais polido e com mil e uma possibilidades que tornam Resident Evil 7, o recomeço pro Survival Horror.

Não estou aqui pra apontar o dedo de manequim na cara da Capcom. Não estou aqui pra parecer legalzão com opinião Ctrl C + Ctrl V de uma massa mimada. Não estou aqui estar certo ou errado. Eu estou aqui pra aquele sentimento único que me prendia em frente à tela de uma TV tentando sobreviver ao pesadelo.

Bem vindo de volta ao lar, Survivor Horror. Sentimos muito sua falta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198161311626', 'num_games_owned': 201, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1485522303}
review:
This demo is so good that even if i already watch some playthrough/walkthrough on youtube, when playing this game by myself, i can't get the same experience as the one on youtube, its feels different and that's very impressive and i still get scared even though i already know what will happen next.
Talking about performance, this game runs really great. Even my laptop with 610m gpu can play this game at 30fps (though with little drop in some places but not that much of drop) well in low setting of course, but that's really impressive for modern/new title. just for my recommendation is capcom need to add a option to turn off antialiasing for a lot of people with low spec out there (including me) to add more performance that will be grateful. Anyway capcom really did a great job with the optimization on this game really recommended for those looking for horror game. sorry for my bad english

author: {'steamid': '76561198017147961', 'num_games_owned': 429, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1485218009}
review:
Great teaser demo, a good introduction to what resident Evil 7 is shaping up to be.
This is classic Resident Evil gameplay, classic survival horror pacing that will surely make hardcore old school RE fans very happy, the change of perspective to first person adds a lot to the already amazing atmosphere fueled by the excellent graphics and sound design.

My only complaint goes to optimization, in general the game runs well but i get frame drops from 60s to 50s/40s in certain situations like for example when i block, when in certain areas like the kitchen, etc. I know this is just a demo and not the final game, but january is just around the corner and i would like the final game to run better than the demo at launch (not a hundred patches later) with proper support for tech like SLI/Crossfire, VR and 4K.

If you love survival horror you will love this game, this is true survival horror.

Capcom is doing a great job so far :)

My Specs
Windows 10 x64
Asus P9X79 Deluxe
i7 3970X
3X SLI Titan X (Maxwell)
32GB DDR3 Corsair PLatinum
512 OCZ Vector SSD
1350W Enermax Platimax PSU
2560x1440 @60Hz Samsung WQHD Monitor

author: {'steamid': '76561198050227421', 'num_games_owned': 85, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1482181362}
review: Vague. Sometimes being vague is a good tool for drawing in an audiences attention and provoking the audience to want to know what happens. Other times, such as in this situation, being vague can lead to the audience feeling uninterested and uncaring. The premise of the game is simply, generic and weak. The gameplay seems different from others in the series but somehow lacking in anything but visual appeal. Painting a beautiful canvas does not always lead to it telling a story or envoking emotion. The end of the demo and the wording at the end (bad ending - you never even captivated my attention, I wasnt hyped or excited at all and then the demo ended, I hadnt even started to care...) does not envoke a sense of more to come or entice me to want to find out what happens, let alone buy your game.
